<p>1a</p>
<p>1b</p>
<p>1b.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya kA ri kA/ bod skad du/ 'dul ba tshig le'ur byas pa/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa nyan thos
<p>1b.2</p>dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis nyid kyi dbu yang rin chen 'od 'phro lta bu dang / /rab rgyas pad+ma gser mdog dang 'dra'i btsun mo rnams kyang byin/ /ma lus
<p>1b.3</p>don gnyer rab dgar mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /chos 'dul zhi ba'i don du ston mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang thob ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa rnams las nges par sgrol 'gyur
<p>1b.4</p>zhing / /srid pa'i 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad nas mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting mtha' med pa kun las sgrol ba yi/ /gzings gyur gcig pu bde gshegs kyis
<p>1b.5</p>bstan chos de la yang 'dud/ /gang yang yon tan kun ldan yon gnas dam par gang gyur pas/ /cung zad phul yang 'bras bu rgya chen shin tu 'phel 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid kun gyis phyag
<p>2a</p>
<p>2a.1</p>'os bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags/ /gang zag brgyad mchog legs spyod kyis brgyan 'phags tshogs rnams la'ang 'dud/ /gang gis 'dul ba bstan pa dang / /gang gi gang zhig
<p>2a.2</p>'dul ba thob/ /ma dul spangs nas 'dul dbang gyur/ /'dul ba la ni yang dag gnas/ /chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs bcas kyi/ /ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /
<p>2a.3</p>gdul bya rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /'dul ba las brtsams cung zad brjod/ /le lo can dang blo dman dag /gzhung mangs rnams kyis 'jigs pa ni/ /legs gsungs 'dul ba'i rgya mtsho la/ /yon tan ldan yang 'dod mi byed/ /de phyir de dag gzhug don
<p>2a.4</p>du/ /skyo med 'gro ba'i che ba yi/ /tshig ler byas pa'i them skas kyis/ /rtag tu mu stegs ston byed bzhin/ /rab bsngags nor gyis phun tshogs shing / /lha yi khang bzangs dam par skye/ /ting nge 'dzin dang nges
<p>2a.5</p>'byung 'thob/ /tshul khrims 'di ni 'bras bu che/ /de la 'dir ni rnam kun du/ /'dul ba min pas dag pa med/ /ji ltar chu med 'dag chal gyis/ /mnyes kyang dri ma mi 'dag bzhin/ /ji ltar zla ba med pa yi/ /
<p>2b</p>
<p>2b.1</p>mtshan mo dag ni mdzes ma yin/ /de bzhin tshul khrims mi gnas pa'i/ /rab byung rgyal ba'i bstan mi mdzes/ /de phyir snyom las spangs nas ni/ /bya dang bya min shes nus phyir/ /tshul khrims kyis ni brgyan 'dod pas/ /'dul la 'bad pas gnas par bya/ /gang phyir 'dul
<p>2b.2</p>ba shes gyur cing / /gus par byed pa'i dge slong ni/ /rang nyid yid ches gnas gyur pas/ /gdams ngag rjes bstan ston pa yin/ /de yang 'khor rnam bzhi po yis/ /shin tu gus bcas mdun bdar zhing / /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gces mdzod
<p>2b.3</p>'dzin/ /skyes chen rnams la phan phyir yang / /dam pa'i chos la legs gnas brtson/ /'di yi rang gi tshul khrims kyi/ /phung po legs bsrungs nyams pa med/ /gzhan gang 'gyod pa dang bcas pa/ /thams cad de yi rjes su 'brang / /don rnams rnam par nges
<p>2b.4</p>pa yang / /phul phyin mkhas pa thob pa yin/ /chos rig chos dang bcas pa yis/ /pha rol rgol ba pham par byed/ /gtsug lag khang du'ang gzhan mi 'gran/ /dge 'dun dbus na 'jigs pa med/ /de phyir phyogs kyi sgron ma ste/ /'od gsal rab tu snang bar byed/ /
<p>2b.5</p>gang du 'dul ba mkhas gnas pa/ /de ru nga ni snying las chung / /de ltar dpag med rnam pa yis/ /thub pas 'dul ba'i phan yon gsungs/ /de bas gus pa dang bcas pas/ /chos 'dul gzung phyir brtson par bya/ /lo bcu yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /dge slong kun sdom bdag
<p>2b.6</p>nyid can/ /gsal zhing kun spyod rig pa yis/ /rab byung dang ni bsnyen rdzogs bya/ /so sor thar dang rnam 'byed don/ /mkhas shing dge bas sbyin bya ste/ /gzhan la rjes su ston pa yi/ /mthu ldan zhu gnas bca' ba'i 'os/ /ston pa'i gsung ni ma 'khrugs pa'i/ /byis pas
<p>2b.7</p>mdo tsam bklags pa yis/ /gsal bar shes pa ma yin pas/ /rnam par phye ste rtogs par bya/ /so sor thar dang rnam 'byed ni/ /gang 'dir shin tu mi mkhas lo/ /drug cu lon yang byis pa ste/ /de ni gzhan la brten pas gnas/ /slob dpon de las rgan yang ni/ /gzhon
<p>3a</p>
<p>3a.1</p>nus ji bzhin nges brten te/ /gsar bu yin phyir phyag mi bya/ /gzhan ni thams cad byis pas bzhin/ /pham pa byung dang bu lon chags/ /nad pa rab tu dbyung mi bya/ /bran dang rgyal pos bkrabs par grags/ /chom rkun rgyal mtshan 'chang ba min/ /smad
<p>3a.2</p>pa'i rigs dang yan lag med/ /sgul gyol lag sor sbrul 'dra dang / /smad 'khyal lag rdum 'theng po dang / /sna leb dang ni sna rings min/ /gzhon ches pa dang rgan ches dang / /ha cang bong ring ha cang thung / /yan lag mi min rnam pa can/ /ha cang mgul rings mjing nub min/ /
<p>3a.3</p>bud med lam dang khur gyis dub/ /mgo ring mgo thung mgo chung dang / /so ni shin tu phyir gyed dang / /mig yon dang ni lta stangs 'jigs/ /dmar dang ser dang sngo ches dang / /chu bur rnam pa lta bu'i mig /rab tu byung ba bkag pa ste/ /sprul pa la sogs de bzhin no/ /spang
<p>3a.4</p>bar bya ba mdor bsdu na/ /mdog dang dbyibs la skyon chags dang / /ma rungs rigs te rnam pa gsum/ /'khor gyur kun nas smod pa'o/ /mdog skyon dmar skya la sogs te/ /dbyibs skyon bzhin ngan la sogs yin/ /bong bu la sogs rna dang mgo/ /skra dang rna ba med nyid spang / /
<p>3a.5</p>glang po rta dang spri sna 'dra/ /sna med pa dang mig gcig dang / /mig med ba lang la sogs kyi/ /so 'dra gang yang so med pa'o/ /rigs ni gshed ma smyig ma mkhan/ /g.yung po la sogs rnam par spang / /shing rta mkhan la sogs pa dang / /bstan bcos las ni gang bkag pa/ /de
<p>3a.6</p>bzhin gsal shing mkhan sogs dang / /chang 'tshong la sogs gang yin pa/ /rang bzhin dman gyur de dag la/ /rnam pa kun du bslab mi sbyin/ /de dag dge rgyun med min zhing / /thar pa'ang mi 'dod ma yin mod/ /gcig tu bstan la skye bo yis/ /thos na skyon du lta phyir bkag /bsam
<p>3a.7</p>dang rjes kyi bsam shes shing / /mngon shes ting 'dzin thob pa ni/ /mthu yis 'jig rten tshim byed phyir/ /rab tu 'byin na nyes pa med/ /ji skad bstan skyon rnams bral zhing / /dge ba don du gnyer rnams la/ /bar chad mtha' dag dris nas ni/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du brtag /zhag
<p>3b</p>
<p>3b.1</p>brgyad la sogs bzung nas kyang / /ji srid bar du legs par brtag /gang zhig sngon du yongs brtags nas/ /nyi ma gcig kyang gzhag mi bya/ /thog mar skyabs gsum byin nas ni/ /bslab gzhi lnga po dag kyang ngo / /dkar po'i gos ni 'dzin bzhin la/ /tshogs kyi nang du mkhyen
<p>3b.2</p>par gsol/ /dge 'dun rtse gcig rjes gnang tshe/ /rab byung cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /slob dpon rnam par mkhas pa yis/ /yan lag bcu yi sdom 'dzin gzhug /de ltar dge tshul byas ma thag /'di ni khyim pa thams cad kyis/ /phyag byed smon par 'gyur ba ste/ /gang phyir khyim gyi
<p>3b.3</p>'ching grol phyir/ /tshul ngan rab rib mun bsal te/ /ngur smrig gos ni 'dzin pa yis/ /nyi ma shar ltar lhang nger ni/ /phul phyin de ni shin tu mdzes/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yongs 'du'i shing / /sa brtol lo 'dab rnying pa bzhin/ /sdig pa kun las ldog don du/ /'di yi bsnyen rdzogs
<p>3b.4</p>de bzhin no/ /yul dbus su ni dge slong rnams/ /bcu las nyung du mi rung ste/ /mtha' 'khob tu ni bsnyen rdzogs phyir/ /lnga la sogs pas 'dod pa yin/ /li khar na tshang tshing nags/ /li khar shing 'phel shar phyogs nyid/ /u shi ra zhes brjod pa yi/ /ri bo mun pa can ni byang / /
<p>3b.5</p>ka ba nye ba'i ka ba yi/ /grong khyer nub na gnas pa yin/ /grong khyer 'dam bu can gyi grong / /chu klung 'dam bu can ni lho/ /'di dag gi ni bar rnams la/ /yul dbus su ni shes bya ste/ /phyi rol mtha' 'khob ces byar ni/ /mtha' yas mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin/ /tshul khrims phun sum
<p>3b.6</p>tshogs pa yi/ /dge slong gis bsnyen rdzogs gsungs kyi/ /dung gi sgra dang khong rul dang / /'bras kyi nang gi srin bus min/ /gal te bzhi ni las brjod mkhas/ /tshul khrims ldan par gyur na ni/ /bsnyen rdzogs ma smad gyur pa ste/ /lha yis kyang ni phyag byar 'os/ /dge 'dun tshang dang
<p>3b.7</p>mtshams phyir min/ /las mkhan tshul khrims ldan pa dang / /las dag pa dang bar chad med/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /gang phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni/ /gzhan yang bye brag smra bas brjod/ /ji ltar gnas pa mkhyen pas na/ /'dren pa rang rgyal rang byung gi'o/ /
<p>4a</p>
<p>4a.1</p>'phags pa kauN+Di n+ya sogs/ /lnga sde rnams ni nges pa las/ /gang zhig slob ma bzang sde rnams/ /thams cad skyabs su 'gro bas thob/ /pho nya yis ni mchod sbyin ma/ /tshur shog dge slong zhes byas kyang / /ston par khas blangs pa las ni/ /dge slong
<p>4a.2</p>'od srungs bdag nyid che/ /dri bas mnyes pa nyid kyis ni/ /slob ma legs sbyin de bzhin no/ /dbus dang mtha' 'khob pa dag la/ /bsnyen rdzogs yang dag bstan pa ni/ /bcu dang lnga yi tshogs kyis sam/ /de bas lhag pas kyang ni rung / /de bzhin 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi/ /gau
<p>4a.3</p>ta ma lci chos kyis/ /de las gzhan ni ci rigs par/ /las ni sngon 'gro bya ba ste/ /bsnyen par rdzogs la sngar gyi ni/ /nyes par grags pa med pa yin/ /dgun dus dang ni so ga nyid/ /dbyar dang thung ngu de bzhin du/ /ring po'i ming can du yang shes/ /'di dag dus ni rnam
<p>4a.4</p>pa lnga/ /lhung bzed snam sbyar grib tshod dang / /de bzhin dbyar ni tshul 'jug dag /rtag tu bdag gi dran byas te/ /gzhan du de la nyes byas 'gyur/ /dge slong rnams las 'di bsnyen rdzogs/ /de la zla phyed gdams ngag gsol/ /dge slong bcas gnas dbyar gnas nas/ /tshogs
<p>4a.5</p>gnyis dang ni dgag dbye bya/ /tshul 'chal dge slong min par ni/ /mi gleng khro ba nyid kyang ngo / /lci ba'i chos las 'das pa ni/ /zla phyed tshogs gnyis mgu byas te/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsar bu las/ /dge slong ma yi phyag bya'o/ /lci ba'i chos brgyad 'di dag ni/ /dge slong ma la
<p>4a.6</p>gsungs pa yin/ /bud med skyes pa'i rnam pa dang / /skyes pa bud med rnam pa dang / /mkhan po gtan med nyid dang ni/ /mkhan po khyim pa'i rtags sogs nyid/ /gang yang skal ldan rkun po dang / /yan lag bcad sogs khong chud dang / /de yang bsnyen par rdzogs 'gyur mod/ /dge
<p>4a.7</p>slong 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /mi 'dod bsnyen par rdzogs mi bya/ /gang gi lo ni mi shes na/ /de yi mtshan ni brtag bya ste/ /des ni na tshod mngon gsal 'gyur/ /gang 'di nyi shu ma rdzogs pa'i/ /lo yis dge slong byas na ni/ /zla shol mngal gyi zla rnams kyis/ /mkhas pa
<p>4b</p>
<p>4b.1</p>yi ni dgang bar bya/ /gal te de lta na yang 'di/ /lo ni nyi shu ma tshang na/ /dge tshul nyid du gnas 'gyur te/ /de ni bsnyen par rdzogs min nyid/ /lo ni gcig gam gnyis dag na/ /gal te dran pa rnyed gyur na/ /'di yi lo ni tshang ba yis/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid yin no/ /'on pas kyang ni go gyur na/ /las
<p>4b.2</p>brjod pa ni ma thos kyang / /'di la bsnyen rdzogs yod pa ste/ /tshul khrims ldan la nyes pa med/ /bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de/ /gal te mtshan ni gyur pa na/ /'di ni bsnyen rdzogs kho na ste/ /dge slong ma yi 'khor nang bzhag /mkhan po mtshan ni gyur pa na/ /gal te gsol ba thos na ni/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa kho na ste/ /las byed pa
<p>4b.3</p>la'ang nyes pa med/ /las byed pa ni mtshan gyur na/ /gal te las brjod thos na 'dir/ /mkhan po la ni nyes byas te/ /las byed rnams la skyon yod min/ /las byed nam mkha' la gnas te/ /sa la 'dug la byed gyur na/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa rgyang ring ste/ /tshul khrims 'chal pas mtho ris bzhin/ /ji ltar mi yi bdag
<p>4b.4</p>po yi/ /gzhon nu rigs rgyud 'phel phyir bsrung / /de bzhin ston pa'i bstan pa dag /'phel phyir dge tshul rnams kyang bsrung / /shing sdong mtho la dge tshul ni/ /bla ma'i bka' yis 'dzegs pa las/ /shing chag nas ni lhung ba'i tshe/ /de la 'di dag gsungs pa yin/ /gang phyir 'di ni
<p>4b.5</p>rab byung ba/ /bstan la thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /bya rog skrod nus gyur lta na/ /lo bdun pa yang rjes su gnang / /rab byung dang ni bsnyen rdzogs la/ /lhung bzed can min mi drang ste/ /bsod snyoms rgyu ba rnams la ni/ /de tshe snod don gnyer bas 'thob/ /gnas brtan nye dgas
<p>4b.6</p>gang gi tshe/ /dge tshul bru bas nyen pa na/ /lhung bzed med par lhung bzed don/ /gzhan song ston mo'i bar du thob/ /blangs nas kyang ni lhung bzed sogs/ /blo bzangs kyis ni sbyin par bya/ /rab byung bsnyen rdzogs dag kyang rung / /bram ze bzhin du slar mi 'gro/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs
<p>4b.7</p>gong du ni/ /nges par gnas rnams mi brjod de/ /thos nas 'di ni bya dka' zhes/ /bram ze slar yang khyim du song / /dge slong rnams kyi las gcig gis/ /bzhi ni bsnyen par rdzogs mi bya/ /tshogs dag la ni tshogs gnyis kyis/ /las ni gang du'ang cung zad med/ /gnyis sam
<p>5a</p>
<p>5a.1</p>gsum po dag kyang rung / /dus gcig la ni bsnyen rdzogs na/ /na tshod bye brag yod gyur kyang / /rgan po med cing gsar bu med/ /phan tshun phyag kyang yod min te/ /rnyed pa gral rims bzhin du'o/ /skul byed dbang gis de dag la/ /las bcol ba ni rim pas
<p>5a.2</p>so/ /mtshams med lnga ni byas pa dang / /rku thabs gnas dang sprul pa dang / /mu stegs can zhugs 'on dang lkugs/ /'khrugs dang de bzhin phas pham byung / /dge slong ma ni sun phyung dang / /ma ning la sogs gnas mi bya/ /tshwa sgo'i zhing ltar de dag la/ /tshul khrims sa bon
<p>5a.3</p>skye ba med/ /de bzhin gzhan yang bag med long / /bsdigs pa la sogs las rnams kyis/ /smad do blang bar bya ba ni/ /sems ni dul bar gyur na yin/ /mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa rnams/ /mkhas shing grags dang ldan pa dang / /bsod nams chen po la sogs ni/ /bskrad
<p>5a.4</p>cing bkar bar 'os pa min/ /gang phyir 'di dag mu stegs kyi/ /ri dgas skrag byed seng ge'i bu/ /'di dag khyim par gyur na yang / /ston pa'i blo yis rab dad bskyed/ /'di dag rnams kyis gtsug lag khang / /mdzes byed khyu mchog sgra sgrogs shing / /de bas 'di dag smad na ni/ /
<p>5a.5</p>rang gi bstan pa smad pa yin/ /kun nas nyon mongs skyes na de/ /ma rungs gdon gyis rnam rmongs pas/ /bya min byed pa kho na ste/ /'jig rten pas ni smod par 'gyur/ /'thab krol can dang khyim sun 'byin/ /gsum pa tshul khrims 'chal ba ste/ /las ni byed pa na yang 'di/ /
<p>5a.6</p>gal te 'gyur ba rten byed na/ /'bad pas gaN+Di brdung byas nas/ /dge 'dun gyis ni bskrad par bya/ /ka ba la ni 'jus kyang bcad/ /sgo skyes la 'jus de bzhin no/ /yang na dge 'dun thams cad kyis/ /slar yang gso ba'i 'du byed bya/ /gang yang dge 'dun de dag las/ /dpung byed
<p>5a.7</p>yan lag 'byin bya ste/ /min na de 'dra'i dge slong gi /rtags sun 'byin pa bzhag mi rung / /nan tan gyis ni bskrad bya ste/ /'thab dang rtsod pa med par bya/ /de yi gnas pa cir 'gyur na/ /ro dang 'dra ba kho nar gsungs/ /dge slong shes skyon dri ma can/ /dge slong tshogs kyis
<p>5b</p>
<p>5b.1</p>chad byin la/ /dge slong mas ni gus bstan phyir/ /sngon du ldang gi phyag mi bya/ /dge bsnyen gsong por smra mi bya/ /khyim pas bsod snyoms sbyin bya ste/ /'phags pa'i tshogs ni mnyes pa na/ /bya ba thams cad sngon bzhin no/ /'khyud chags phrag dog nad dang skyes/ /
<p>5b.2</p>zla phyed ces bya ma ning lnga/ /'di dag re re'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtogs pa'i don du brjod par bya/ /gang la gzhan gyis mnan pa na/ /'khrig phyir sems la 'dod chags ni/ /rnam rgyas de ni blo ldan gyis/ /'khyud dang ma ning shes par bya/ /gzhan gyi mtshan ni mthong ba las/ /
<p>5b.3</p>rang la 'dod skye phrag dog grags/ /mtshon nam nad kyis rtags nyams pa/ /de ni nad kyi ma ning brjod/ /gang skyes nyid nas mtshan ma ni/ /gnyis ka med pa skyes nas yin/ /zla phyed bud med zla phyed ni/ /skyes gyur zla phyed ma ning brjod/ /'dir ni sogs kyi sgra med kyang / /zla sogs ma ning
<p>5b.4</p>grub pa yin/ /gang zhig grong gi chos dag gi /nus med de ni za ma ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis ka dod pa ni/ /mtshan gnyis par ni 'dod pa yin/ /mu stegs log ltas bsgos pa yi/ /yid can de ni mu stegs 'dod/ /mu stegs chos kyi longs spyod gang / /de ni mu stegs can
<p>5b.5</p>zhugs pa'o/ /dge tshul gang yang brdzun pa yis/ /rang gi rtags ni bzung nas kyang / /dge slong nyid du rab shes byed/ /de ni rku thabs gnas par 'dod/ /phyogs las gzhan gyi phyogs dag ni/ /tha dad tshogs la yang dag brten/ /gang zhig tshogs kyis chad pa byin/ /de ni tha
<p>5b.6</p>dad gnas par 'dod/ /phas pham dag la log par lta/ /dge slong ma sogs sun 'byin dang / /bden dang dkon mchog gsum gyi ni/ /sngags min sgrogs pa'i dge tshul nyid/ /skyon can bcu po 'di dag ni/ /chad pa'i las kyis bkar bar bya/ /phyung nas slar yang mi gzhug ste/ /
<p>5b.7</p>ji bzhin bshags na skal ba bzhin/ /dge slong pham pa ma byung na/ /cho ga bzhin du bslab phul nas/ /song na'ang skal ldan slar yang ni/ /bsnyen rdzogs dga' ston chen po bya/ /sdom gtong rang bzhin gnas pa yi/ /brda phrad mi yi drung dag tu/ /bdag gis gang bzung bslab pa ni/ /
<p>6a</p>
<p>6a.1</p>gtong ngo zhes sogs tshig rnams 'bul/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rjes thogs la/ /phas pham rnams ni brjod par bya/ /rtogs ldan blo ni de dag las/ /'da' bar byed pa ma yin no/ /mi 'chab pa yi sems kyis ni/ /gal te byung na gcig la'ang mthol/ /
<p>6a.2</p>chung ngu la'ang 'jig pa'i phyir/ /de la phas pham mi 'byung ngo / /brtul zhugs can gyis bla ma pas/ /sngar nyid mal nas langs nas ni/ /so shing bcas nas de 'og tu/ /ston pa la ni phyag bya'o/ /de nas rab gus bskyed pa yis/ /bla ma la ni phyag bya ste/ /de ni de la gdams
<p>6a.3</p>ngag sogs/ /cho ga bzhin du phan 'dogs yin/ /de la khams bde sogs dris nas/ /rab tu 'bad pas de yi ni/ /gnas khang chag chag yang dag gdab/ /nyer spyod sa yang sbyang bar bya/ /ston pa la ni maN+Dal dang / /mchod rten la yang bskor ba bya/ /brtul zhugs rgan
<p>6a.4</p>la phyag byas nas/ /de yi nus pa ji bzhin du/ /bsam gtan klog pa'i las dag gis/ /lus la snying po blang bar bya/ /ngur smrig gyon tsam gyis chog pa'i/ /bsam pa nam yang mi bya'o/ /so shing dus dang mthun pa'i chu/ /'dug stan la sogs bstabs par bya/ /sman
<p>6a.5</p>dang rnyed dka' zhim pa'i zas/ /'bras bu sogs kyang de bzhin no/ /lhung bzed la sogs bkru ba yis/ /gus pas bla ma'i nye gnas bya/ /bla ma rnam par mdzangs pas kyang / /thams cad du ni tshod rig bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal la zhe sdang dang / /phyag kyang nam yang mi
<p>6a.6</p>bya ste/ /de dang longs spyod kyang ma yin/ /'di ni ro bsregs mgal dum bzhin/ /khyim pa sdom la gnas kyang ni/ /dge tshul gyi ni phyag mi bya/ /'dod can khyim gyi chos rnams la/ /dge slong gis lta smos ci dgos/ /de bzhin khyim pa sdom ldan yang / /sdom brtson kun
<p>6a.7</p>gyis phyag mi rung / /kun nas ma bsdams de dag la/ /phyag len dbang ni yod ma yin/ /srid pa tha ma pa la ni/ /rigs pas rnam dpyad mi 'thad de/ /mi brtan 'khor bar 'khor bzhin pa'i/ /sems can rnams la snga ma bzhin/ /gzhan yang phyag bya min mang ste/ /
<p>6b</p>
<p>6b.1</p>spo dang bskrad pa la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong gis rtags phyag bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sdom pas rgan/ /mi slob pa ni bdag por spyod/ /slob pa byin pa spyod pa ste/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan pa ni/ /rjes gnang spyod pas nyes pa med/ /lhag ma le los bcom pa
<p>6b.2</p>yi/ /bdag nyid rnams ni bu lon spyod/ /khrims 'chal rnams ni nang du yang / /gtsug lag khang sogs nyer spyod bkag /bshang khang dang ni nye ba ru/ /sna tshogs gtam ni mi bya ste/ /klog dang kha ton la sogs dang / /tshon gyi las kyang khyad par du'o/ /bshang khang dang ni gci ba'i
<p>6b.3</p>gnas/ /tha dad du ni bya bar gsungs/ /chu 'dor tshe na gci khang du/ /sgra brda byas nas 'jug par bya/ /de yi khang par gros sogs min/ /dal bu dal bus sgra med par/ /rlung dang bshang ba gci ba rnams/ /dor byas nan gyis mi bsdam mo/ /sngon du 'jam po gang rung gis/ /'og
<p>6b.4</p>gi sgo ni phyis nas kyang / /de nas lan gnyis lan gsum du/ /sa yis dag par bkru bar bya/ /lag pa g.yon par 'jam pa yi/ /sa yi phung po bdun bya ste/ /gnyis kar yang ni bdun po nyid/ /so sor tha dad du ni bzhag /thog mar shA ri'i bu la 'di/ /bslab bcas
<p>6b.5</p>gzhan du nyes byas 'gyur/ /de nas lag pa'ang 'bad pa yis/ /chu mang pos ni rab tu bkru/ /lag ngar byin pa phyis nas ni/ /slar yang lag pa dag ni bkru/ /lag gdong rkang pa dag dang ni/ /phyi rol dag byar gsungs pa yin/ /dri yi byug pa spangs pa yi/ /gtsang sbra sems
<p>6b.6</p>ni sbyang ba yin/ /'di 'dra'i byug mchog yod pa la/ /stong phrag sa yis ci zhig bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis nang gi ni/ /gtsang sbra don dam dag pa nyid/ /lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis/ /sdig pa spong bar gsungs pa yin/ /so shing byed dang bshang ba dang / /gci ba 'dor dang
<p>6b.7</p>chu 'thung dang / /mtshams nang rten la phyag 'tshal ba/ /bla ma dag la zhu mi dgos/ /gang du skabs dang mthun pa yi/ /ra ba rtsig pa rta babs nas/ /'dom ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar/ /nang gi mtshams su shes par bya/ /sdom pa lhag ma med gcod dang / /dge 'dun lhag
<p>7a</p>
<p>7a.1</p>mas de ldang dang / /de bzhin gang zag lhag ma can/ /ltung ba rnam pa gsum du grags/ /dang por phas pham gsungs pa ni/ /bzhi yin shin tu lci ba'i phyir/ /'di dag gang rung byung na ni/ /dge slong rnam par nyams pa yin/ /ston ka'i chu bzhin dri med par/ /
<p>7a.2</p>ston pa'i bstan pa bcu gnyis lor/ /ltung ba med par legs gnas te/ /nyon mongs spong bar byed pa yin/ /de nas bzang sbyin bu yi phyir/ /chung ma la ni 'khrig pa spyad/ /dge slong dgon pa pa yis kyang / /spra mo la zhugs kun mkhyen gyis/ /'di skad smad pa mdzad de khyed/ /
<p>7a.3</p>'dod chags la sogs zhi bya'i phyir/ /nga yis chos rnams bstan pa la/ /'di ltar sdig pa'i las la chags/ /de nas phan yon bcu gzigs shing / /slob ma rnams la phan bzhed pas/ /bslab pa'i gzhi ni bca' ba dag /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mdzad/ /mchil
<p>7a.4</p>ma gci dang bshang ba yi/ /lam du chags can zhugs na ni/ /gso byar mi rung bdug pa yi/ /phas pham sbrul gyis dge slong zin/ /kha shun so dang pags pa las/ /nor bu 'das na phas pham ste/ /phyi rol char ni ci rigs par/ /sbom po'am dge 'dun lhag ma'o/ /gang phyir stobs
<p>7a.5</p>kyis mnan nas kyang / /brtul zhugs can gyis grong chos kyi/ /bde bsten de yang phas pham gsungs/ /nyams pa dang ni rma yi sgor/ /rab zhugs sbom por shes par bya/ /mi shes byis pa chung ngu gang / /bsten mi bzod la spyad pa yang / /cung zad zin dang shas cher zin/ /skrangs
<p>7a.6</p>dang rul te nyams pa'o/ /gang zhig gnyi ga rnal du gnas/ /skyon med de ni ma nyams pa'o/ /thams cad du ni rma yi sgo/ /gsum po nyams pa la yang ni/ /gang zhig de la zhugs pa na/ /sbom po yin no mthar thug min/ /nang du ma chud pa dang ni/ /las su mi rung bas kyang ni/ /
<p>7a.7</p>'khrig pa spyod par byed pa la/ /sbom po nyid du grags pa yin/ /mo mtshan mtshams dang ma 'byor dang / /'jigs pas bud med 'dor bzhin dang / /yang na ngo tsha yis kyang 'dor/ /mi 'dor gyur kyang nyams pa dang / /gang yang byis pa 'dod pa yi/ /longs spyod mi shes mi rung
<p>7b</p>
<p>7b.1</p>la/ /de ltar bstan na thams cad du/ /sbom po'i kha na ma tho bcas/ /chung ngu 'bring sogs dbye ba yis/ /'dus byas thams cad tha dad de/ /de yi ltung ba nges pa yi/ /dbye ba grub par the tshom med/ /bu ga gzhan dang lus kyi ni/ /bu ga bral nas de dag tu/ /lus skyes
<p>7b.2</p>'jug par byed na yang / /sdom brtson la ni sbom por brjod/ /byis pa chung la zhugs pa yi/ /dge slong pham par yong mi brtag /nu ma mchu dang sha mtshams bzhin/ /nyes spyod rgyas par mi 'gyur dman/ /mche ba rno mangs gdug pa yi/ /sbrul gyi khar ni chud pa bla/ /lus bde
<p>7b.3</p>bstan pa'i rma la ni/ /lus skyes 'jug pa ji ltar rung / /sbrul gdug gis ni reg gyur kyang / /skye ba gcig nyid 'chi 'gyur gyi/ /khrims 'chal skye ba brgyud na ni/ /stong phrag sdug bsngal mi bzad 'thob/ /lci dang shin tu lci ba nyid/ /yang dang shin tu yang ba ste/ /phas pham pas
<p>7b.4</p>ni bslang ba yi/ /sbom po rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /skrag par mi byed lci ba ste/ /gzhan gyis de la 'bad pa yis/ /bzlog kyang mi nyan rab lcir shes/ /gzhan la khrel yod yang ba ste/ /rang nyid ngo tshas shin tu yang / /bsam pa'i dbye bas 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin
<p>7b.5</p>dge 'dun lhag ma yis/ /kun bslang sbom po rnam pa bzhi/ /dge slong nyid dang de ma nyams/ /ma nyams pa yi lam dag tu/ /bcug reg ro ni myong ba dang / /gang phyir sems ni rang bzhin gnas/ /rang gi khang pa brtsig pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi shing / /dge slong nor can
<p>7b.6</p>gyis brkus te/ /de brten 'di dag kun bslang bcas/ /ma 'khrul gnas nas sbo byed cing / /gzhan nor brku sems mthu yis sam/ /'jab bu yis kyang de la mthar/ /mi las ma sha lnga tshang brkus/ /ma sha ma ga d+hA pa ste/ /de las lhag pa mkhas pas shes/ /dngos po bskyod
<p>7b.7</p>pas sbom po ste/ /sbyor ba la ni nyes byas so/ /sa gzhi 'jam zhing mnyam pa la/ /bskyod kyang mthar ni mi 'gyur te/ /sa phyogs grum gas la sogs pa/ /mthon dman can la rab tu bskyed/ /zhe sdang gi ni rgya la sogs/ /chud son byed pa sbom po yin/ /sems can rnams ni dgrol
<p>8a</p>
<p>8a.1</p>don du/ /bsod nams 'dod pas bshags bya'o/ /gang gi yul ni de yi dus/ /gang gi tshad kyi 'gron bu ni/ /de yi bzhi cha brkus pa gang / /dge slong la ni pham par 'gyur/ /sa gzhi rtsod bcas rnam pa gnyis/ /rigs dang rgyal po'i rigs kyis te/ /gnyi ga
<p>8a.2</p>la yang dge slong ni/ /rgyal na ltung ba sbom por brjod/ /khyim pas gal te sbyor btang na/ /gnyis kar yang ni phas pham nyid/ /phas pham me yis bsregs pa yi/ /shing tshig lta bur sdom brtson 'gyur/ /nor bu mu tig la sogs nor/ /sngags kyis bkug nas rku ba na/ /mthong
<p>8a.3</p>ba tsam gyis de las 'dir/ /ltung ba'i mthar ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag gi lo tog phun tshogs bya/ /gzhan la min zhes sred pa yis/ /rang sar chu ni 'dren byed cing / /tshan gyis 'jig par byed kyang rung / /rang gi lo tog phun tshogs shing / /gzhan gyi lo tog nyams pa na/ /
<p>8a.4</p>lo tog rin ni shes byas nas/ /sbom po'am phas pham ci rigs brtag /sdig pa kun las ldog phyir dang / /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /nam yang gzhan gyi 'tsho ba ni/ /dge slong gis ni dbrog mi bya/ /rkun pos slob ma phrogs pa'am/ /gser sogs stobs kyis mi bslang
<p>8a.5</p>ste/ /gzhung lugs ji bzhin ma bsgrubs na/ /ma rungs ltung ba dag dang bcas/ /chos bshad pa 'am phyed rin nam/ /rin ni tshang ba yis kyang rung / /blang bya rkun ma rgyal po la/ /phul na ltung ba sbom por 'gyur/ /slob ma nyid phyir mthun btsal nas/ /dge tshul dge slong gis phrogs na/ /
<p>8a.6</p>'khor dbye ba yi kun bslang phyir/ /sbom po'i blo can sbom pos reg /dge slong gis ni sho gam sogs/ /rang ngam gzhan gyi lag gis phrogs/ /dngos po brtag par bya ba ste/ /ltung ba nges par bsten par 'gyur/ /rgyal po la sogs dbang ba yi/ /chu 'gram grub tsas las byung ba/ /
<p>8a.7</p>ma byin lam gang nas song na/ /rang ngam gzhan gyi lag nyid kyis/ /de ni de yi phrogs 'dra ste/ /ltung ba rnam par dpyad pa na/ /ma sha lnga yi rin gyis ni/ /mthar 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags tshogs sam/ /pha phyir gang zhig bsams pa yi/ /bsngags
<p>8b</p>
<p>8b.1</p>pa de la brjod pas sam/ /phyi nas brtul zhugs can gyis bgyir/ /mang po ri ba'i dngos po gcig /rung ba'i chos gos khyer ba bzhin/ /des ni sba bar mi bya ste/ /nges par ltung ba med par 'dod/ /gzhan yang sho gam la 'da' bar/ /kha tshar bcad pa la sogs sam/ /chu
<p>8b.2</p>yis bsnyugs nas kyang ni rung / /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gnang / /gang gis chos gos la sogs pa/ /'dod pas dang du len pa ni/ /'gyod pas btang yang de la ni/ /ltung ba sbom por shes par bya/ /ri la 'dzeg gam gru brgal tshe/ /phan tshun so sor go byas nas/ /
<p>8b.3</p>lhung bzed la sogs snod bskur te/ /bag yod rtag tu dran pa yis/ /'di ni bzung ngam btang ngo zhes/ /smras thos gal te brlag gyur na/ /de rin nges par sbyin pa la/ /'dir ni rnam dpyad mi dgos so/ /ci te ma bos zan za na/ /dge slong la ni nyes byas te/ /'di ni sde
<p>8b.4</p>ldan lhag ma la'ang / /nyes byas nyid du rab tu grags/ /rgyal pos byin dang rkun pos byin/ /las byed dag gis ma dris byin/ /gzhan dang 'brel par 'du shes na/ /sbyin po de las mi blang ngo / /gzhan dang 'brel pa pham pa yin/ /ster bar rnam par shes na ni/ /'dod
<p>8b.5</p>pa mi mthun mi blang ste/ /mi shes na ni nges pa med/ /sbyin bdag nges par rnam dpyad nas/ /de phyir gtso bo ma yin na/ /de las blang bar mi rigs te/ /de ni sbyin por mi 'dod do/ /gal te dge 'dun sogs kyi nor/ /rang gi gnyen nam gzhan gyis kyang / /ster na nor med nad pa
<p>8b.6</p>yis/ /slar yang bsab par 'dod pas blang / /gal te shi na nyes med de/ /gson na gang yang rung ba ni/ /blangs nas kyang ni ci nus kyis/ /de yi dkor ni bsab par bya/ /ba lang la sogs longs spyod mchog /grong la sogs par longs spyod pa/ /'di dag dge 'dun la ni
<p>8b.7</p>gnang / /gang zag la ni bkag pa yin/ /longs spyod zhing dang grang dang rta/ /ba lang ma he ra lug rnams/ /'dul bar longs spyod mchog nyid du/ /de nyid rig pas gsungs pa yin/ /dngos po rnam pa lnga po ni/ /shes rab can gyis mi bcang zhing / /mi gtsang mi bgo
<p>9a</p>
<p>9a.1</p>thams cad du/ /de bzhin khas kyang mi blang ngo / /skyed mos tshal dang gtsug lag khang / /de yi dngos dang mal stan rnams/ /tshul ldan rnams kyis sbyin bdag gi/ /bsod nams spel phyir bsrung bar bya/ /lha khang skyed tshal kun dga' ra/ /gtsug lag
<p>9a.2</p>khang ni gcig tu 'dod/ /de dag dngos po gnas khang yin/ /mal stan dag ni grags par zad/ /gtsug lag khang steng gnas pa yi/ /bsgo ba gang du gsal bar thos/ /bka' bsgo ba ni byed pa yis/ /de la nges par 'jug par bya/ /las kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ /zas dang gos kyi
<p>9a.3</p>rjes su bzung / /nad pa la ni rjes su gnang / /las ni mi nus pa la yang / /brdeg dang 'tshog dang skyo ba dag /'phags pa'i chos dang 'gal ba yin/ /bsad dang bcing dang nyon mongs byed/ /'phags pas de phyir rnam par spang / /ci rigs mchog gis gsungs pa dang / /
<p>9a.4</p>rigs kyi chos ldan gyis bstan pa'i/ /yul chos ldan pa'i chad pa ni/ /dge 'dun gyis ni dang du blang / /rgyal po la sogs yongs btang ba'i/ /rang skal bsod nams gyis rnyed na/ /yongs su longs spyod nyes med de/ /de dag sngar bstan bzhin du gnas/ /'dren pas dngos
<p>9a.5</p>po thams cad kyis/ /tha snyad rang gis ma gsungs te/ /dge slong ma 'am dge tshul dag /nges pa'i zhal ta ba yis blta/ /ston pa'i chos las 'das nas ni/ /srid ldan gang zhig chad pas gcod/ /de ni bslab pa nyams pa ste/ /ma rig sgrib g.yogs gyis bskyed pa'o/ /
<p>9a.6</p>yang dag lta dang gzhan thob kyi/ /log lta can dang tshul khrims med/ /de la rab tu byin na ni/ /dad pas byin pa'i 'bras bu med/ /gang yang 'tsho ba'i tshad tsam zhig /khengs las lhag dang brtul zhugs can/ /ston mo dag las len byed na/ /des ni rnam par nyams par byas/ /
<p>9a.7</p>ji tsam gang gis chog gyur pa/ /de tsam ston mo las ni blang / /lhag ma kham gcig len byed kyang / /bsams bzhin yin na nyams pa nyid/ /pha ma'am nad pa la sogs la/ /sbyin par byed pa bkag pa med/ /sbyin bdag dag gis ma spags par/ /nam yang gzhan la sbyin
<p>9b</p>
<p>9b.1</p>mi bya/ /gang du 'chag pa la sogs tshe/ /gri khab la sogs rnyed gyur na/ /gtsug lag khang skyong dag la gtad/ /lung bzhin de yis go bar bya/ /dge 'dun dbus su zhag gsum bar/ /de yis de dag bsten par bya/ /su yang ngo len med na ni/ /ci bde bar ni tshogs la dbul/ /
<p>9b.2</p>dgos pa'i tshe na las rnams bya/ /bsod nams bsags pas las bya yi/ /rnyed pa'i don du dge slong gis/ /las ni nam yang mi bya'o/ /yid ches gyur la rang gi blos/ /ji srid du ni nges pa yis/ /'jog pa la ni nyes med de/ /dbang po gzhan ni bzhag nas so/ /gang phyir
<p>9b.3</p>dman dang 'bring dang mchog /grogs po gsum ni rnam dpyad nas/ /yid ches brtan po nyid la bca'i/ /nges par sems mi brtan la min/ /shin tu mchog la mchog nyid de/ /'bring la 'bring po tha ma la/ /tha ma nyid de dman la chung / /yid ches rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /nad
<p>9b.4</p>pa la ni dris nas sman/ /phan pa'i ched du sbyin bya ste/ /rang gi yid ches kyis kyang rung / /til snod dge slong ma bzhin min/ /mi dang gzhan nor rku sems kyis/ /sbyor ba gcig la tshang na ni/ /mdor na bslab pa nyams pa ste/ /phas pham pa yi rgyu yin no/ /dge slong mi gtsang yid
<p>9b.5</p>byung gang / /ri dwags dbyug thogs zhes pas bsad/ /bsod nams thob dang lhung bzed sogs/ /'dod pa de bsten bkag pa yin/ /yang dag bsam pa ma 'khrul pas/ /rang ngam gzhan gyis pha rol bsad/ /mi la 'chi ba'i bsngags pa dag /brjod grub des kyang mthar
<p>9b.6</p>'gyur ro/ /de 'chi'i thabs ni tshig gis sam/ /sbyor ba rnams kyis mngon bsngags shing / /sems ni rjes su yi rang na/ /sbom po'o me yis nags bsreg dang / /mi yi yan lag gcod pa dang / /de yi sha ni za yang ngo / /nad pa la ni nad g.yog dag /phan phyir byis pa legs par
<p>9b.7</p>bsgo/ /mkhas pa'am gnas brtan dag la yang / /sman ni yongs su dris nas su/ /nad pa dag la phan blos sbyin/ /gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gang gi nad la ci 'dra ba'i/ /yo byad nad pa dag la ga /brtags pa za ba la sogs kyang / /rjes su brtse bas nyes pa
<p>10a</p>
<p>10a.1</p>med/ /dge 'dun kun gyi nad pa ni/ /blta phyir brtson byar bka' stsal te/ /thams cad du ni rim pa bzhin/ /'dug nas kyang ni blta bya ste/ /nad pa'i nad g.yog dag gis kyang / /'bad pas 'dug pa'i don du ni/ /gus pas rtag tu stan rnams ni/ /nges par nye bar
<p>10a.2</p>bstab par bya/ /gal te nad pa nus med pas/ /skyo bar gyur pa de lta na/ /de la 'dir ni re mos kyis/ /yang dag bsgo bar brtag pa nyid/ /nad pa'i mdun du gang zhig gis/ /thos sam tshor bar de yi sems/ /'chi ba'i 'dun pa skye 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i chos bshad mi bya'o/ /
<p>10a.3</p>kye ma khyod kyis sbyin pa byin/ /tshul khrims kyang ni ma nyams bsrungs/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus byas te/ /mya ngan 'das pa mdun na gnas/ /khyod ni lus dang bral ma thag /lha yi khang bzangs thag mi ring / /srog dang bral na myur du ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa lag na
<p>10a.4</p>gnas/ /de skad gang smra'i dge slong ni/ /mi zad ltung ba dag dang bcas/ /de bas khyod ni nang bral nas/ /yun ring chos spyod 'tsho bar shog /chos spyod ji srid gson na ni/ /de srid bsod nams tshogs chen po/ /rdzogs par 'gyur zhes brjod par bya/ /nad kyis gdungs la sman
<p>10a.5</p>dag dang / /mkhas pas gdams ngag sbyin bya zhes/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pas gsungs/ /skra can 'tshong na sbom po yin/ /lhung bzed sogs chags gzhan dag la/ /gdol pa bzhin du brtse med par/ /gang zhig 'dod sems skyed byed pa/ /de la nyes byas nyid
<p>10a.6</p>du rig /bzhad gad rgod bag ched du yang / /ga ga tshil ni mi bya ste/ /sngon ni gzhon nu bcu bdun sdes/ /dge slong g.ya' bsgags shi bas bcas/ /mchod rten la sogs las byed pas/ /khyim pa med tshe lci ba'i khur/ /mi khyer mi gzhug shing mkhan ni/ /shing bteg shi ba
<p>10a.7</p>la rten bkag /so phag gas po la sogs pa/ /brda ma sprad par sbyin mi bya/ /nyi ma zad par dge slong gis/ /gla mi bzhin du las mi bya/ /las kyi zhal ta blo ldan gyis/ /de dag la ni go byas nas/ /de rnams las du ba spang ba'i phyir/ /khye sus bza' btung gis tshem bya/ /
<p>10b</p>
<p>10b.1</p>gtsug lag khang ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /brtson par yang ni rjes su gnang / /sems can dag la ltos med par/ /ma bsams dbyug sogs mi 'phang ngo / /khru bcu'i nang rol spyod yul du/ /rdo ba la sogs dor bar rung / /bslab pa rjes dran pa skyed pa yis/ /nang gi bdag nyid
<p>10b.2</p>nyams mi 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang gi las byed la/ /mtshan mo chos sgrogs gnas dag tu/ /sgo sogs bsdams par byas sam zhes/ /gnas brtan gyis ni dri bar bya/ /gtsug lag khang 'joms bzlog pa'i phyir/ /gang la bcing ba brtag bya bar/ /bcing ba sngar ni brjod pa
<p>10b.3</p>yis/ /gtsug lag khang ni bsrung bar bya/ /'khrul gtan steng gzer 'og 'jug dang / /sgo lcags lde mig kyog po dang / /gtsug lag khang gnas de dag la/ /zhal ta ba yis ci rigs sbyin/ /gcig dang gnyis dang gsum sogs kyis/ /tha dad bcing ba gzhug byas te/ /
<p>10b.4</p>thams cad gzhug par 'os na yang / /rtog pa po yis thams cad gzhug /ston pa'i bstan la gus pa yi/ /dge slong lus dub thang chad dag /lam du dge slong rnams kyis ni/ /pha bzhin bsgrub par mi bya'o/ /sngon byung pha rgan dal 'gro la/ /dus yol gyur pa'i 'jigs pa yis/ /
<p>10b.5</p>bu yis phul bas lam du de/ /dub nas 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /mu ge'i dus shig dge slong rnams/ /mi srid bla ma'i yon tan rnams/ /phan tshun bsgrags te go byas rgyus/ /'tsho ba byas tshe bkag pa mdzad/ /khyad par gyur pa'i rtogs pa rnams/ /ma thob par ni thob bo zhes/ /
<p>10b.6</p>mngon pa'i nga rgyal med smra na/ /sdom brtson mtha' yi ltung ba 'thob/ /mi chos bla ma'i yon tan 'dir/ /bsam gtan rnams dang gzugs med sogs/ /mthong zad phul phyin mya ngan 'das/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi thob smra'/ /mkhas pas khyad par rtogs pa'i don/ /gang
<p>10b.7</p>gsungs 'bras bu bzhi po dang / /sdug bsngal la sogs yul shes pa/ /bden pa bzhi po mthong zhes dang / /bsam gtan zhes brjod bzhi po yi/ /de la reg pas gnas pa dang / /sdug bsngal la sogs bdag gis shes/ /lha la sogs pa bdag gis mthong / /lha klu
<p>11a</p>
<p>11a.1</p>gnod sbyin dri za sogs/ /mthong ngo bdag gis gtam yang byas/ /de dag kyang ni bdag la smra/ /zhes smra dge slong mthar 'gyur ro/ /lha yi skad ni bdag gis thos/ /de ni mtshan mo bdag drung 'ongs/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin sogs kyang ste/ /rang bzhin
<p>11a.2</p>gyis ni pham par 'dod/ /de dag kun la shes bya ba/ /sbom po sha za mthong sogs te/ /'di na gang zhig lha sogs dag /mthong ba yod ces smra na yang / /rnam rnags mi rtag 'du shes sogs/ /'bras bu mngon shes rab ston na/ /mi 'dod na yang mtha' yi ni/ /mtshon
<p>11a.3</p>chas mgo bcad thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di na dge slong gang / /rdul khrod sha za mthong ba yod/ /bdag ces smra bar mi byed kyang / /de skad brjod na nyes byas so/ /ltung ba 'chab dang reg pa dang / /lus bkan bag med phyogs byed nyid/ /de bzhin dge slong phas
<p>11a.4</p>pham bzhis/ /dge slong ma yi rtsa ba 'jig /rgyal dang pham dang de bzhin du/ /char 'bab mtshan ni 'gyur ba sogs/ /dgongs su gsol zhes brjod bya ste/ /gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /dge slong ser skyas 'od srungs kyi/ /bstan la ngag rtsub brdzun
<p>11a.5</p>smras pas/ /chu srin bco brgyad gdong skyes bcas/ /nyon mongs dgra pham khas blangs nas/ /nyon mongs dag gis pham byas na/ /de phyir phas pham gyur pa ste/ /khrims dral zhes ni nges par brjod/ /phas pham pa yi chos dag tu/ /gang gsungs ma lus brjod nas ni/ /rim pa
<p>11a.6</p>ji bzhin dge 'dun gyi/ /lhag ma rnams ni brjod par bya/ /rma sgo gsum ni ma gtogs par/ /shes lus rang bzhin yan lag gis/ /bsams bzhin khu ba 'byin pa ni/ /dge 'dun gyi ni lhag mas reg /sla dang ska ba nyid dang dmar/ /ser po dang ni sngon po ste/ /khu ba rnam pa
<p>11a.7</p>lngar bstan pa/ phyi ma 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyis/ /de yi bu ni sngon po ste/ /de yi 'og tu ser po yin/ /dmar po de yi blon po ste/ /ska ba dbang po smin pa nyid/ /bud med kyis dub dbang po dag /ma smin pa yi sla bar shes/ /thams cad du yang dge 'dun gyis/ /dag bya lhag ma'i
<p>11b</p>
<p>11b.1</p>ltung ba nyid/ /shes bzhin rtsig khung bum pa yi/ /sbubs sogs du ba 'byin ba ni/ /sbom po yis ni bcom pa ste/ /pha bong sbom pos snad pa bzhin/ /brtsams te khu ba ma phyin nam/ /chags pas dbang po 'jal byed dam/ /gar bsgyur mkha' la bskyed pas sam/ /mnye bshud
<p>11b.2</p>kyis ni phyung na yang / /rdzi ldog chu rgyun bzlog phyogs su/ /gtod pa la yang de bzhin 'dod/ /rdzi phyogs rgyun phyogs mthun gtod pas/ /nyes byas 'gyur bar gsungs pa yin/ /chu bsti ba ni mthong sogs la/ /chags pa'i sems dang ldan yang ngo / /chags pas don nyams rtsa ba
<p>11b.3</p>ste/ /de bas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /dze ta'i shing sogs reg pas sam/ /brla sogs dag la bshud pa la/ /der ni khu ba byung yang ste/ /rmi lam na ni nyes med cha'o/ /dge slong tshogs la chos lhag par/ /rgyas par yang dag bshad pa rnams/ /dge tshul la ni thams cad du/ /
<p>11b.4</p>nyes byas nges par shes par bya/ /mtha' las byung ba'i nyon mongs ngan/ /kun slong nges par bshags bya ste/ /sbom po lci ba tshogs pa la/ /yang ba'i ming can bzhir brjod do/ /dge 'dun lhag ma las byung ba'i/ /lci ba lnga la yang ba bzhis/ /dge 'dun lhag ma tshogs la
<p>11b.5</p>ste/ /lhag ma gang zag gcig la'ang rung / /sngar ni ltung ba byung ba yis/ /ltung ba mthun snang la mi 'dod/ /dri mas dri ma rnam dag pa/ /gang du yang ni rung ma yin/ /gang la dge 'dun lhag mas gos/ /ji srid nges par 'chab byed pa/ /de srid de ni dag bya'i phyir/ /spo ba dag la
<p>11b.6</p>nges par bzhag /dge 'dun lhag ma gang byung ba/ /ji srid de ni rjes bzung min/ /de srid de la spo ba yi/ /cho ga yongs su dag phyir bya/ /mtshan mo dang ni sems sbyor las/ /'chab pa yang ni rnam pa gnyis/ /shin tu mi rung 'dir sems pas/ /sems kyi ming du shes par
<p>11b.7</p>bya/ /'dir ni spo ba la gnas te/ /gal te nyon mongs kyis pham pas/ /rmongs pas slar yang ltung spyod na/ /slar yang dngos gzhi'i spo ba ni/ /gzhan dag kyang ni sbyin bya ste/ /'dul ba legs shes gang dag gis/ /lan gsum bar du de la sbyin/ /snying rje'i zhing ni de 'dra la/ /
<p>12a</p>
<p>12a.1</p>nyon mongs dbang gis 'jug shes pas/ /ngo tsha'i khur ni chen po yis/ /brgya lam zhig na 'dud par 'gyur/ /de lta na yang mi dge las/ /gal te mi ldog pa nyid na/ /de ni mdo bzhin dor bya ste/ /ji srid skyo bar gyur gyi bar/ /yid ni yang dag skyo gyur cing / /phyir
<p>12a.2</p>bcos don du gnyer ba na/ /tshogs kyis dbyung bar 'dod pa yis/ /mgu ba spyod pa de la sbyin/ /mgu ba'i chu yis rnam bkrus nas/ /dri ma lhag ma dag bya'i phyir/ /gang du dge slong nyi shu yis/ /de ni nges par dbyung bar bya/ /de la dge 'dun gtso bo ste/ /bsam pa mkhyen pa'i
<p>12a.3</p>dge 'dun yin/ /dge 'dun gyis ni rjes gnang na/ /las kyi bya ba byed par rung / /dge 'dun nang du de yi las/ /bya phyir de yi rigs pa yis/ /tshogs las ldang ngo de yi phyir/ /dge 'dun lhag ma zhes byar brjod/ /gal te byin rlabs mgu bas kyang / /gnas pa'i tshe na shi gyur na/ /
<p>12a.4</p>dbyung ba ma byas na yang ni/ /nges par mtho ris dag tu skye/ /rang gi las kyis co dris pas/ /ngan 'gro dag tu mi skye mod/ /'on kyang snying rje'i bdag can gyis/ /btang snyoms mi bya rjes su bzung / /gang zhig ming ni grags chen dang / /mdo sde la sogs mang du thos/ /de dag
<p>12a.5</p>gcig gi mdun du yang / /bshags pas dag par nges par rung / /bsam pa yang ni che ba dang / /de bzhin ngo tshas bcabs pa yang / /de yi spo bar yongs brtags byed/ /de yi sgo nas cho ga bzhin/ /de ni mthol ba lan gsum yin/ /nad kyis chad pa nyid dang ni/ /gos kyis
<p>12a.6</p>dkris dang nyams pa'i sgor/ /byed na ltung ba che spangs nas/ /sbom po'i ltung bas 'joms par 'gyur/ /rkang pa nas ni spyi bo'i bar/ /chags bcas bud med yan lag la/ /gos kyis ma chod reg na ltung / /chod pa la reg sbom po nyid/ /shing rta gru sogs la 'jug dang / /
<p>12a.7</p>'phul ba dang ni 'then pa dang / /bar bcas bar med pa la ni/ /reg pa bdag byed sngar bzhin des/ /bud med kyis tshur dge slong la/ /reg cing chags sems bdag byed na/ /'dir yang sngar bzhin thams cad du/ /'dren pa la sogs byed kyang ngo / /'khrig pa'i bsam pas
<p>12b</p>
<p>12b.1</p>'di dag la/ /gnyen po stobs chung byed na ni/ /de la phas pham kyis bslang ba'i/ /sbom po yi ni rtsang bar 'gyur/ /'di dag bud med bsten bzod de/ /gzhan du sbom po'i ming can yin/ /skyes pa'am ma ning la sogs sam/ /dud 'gro mo la nyes byas yin/ /dge slong gang
<p>12b.2</p>zhig bud med la/ /rtse phyir yang ni smad tshig smra/ /dge slong gzugs brnyan nyid yin te/ /de yang dge 'dun lhag ma yin/ /'ga' zhig rma yi sgo gsum po/ /legs par 'dod la shin tu 'jam/ /yang na de dag legs par ni/ /ma dod dga' ba mi skyed gnas/ /'di dang 'di ni
<p>12b.3</p>khyod la sbyin/ /gang khyod khyo ni nor ldan te/ /gang 'dir khyod dang lhan cig tu/ /bde myong de ni rnyed pa che/ /de la sogs pa'i 'khrig tshig dag /gang brjod dag 'dun lhag ma'o/ /'khrig dngos sgra ni mi brjod na/ /sbom po yi ni ltung bar gsungs/ /bud med ngo tsha las 'das
<p>12b.4</p>tshig /tshul smra'ang de la ci rigs nyid/ /gang zhig 'khrig pa'i tshig gyur pa/ /de ni smra bar mi bya'o/ /smyos pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang / /smra mi shes dang las dang po/ /tshor bas gzir la brjod ngan gyi/ /ltung ba dag ni mi 'byung ngo // //bam po gnyis pa/ 
<p>12b.5</p>rang nyid bsngags pa'i bye brag dag /'khrig pa don gnyer bud med kyi/ /mdun du rang nyid kyis bsngags na/ /lhag ma'o dge 'dun gyi zad byed/ /longs spyod 'di yis nyer gnas na/ /mchog dang phul sogs nges bstan pa/ /sring mo bsnyen bkur mchog tshig smra/ /gsol
<p>12b.6</p>ba la sogs las kyis ni/ /tshul khrims ldan par gang bshad pa/ /tshul khrims phung por yang dag ldan/ /dge ba'i chos can nyid kyis na/ /ting 'dzin phung por yang dag ldan/ /tshangs par spyod pa nges brjod pas/ /shes rab phung por yang dag ldan/ /'khrig pa'i
<p>12b.7</p>tshig ces bya ba 'dir/ /gnyis kyis gnyis sprad sbyor ba yin/ /'di dag nang nas tshig gcig kyang / /sdom brtson chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /brda sprad bud med la smra na/ /ltung ba yin la dpyad mi dgos/ /'khrig pa gsal bar byed pa'i tshig /gal te bud med kyang ni smra/ /
<p>13a</p>
<p>13a.1</p>gang 'dir tshangs par spyod rnams la/ /'khrig pa longs spyod mchog ces dang / /khyed lta'i tshul khrims ldan pa ni/ /rtag tu dge ba'i chos can de/ /yon gnas khyad par 'phags pa dag /rtsod pa'i dus na rnyed par dka'/ /de la sogs brjod dge slong
<p>13a.2</p>gang / /dga' bas dang du len byed cing / /len gyi tshig kyang smra byed na/ /dge 'dun lhag mar gsungs pa yin/ /da lta bu dang 'khrig spyad na/ /bud med rnams kyang 'bras bu che/ /'khrig pas dngos ni mi brjod kyang / /gang de sbom po'i ming can no/ /de bzhin 'khrig pa'i chos kyis
<p>13a.3</p>ni/ /dge slong zhes sogs snga ma bzhin/ /da lta bu zhes mi brjod na/ /'di yang sbom po nyid du gsungs/ /bud med kyis kyang de bzhin du/ /'khrig pa'i tshig dngos dor gnas kyang / /khyed lta bu zhes mi brjod na/ /de bzhin gnyi ga sbom po yin/ /bsten mi shes la 'khrig tshig
<p>13a.4</p>dngos/ /brjod na sbom po las ni dman/ /de lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgra/ /med pa la yang nyes byas 'dod/ /thams cad du yang sdom brtson ni/ /chags can la ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni chags can zhes gsungs gang / /sems ni chags pa dang 'brel nyid/ /gang bsten bzod la ltung
<p>13a.5</p>ba ste/ /bsten mi bzod la sbom po yin/ /skyes pa ma ning la sogs dang / /dud 'gro mo la nyes byas nyid/ /rang ngam gzhan byed 'jug kyang rung / /bud med skyes pa phrad na ni/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i ral gri yis/ /rang gi mgo ni gcod par byed/ /chu tshigs byin sogs mdor
<p>13a.6</p>bsdu na/ /chung ma rnam pa bdun du brjod/ /mdza' na mo bcu de dag gi /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya/ /chu yis rab tu byin pa yi/ /don la de ming rab tu btags/ /bud med gang zhig nor gyis nyos/ /rin chas nyos zhes de la rig /rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan dang ni mgos/ /
<p>13a.7</p>phrogs pa btsan phrogs zhes su brjod/ /ngas khyod nye gnas bya'o zhes/ /zer ba dang sam 'dus pa yin/ /zas dang gos kyi rgyu mtshan gyis/ /zhugs pa gos zas kyis 'tsho yin/ /gang khyod nor dang nga yi nor/ /de yi mnyam srog 'tsho bya zhes/ /de skad brjod nas zhugs pa gang / /
<p>13b</p>
<p>13b.1</p>kha dum pa zhes bya ba'o/ /skad cig tsam zhig rtag tu min/ /de la thang 'ga' 'phrad ces bya/ /rnam pa bdun po 'di dag ni/ /slar yang so so'i dbye bar 'dod/ /'thabs pa'i mdo dang 'thabs pa'i 'og /dum pa bcad pa rnam pa gsum/ /rde'u gsum ni gtor ba dang / /chung ma ma yin par
<p>13b.2</p>ni bsgrags/ /cho ga rab tu gtang ba dang / /de bzhin dril bu bsgrags pa'o/ /dang po rnam pa gsum po la/ /bye ba nye bar sdum byed na/ /gcig gnyis gsum la rim pa bzhin/ /nyes byas sogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa gnyis/ /drug ste gsum la sbom po yin/ /
<p>13b.3</p>bdun pa bsdums byas brtul zhugs can/ /dge 'dun gyi ni lhag ma thob/ /'di ru mdza' mor 'dod pa ni/ /khyo ni shi'am gzhan song tshe/ /ma yi 'bad pas bsrungs pa ni/ /ma yis bsrungs zhes brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin pha dang gyos sgyug dang / /pha dang ma yi rang rig skyes/ /des bsrungs
<p>13b.4</p>de ni slar yang ni/ /nye dus bsrungs zhes brjod pa yin/ /pha dang khyo ni med pa na/ /ming pos yongs su bsrungs pa'am/ /phu mo nu mo yis kyang bsrungs/ /spun zlas bsrungs zhes brjod pa yin/ /bram ze mo 'am rje rigs mos/ /bsrungs pa rigs kyis bsrungs pa yin/ /bad sa la'am
<p>13b.5</p>ko sa la'i/ /rgyud kyis bsrungs pa rus chags bsrungs/ /chos spyod brtul zhugs can dag gi /'khrug med mar ni shes bya ste/ /rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ /mdza' na mo zhes shes par bya/ /gang 'dir mdza' na mor gsungs dang / /bzhi pa la sogs chung ma rnams/ /thams cad du ni sdum
<p>13b.6</p>byed pa/ /dge 'dun lhag mar nges par bstan/ /khye'u 'am ni bu mo 'di/ /ci yi phyir na khyim mi byed/ /de skad la sogs smra ba yi/ /dge slong gis ni nyes byas 'thob/ /rang gi don du khang pa ni/ /gsol ba la sogs las kyi ni/ /ched sogs yon tan ldan par bya/ /gzhan du
<p>13b.7</p>dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur/ /gang du nyam nga med spyod pa/ /spyod lam rnam bzhi rung ba ni/ /'dug dang 'chag dang nyal bar grags/ /bzhi pa langs pa nyid yin no/ /chur ni bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /mtho ni bcu dang gnyis yin no/ /zheng du de nyid bdun yin te/ /de dag de yi tshad
<p>14a</p>
<p>14a.1</p>du gsungs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho yi tshad/ /gang gsungs mkhas pas shes par bya/ /'bring tshad mi yi khru dag ni/ /phyed dang gnyis ni yod pa yin/ /'bring tshad skyes bu yi ni khru/ /bco brgyad chur ni yod pa yin/ /zheng du phyed dang bcu gcig ni/ /
<p>14a.2</p>khang pa'i tshad du gsungs pa yin/ /sbrul dang sdig pa tre bu ka /tre la ta sogs kyis mi rung / /rtsod bcas lam dang shing drung dang / /lha rten rgyal po'i pho brang mtha'/ /chu dang g.yang sa khron pa'i drung / /brtsam du rung ba ma yin no/ /skyon ni 'di dag med pa ru/ /rigs pa yi ni khang
<p>14a.3</p>pa bya/ /bka' yis ma gnang ba dag dang / /gzhi mi rung dang brtsam mi rung / /ma brtan rtsod pa dang bcas su/ /byed na dge slong sbom ltung thob/ /skyon kun gyis ni rab smad par/ /dge 'dun lhag mar gyur pa ste/ /skyon rnams kun dang bral ba yi/ /sa gzhir rjes su bsngags
<p>14a.4</p>pa nyid/ /las dang po dang de bzhin smyos/ /'khrugs dang nad kyis gdungs pa yis/ /byed kyang 'di las 'byung ba yi/ /ltung ba yod pa ma yin no/ /gtsug lag khang ni bdag bcas la'ang / /tshad dang cho ga 'di nyid de/ /chen po nyid kyi tshad du ni/ /nor gyis 'dir ni shes par
<p>14a.5</p>bya/ /gzhi med pa'am bag tsam gyis/ /sdom brtson nyams par 'dod phyir ni/ /phas pham pa yis smad na ni/ /gnyis ka dge 'dun lhag mar shes/ /gang zhig cung zad bden par smra/ /'di ni bag tsam yang dag grags/ /rgyu mtshan med pa gzhi med yin/ /bag tsam nyid
<p>14a.6</p>rab bstan pa ni/ /rab dang blo ldan dge slong ma/ /ut+pal mdog can zhes bya byung / /rdzing bu rab zhi zhes pa'i 'gram/ /gyad nor can yong nye bar 'ongs/ /de dang ha cang mi ring bar/ /sa las skyes dang mdza' bo gnas/ /der ni chu 'thungs 'ongs pa yi/ /ri dwags ri dwags mo spyod
<p>14a.7</p>mthong / /de mthong sa las skyes kyis ni/ /mdza' bos mdza' bshes la dris pa/ /mi tshangs spyod dang dge slong dang / /dge slong ma yang mthong ngam ci/ /de yis mthong ngo zhes smras te/ /bag tsam 'di tsam las byung bas/ /gyad nor bdag gis brlag bya zhes/ /de yis khros nas smras
<p>14b</p>
<p>14b.1</p>par zad/ /de la sogs pas kun bslang ba'i/ /bag tsam gyis ni bye brag dag /yid gcugs dman pa dag gis ni/ /dran par bya phyir gsungs pa yin/ /bzhams te bsgo sogs cho ga yis/ /lan gsum bar du bzlog na yang / /mi nyan dge 'dun mthun 'byed na/ /dge 'dun gyi ni
<p>14b.2</p>lhag ma thob/ /gsol ba ma gtogs bzlog pa'i tshig /bzhams te bsgo ba zhes bya ste/ /tshe ldan khyod 'dir mchog gcig la/ /'di ma byed ces rgyas par ni/ /gzhams te bsgo bas mi gtong na/ /las kyis de la bka' bsgo bya/ /de nas gsol dang bzhi las te/ /byis gang de yi
<p>14b.3</p>grogs byed pa/ /mchog gcig bsam pa gcig pa las/ /dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su gnas/ /tha dad dbye ba yang ni 'dir/ /rnam pa bcu bzhi dag tu bzhed/ /chos la chos ma yin brjod dang / /chos min la yang chos su brjod/ /'dul ba dang ni 'dul min nyid/ /bzhi po de la
<p>14b.4</p>sogs pa brjod/ /'di la dbang byed mkhas pa yis/ /'gyed pa dang ni mi gdams dang / /ltung ba dang ni bya ba ste/ /rnam pa bzhir ni shes par bya/ /sna tshogs rtsod dang tshogs pa med/ /dge 'dun bsam pa tha dad pa'i/ /rkyen la sogs pas 'byung ba ste/ /rtsod pa yi ni dbang byas
<p>14b.5</p>brjod/ /kun nas nyon mongs pas ltung ba/ /phan tshun du ni mi gdams pa/ /de ni rtsod pa las byung ba/ /mi gdams pa zhes bya bar grags/ /lus dang ngag yid kyis phye ba/ /de ltar tha dad gcig dang ni/ /rnam pa gnyis dang rnam pa gsum/ /ltung ba phyogs tsam brjod pa yin/ /khyim
<p>14b.6</p>gcig dge slong bud med dang / /gal te mi shes lhan cig nyal/ /nub gsum bsnyen par ma rdzogs dang / /gnas gcig 'di ni lus kyi'o/ /bud med dag la rkang pa ni/ /lnga'am drug gis chos ston na/ /ma bsams par ni lhag pa'i tshig /smras pa la ni ngag gir brjod/ /
<p>14b.7</p>gso sbyong dus tshe dris na yang / /skyon yong smra bar mi byed na/ /de la yid kyi ltung ba ni/ /nyes byas nyid du mkhas pas rtogs/ /lus dang yid gnyis 'brel pa ni/ /yang dag bsams nas srog gcod dang / /ma byin len dang chang 'thung sogs/ /brten pa nyid la'ang 'dod
<p>15a</p>
<p>15a.1</p>pa yin/ /yang dag bsams nas lnga dang ni/ /drug tsam smras pa lhag par brjod/ /ngag dang yid las gyur pa de/ /brdzun smra sogs la'ang 'dod pa yin/ /brdeg ces kun nas bsams nas ni/ /brjod de lus can la brdeg na/ /'di ni lus dang ngag
<p>15a.2</p>yid kyi/ /bya ba rnam pa gsum pa can/ /dge slong la ni mi dge bas/ /ltung bar 'gyur gyi sems dag na/ /mchod rten sku la skyes pa yi/ /rtswa sngon gcod par byed bzhin du/ /ji ltar dge ba'i sems kyis ni/ /ston pa la ni mchod 'dod pas/ /me tog phreng ba spel ba'i phyir/ /
<p>15a.3</p>'thog pa de la de tsam min/ /ma bsams thub pa'i bslab pa'am/ /dge 'dun nang khrims dral gyur na/ /lung ma bstan par gsungs pa ste/ /ltung med dge ba nam yang min/ /yang dag bsams nas 'das na ni/ /mi dge ba nyid kho nar 'gyur/ /'di ni rjes su ma gnang
<p>15a.4</p>yang / /skabs 'ongs zhar la brjod pa yin/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma yi/ /ltung ba so so'i sgo nas 'dir/ /rtsod pa'i dbang du byas pa yi/ /ltung ba 'di ni mkhas pas gsungs/ /gsol ba la sogs las 'di dag /rung ba min zhes smra ba rnams/ /rtsod pa dang ni 'thab mo yang / /
<p>15a.5</p>bya ba'i yang ni rgyu ru 'dod/ /dge 'dun 'byed par gang brtson pa'i/ /blo chung gis ni nyes byas thob/ /bzhams te bsgos kyang mi gtong na/ /nyes byas nyid du rnam par gzhag /dang po nyid du gsol ba'i las/ /brjod tshe mi gtong sbom po nyid/ /brjod pa gnyis la'ang de yin te/ /mthar
<p>15a.6</p>ni dge 'dun lhag ma nyid/ /snga ma'i brjod pa gnyis la ni/ /sbom po'o de rjes de la ni/ /gsum pa dge 'dun lhag ma ste/ /de ltar 'di ni legs par brtag /gang yang de rjes 'brang ba yi/ /dge slong sdig to can rnams kyang / /bzhams te bsgo sogs cho ga yi/ /sngar bzhin 'di dag
<p>15a.7</p>kun la'ang 'gyur/ /khyim sun 'byin pa yis ni gzhan/ /sun 'byin pa ni rnam gnyis gsungs/ /gcig ni 'grogs pas yin te gzhan/ /gnyis pa yang ni longs spyod kyis/ /'grogs pa bud med lhan cig tu/ /rtse 'jo 'phyar g.yeng la sogs bsten/ /longs spyod me tog
<p>15b</p>
<p>15b.1</p>'bras bu dang / /bza' btung la sogs lhan cig byed/ /mig rna yid sogs shes pa yi/ /mthong ba la sogs rnam gsum 'dod/ /bzhams bsgo la sogs rim byas kyang / /mi gtong sngar bzhin nyes sogs lta/ /bka' blo mi bde bas kyang ni/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung bar
<p>15b.2</p>bstan/ /bka' blo mi bde phan rnams la/ /brjod rung ma yin tshig smra'o/ /phas pham la sogs gang zhig bslab/ /de ni bslab pa'i gzhi zhes bya/ /nyar bstan 'dul bar gang gsungs pa/ /'di la chos ldan dge slong rnams/ /gang zhig ston pa'i bka' la gtogs/ /chos mthun
<p>15b.3</p>rnams kyis nges par bsgo/ /bzhams te bsgo ba la sogs la/ /mi gtong sngar bzhin nyes bya sogs/ /bcu gsum 'di dag dge 'dun las/ /ldang phyir dge 'dun lhag ma'o/ /phyi ma bzhi ni gsum gyis te/ /snga ma dgu ni cig car du/ /mtshon pa tsam du sbyar ba yis/ /dge
<p>15b.4</p>'dun lhag mar nges par bstan/ /ma nges pa yi chos gnyis ni/ /'dul ba las gsungs rab tu brjod/ /dge slong 'char kas sbed ma dang / /lhan cig nyer gnas reg pa las/ /mgon pos dge 'dun tshogs dbus su/ /ma nges dang po'i chos bcas mdzad/ /dben gnas dge
<p>15b.5</p>slong gcig pu zhig /bud med gcig dang 'dug byed na/ /'dod bsten rung ngam mi rung yang / /ma nges gnyis po'i chos su brjod/ /gang du gzhan med 'di dben te/ /skyabs yod kyis kyang rnam pa ni/ /rtsig pa rib ma mun pa dang / /yol ba thibs po zhes bya lnga/ /gnas su
<p>15b.6</p>'gro dang 'dug pa'am/ /nyal ba la sogs gang byas kyang / /dad pa can gyis tshig gis ni/ /dge slong de ni ldang bar 'os/ /yang na de dag 'gro la sogs/ /cung zad tsam yang ma gtogs na/ /de yi ngo bo shes bya'i phyir/ /gsol ba'i cho ga sngon 'gros byin/ /rab tu byung
<p>15b.7</p>dang bsnyen rdzogs dang / /de yis gzhan la nam yang ni/ /gnas bca' ba yang mi sbyin te/ /gzhan dang lhan cig 'chag pa'ang min/ /'dug stan la sogs gcig mi bya/ /de la chang 'di ma shi'i bar/ /btung ba yongs su ma chod phyir/ /'di dag ma nges chos zhes brjod/ /de
<p>16a</p>
<p>16a.1</p>ltar ma nges chos gsungs nas/ /de las ji ltar ldang ba dang / /gang zag lhag ma mang po yi/ /mdun du rab gnas mchog gis so/ /zhag bcu 'das par dge slong gis/ /chos gos ma brtags 'chang na ni/ /spang ba'i ltung byed sa rdul gyis/ /mgo bo
<p>16a.2</p>g.yogs par byed pa yin/ /chos gos drubs dang tshon bsgyur ba/ /chos gos zin par gyur pa na/ /chos gos 'dzin par khas len pa/ /'dir ni blo yis khas blang ngo / /mu bzhi can la 'dir brtag pa/ /sra brkyang dbyung ba byas nas ni/ /chos gos ma zin par ni min/ /de la sogs
<p>16a.3</p>pas rnam par gzhag /bal gos sha na nyi 'og dang / /ras gos dang ni zar ma dang / /ko tam pa dang du gu la/ /chos gos rgyu ni rnam pa bdun/ /spang bar 'os pa mi spong dang / /ltung ba bshags par mi byed na/ /gal te phran tshegs de 'dra yang / /nub gcig bral bar mi byed
<p>16a.4</p>pa/ /rigs tshigs gsum po 'di las ni/ /gcig ma tshang bar ma yin te/ /'di dag ma lus byas na ni/ /ltung ba med par gsungs pa yin/ /gang yang lhung bzed dra ba sogs/ /nye bar bsags nas der yang ni/ /de tshe gzhan skyel bshags mi byed/ /spang bya'i ltung ba
<p>16a.5</p>nyid du 'gyur/ /gang 'dir zad byed ltung ba ni/ /nges par spangs nas bshags bya ste/ /gang phyir gang gis ngan song du/ /ltung phyir ltung ba'i ming du btags/ /chos gos gsum gyi gnas bya ste/ /phyi rol 'di dag med par min/ /gzhan du dge slong nyes byas 'gyur/ /dge 'dun gyis
<p>16a.6</p>gnas ma gtogs so/ /gnas gcig gnyis dang mang po yis/ /grong ni 'obs kyis bskor ba dang / /rtsig pa rib ma'i khongs su chud/ /nyer spyod gcig dang tha dad pa'o/ /nyer spyod spong ba skyed mos tshal/ /lha yi gnas la sogs pa'o/ /'di la thun mong gcig nyid de/ /tha dad sna
<p>16a.7</p>tshogs nyer spyod nyid/ /rgyun srang gcig ni btod pa dag /gnas gcig pa zhes brjod bya ste/ /gdol pa ri khrod pa la sogs/ /rigs gcig pa yi gnas bzhin no/ /rigs gnyis gang du bram ze dang / /gdol ba gnas pa gnas gnyis brjod/ /sna tshogs rgyun srang btod pa
<p>16b</p>
<p>16b.1</p>la/ /mang po bar ni rab tu grags/ /nyer spyod nang gi ma lus dang / /de yi phyi rol 'dom gang yin/ /khyim bya 'phur chags tsam dag gam/ /gang du 'thag 'tshed la sogs tshad/ /rigs dang tshong khang tshong 'dus dang / /khang thog g.yul sa mu stegs gnas/ /gru dang shing ljon
<p>16b.2</p>shing rta dang / /kun dga' ra gcig sna tshogs spyod/ /spun rnams ma phye ba dang ni/ /skyes bu gcig gi yang ni rung / /ji ltar rigs par gsungs nyid kyis/ /de yi nyer spyod gcig pa yin/ /'di yi nyer spyod snga ma ltar/ /nyer spyod sna tshogs pa yang ni/ /gang du 'di dag gi ni sgo/ /
<p>16b.3</p>tha dad pa'am thun mong brjod/ /mang po yang ni rigs bzhin du/ /tshong khang la sogs 'dod pa yin/ /nyer spyod tshul ni ma lus pa/ /gcig dang sna tshogs dag tu dbye/ /nyer spyod gcig dang sna tshogs su/ /mu stegs lta bas phye ba ste/ /gang du phyi rol spyod pa yis/ /gnas pa
<p>16b.4</p>g.yang gzhi can la sogs/ /'khor los spyod pa la sogs khyim/ /thun mong sngags kyi khyim kun te/ /gang du phyi rol rnga zlum dang / /gling bu la sogs 'grems pa'o/ /phan tshun yal ga ma bral na/ /shing sdong kun spyod gcig yin te/ /phyi rol nye 'khor phyed grib bam/ /gang
<p>16b.5</p>du thigs pas slebs pa'o/ /gang du nyer spyod gcig pa der/ /chos gos gsum ni nyer bzhag nas/ /gzhan du dge slong nyal gyur kyang / /ltung ba bskyed par 'gyur ma yin/ /lha rten dag la sogs pa yi/ /thun mong sgo drug dag tu gos/ /sbas nas gzhan du 'dug na yang / /
<p>16b.6</p>zad byed ltung bar ldan ma yin/ /'dom ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar/ /chos gos gsum dang bzhi gcig tu/ /nyer spyod dag tu song ba na/ /'dug 'greng 'bral ba ma yin no/ /chos gos yang dag yod na yang / /gzhan dag bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /byin gyis ma brlabs ma
<p>16b.7</p>brtags par/ /zla ba las lhag gzhan mi bya/ /smin drug nas ni khra yi bar/ /dus kyi gos ni rnam par spyad/ /de las gang lhag dus min te/ /nye du sogs la yid brtan bya/ /dur khrod pa dang mi shes dang / /shes pa nyid kyis chos gos dang / /song dang song ba ma yin dang / /
<p>17a</p>
<p>17a.1</p>phyag dar khrod ni lnga pa yin/ /dur khrod pa ni dur khrod spyod/ /sbyin po mi shes shes pa nyid/ /song ba ro yi gos la sogs/ /phyag dar khrod ni bor ba'o/ /rdul gyis sbags dang dgon pa dang / /srang bor me yis tshig pa dang / /mi gtsang gis gos phyag dar
<p>17a.2</p>khrod/ /rnam pa lngar ni shes par bya/ /me yis tshig dang chu la bor/ /de bzhin pha mas byin pa nyid/ /byi ba'i so yis 'chos pa dang / /de bzhin be'us zos pa'o/ /gsar pa dang ni longs spyod bzod/ /chos gos rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /de yi cho ga ji skad bshad/ /de bzhin
<p>17a.3</p>'dir ni mngon par brjod/ /gsar pa'i gos la 'di bya ste/ /thog mar snam sbyar nyis rim drub/ /de bzhin du ni gding ba ste/ /chos gos gzhan la nam yang min/ /zla ba bzhi sogs longs spyad pa'i/ /gos de sdom brtson gyis rtogs na/ /snam sbyar la ni bzhi rim ste/ gzhan
<p>17a.4</p>dag la ni nyis rim bya/ /de las lhag pa mi sbyar te/ /rim pa de la sbyar bya yang / /bzo 'phror gyur te bzhag pa ni/ /zhag bcu'i bar du rung ba yin/ /snam sbyar rnams kyi tshal bu ni/ /snral zhi bya'o dgu tshogs dgu/ /snam phran nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar/ /de dag dbye ba nges
<p>17a.5</p>par bstan/ /glegs bu phyed dang gsum pa gsum/ /gsum ni glegs bu phyed dang bzhi/ /tha ma gsum gsum glegs bu ni/ /phyed dang lnga par bya ba yin/ /sde tshan gsum po 'di dag gis/ /snam sbyar zhes byar gsungs pa ste/ /de dag tshad ni nges bstan pa/ /dang po khru ni
<p>17a.6</p>lnga dang gsum/ /tha ma phyed dang gsum dang lnga/ /de gnyis bar ni bar ma yin/ /de bzhin bla gos nyid nga ste/ /lnga dang gsum par gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis lnga gnyis ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yang ni mthang gos yin/ /gal te de dag ma 'byor na/ /rjes bzung don du 'khor
<p>17a.7</p>gsum khebs/ /spyir na rang bzhin tshad rnams la/ /khru yi tshad du gzhag pa yin/ /shin tu ring dang thung ba la/ /lus kyi tshad du 'dod pa yin/ /dang po tha ma dag dang dbus/ /tshal bu'i sgo ni gsum du brjod/ /de yi sor ni bzhi dang gnyis/ /de yi bar ma rim pa bzhin/ /khru yi tshad
<p>17b</p>
<p>17b.1</p>las chung ba la/ /byin rlabs yid brtan mi dgos so/ /spu can la yang de bzhin te/ /de gyon grong du 'jug mi bya/ /dge 'dun lhan cig zan mi za/ /mchod rten la yang phyag mi bya/ /'di ni sbyin bdag gi'o zhes/ /yongs su brtags nas bcad par bya/ /ma dras chos gos gyon nas
<p>17b.2</p>ni/ /grong du 'jug par mi bya ste/ /'jug na nges par dge slong dag /nyes byas 'gyur te med ma gtogs/ /mi mthun byed dang 'khrug long can/ /mu cor smra dang gtum po dang / /'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba la/ /mkhas pas yid brtan phyir mi gzhag /gal te yid ches dge slong
<p>17b.3</p>zhig /chu yi pha rol gnas na yang / /de phyir de la chos gos kyi/ /yid brtan bya bar gsungs pa yin/ /gzhan der gnas pa'i dge slong dag /shi bar shes na chos gos ni/ /slar yang dge slong gzhan zhig gi /ming gi yid brtan bya ba yin/ /chos gos yid brtan bya ba
<p>17b.4</p>'dir/ /mi rtag la min mngon sum min/ /de bzhin dge tshul rnams la yang / /chos gos yid brtan bya ba min/ /gang dag gzhan gyis gtad nas ni/ /chos gos byin gyis brlab pa na/ /da shi na yang dge slong nges/ /dge 'dun la ni dbul bar bya/ /chos gos gang brtags de yi
<p>17b.5</p>mthar/ /snag tsha la sogs thig le bya/ /bye brag bdag gi mtshan ma yang / /khyad par rtogs par bya ba nyid/ /bar ma las ni yo byad drug /de nyid nad g.yog la phyin nas/ /shi ba'i yo byad lhag ma ni/ /dge 'dun bsod nams 'grub phyir bgo/ /chos gos dras pa gsum dang
<p>17b.6</p>ni/ /rdul gzan sham thabs gnyis gnyis te/ /g.yan pa dgab dang gding ba dang / /ras chen dang ni skra bzed dang / /gdong dang lag pa phyi ba ste/ /'di dag bcu gsum dbye bar 'dod/ /chos gos lhag sogs yo byad rnams/ /'tsho ba'i yo byad bcu gsum po/ /dge slong chos gos
<p>17b.7</p>rnams la ni/ /'chang ba'i tshul ni 'di yin te/ /nges par byin gyis brlab pa dang / /de las gzhan pa yid brtan bya/ /rngul gzan mthang gos med par ni/ /chos gos chen po longs mi spyod/ /gang phyir longs spyod shes pa yis/ /phal ba yang ni bgo bar bya/ /kha bsgyur 'os pa kha
<p>18a</p>
<p>18a.1</p>bsgyur zhing / /drub par 'os pa drub pa dang / /byin rlabs 'os pa byin gyis brlab/ /brtag par 'os pa yid brtan bya/ /sngon po btsag dang ngur smrig rtsi/ /'di dag rung ba'i tshon gsum ste/ /tshon chen dag gi chos gos ni/ /kha bsgyur byed pa bkag pa yin/ /rgya
<p>18a.2</p>skyegs le brgan rtsi dang btsod/ /rma shing rtsi dang mthing shing mtshal/ /sin+du ra dang gur gum ste/ /'di dag tshon chen brgyad du 'dod/ /seng ba phrug dang phying ba dang / /la ba shin tu mthug po dag /'di dag chos gos 'dod pa yis/ /dra bar bya ba ma yin no/ /spu can rnam par spangs nas
<p>18a.3</p>ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyi nang shun bya/ /gding ba la ni dra mi dgos/ /rtag tu 'bral ba yang ni med/ /snam sbyar nges par dras te bcad/ /gzhan dag ma nges gang gi phyir/ /'dod chung rang gi chos gos kyi/ /las kyis skyo ba skyed phyir ro/ /lnga pa sham thabs gyon nas ni/ /bya ba mtha' dag
<p>18a.4</p>byed par rung / /bla gos sa phyogs gtsang mar ni/ /las yongs byed na bkag pa med/ /snam sbyar dge slong 'dus pa dang / /zas dang mchod rten phyag byed dang / /grong sogs 'jug la bgo bya yi/ /gzhan dag tu ni bkag pa yin/ /la ba phrug dang phying ba dang / /rnga mo'i la ba dag dang
<p>18a.5</p>ni/ /chos gos nyis rim gyon pa ni/ /mi gtsang phyogs su bkag pa yin/ /ma g.yogs gnas mal mi rung phyir/ /gzhan med bla gos bzhi bltab tu/ /byas te bting nas dran ldan pas/ /ldang ba yang zhing nyal bar bya/ /gzhan du chos gos ma khyer bar/ /gnas na gzhan
<p>18a.6</p>gyi dkar po'am/ /dras pa ma yin na yang rung / /byin gyis brlab par bya ba nyid/ /zas la nad pa ma gtogs par/ /gos gcig pa ni bkag pa yin/ /sdom brtson bgo ba med par ni/ /khrus byed bkag go med na rung / /mang pos blangs na la ba sogs/ /gcig rnyed pa ni kun gyis
<p>18a.7</p>spyad/ /rjes su gnang ba ma gtogs par/ /gcig pus bdag gir mi bya'o/ /kha ma bsgyur bar nyin mo ni/ /phyi rol ngur smrig nges par g.yogs/ /dge 'dun gos ni dran bzhin du/ /gnyis ka nas g.yogs spyad par bya/ /la ba'i spu ni phyir bstan nas/ /gyon te bcag par mi
<p>18b</p>
<p>18b.1</p>bya'o/ /srin sogs 'jigs pas 'dug pa dang / /nyal ba rjes su gnang ba nyid/ /dge 'dun rnams la be'u phrug re/ /rjes su gnang ngo gang zag la'ang / /bar sig la ba dge 'dun la/ /la ba gzhan ni gang zag la'ang / /rjes gnang kun kyang la ba ste/ /'on kyang par sig yul nas
<p>18b.2</p>byung / /de ni par sig la ba'o/ /smad g.yogs bsdams pa'i don du ni/ /ska rags kyang ni rung ba yin/ /lteb ma dang ni shur bu nyid/ /gsum pa shur bu phre'u nyid/ /rang gi bzang po gang gyur pa/ /thams cad dge 'dun nyid phyir spyad/ /gding g.yogs dag ni med par yang / /
<p>18b.3</p>nam yang mal stan longs mi spyad/ /dag par bya phyir sham thabs ni/ /btso blag mkhan la 'khrur mi gzhug /brtse ldan rang ngam gzhan gyis kyang / /snod kyi nang du dal bus bkru/ /btso blag mkhan gyis brtse med par/ /gos dag drag tu sprugs brdabs na/ /tshags sran zad
<p>18b.4</p>par byed pa'i phyir/ /bstan bcos las ni rab tu bkag /tshul ldan ji srid legs par ni/ /chos gos la sogs longs spyod pa/ /de srid rgyun mi 'chad par ni/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi bsod nams 'phel/ /bsrung ba'i don du skra bzed ni/ /zheng du khru ni phyed dang gnyis/ /srid du khru ni
<p>18b.5</p>gsum yin te/ /lhag pa brtag par mi bya'o/ /gal te chos gos 'tsher bag can/ /gzhan las dge slong gis rnyed na/ /'tsher bag chu yis nyams byas nas/ /yongs su spyad do gzhan du min/ /'tsher bag dang bcas 'jam po yi/ /chos gos bcang bar mi bya ste/ /'chang bar
<p>18b.6</p>byed na de dag la/ /nges par 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /mdzes mas chos gos 'tsher bag can/ /mdzes dga' la ni nan gyis byin/ /de la kun nas chags skyes pas/ /de phyir bstan bcos che las bkag /gang des yongs su longs spyad par/ /bzod pa'i gos gzhan yod min na/ /
<p>18b.7</p>rngul gyis 'jigs pas snam sbyar la/ /rngul gzan bltabs nas bcang bya ste/ /zheng du mtho gang srid du khru/ /phyed dang do las lhag mi bya/ /snam sbyar yongs su srung byed pa/ /btsag yug rnams kyis kha bsgyur bya/ /khyad par du yang bla gos kyi/ /tha ma yongs su zegs pa na/ /
<p>19a</p>
<p>19a.1</p>smyung tshems la sogs yang dag sgrub/ /khab kyi las kyang rjes su gnang / /phyag dar khrod la dga' ches pas/ /bsams nas dral bar mi bya ste/ /nam yang chos gos don du yang / /rma med ro las mi blang ngo / /srin bu sogs kyis rma gtod kyang / /rang
<p>19a.2</p>gnas zhag bdun bzhag nas ni/ /dur khrod pa yi dge slong gis/ /bkrus te kha bsgyur bcang bar bya/ /dge 'dun gyi ni mal cha dang / /stan ni de la bkag pa yin/ /dge slong khyim du mi 'jug ste/ /sgo drung bsod snyoms blang bar bya/ /stan sogs 'dug par 'bod pa na/ /dur
<p>19a.3</p>khrod pa zhes go byas nas/ /gnang phyir khyim du zhugs nas ni/ /stan la 'dug pa la sogs bya/ /mchod rten dag la phyag byed tshe/ /'dom gang nang du dor byas te/ /nya dang sha sogs mi bza' zhing / /der ni gnas khang brtsig mi bya/ /kha ma bsgyur dang kha tshar can/ /be'u ras
<p>19a.4</p>sogs dge 'dun rung / /tshon can rgyal byed tshal phul bas/ /des na be'u ras sogs bkag /spang bar bya ba'i dngos gang rung / /de ni dge 'dun la min te/ /gang gzhan phyis ni ster ba yi/ /gzhung lugs shes pa dag la spang / /mi shes bzhin du chags bcas gang / /
<p>19a.5</p>spangs nas zlog par mi byed cing / /legs bsgo byas kyang mi ster na/ /de la stobs kyis dbog par bya/ /'char ka'i khu ba'i thigs pa gang / /gos la babs mthong sbed ma yi/ /chags khyer bu yi rgyur gyur pas/ /de yis kun bslang 'di rab bcas/ /dge slong gang zhig nye du
<p>19a.6</p>min/ /dge slong ma la gos 'khru dang / /'tshed dang 'chag par byed pa ni/ /nges par ltung ba dang ni ldan/ /'khru ba la sogs byed 'jug na/ /gcig gis kyang ni nye bar 'joms/ /the tshom za na nye du la'ang / /nyes byas dri mar yongs su bsgrags/ /pha dang ma dang ma yi pha/ /nye bar
<p>19a.7</p>bzung ste bdun brgyud ni/ /mkhyen chen gyis ni nye dur gsungs/ /de las gzhan ni gnyen mi nyid/ /tshos khu dngas ma la sogs pa/ /re re la yang 'og gzhi gding / /bslab pa'i gzhi ni nyams byed pas/ /dge slong la ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig nye du min/ /dge slong ma
<p>19b</p>
<p>19b.1</p>las bsams bzhin du/ /chos gos gang rung len byed na/ /de yi bslab gzhi nyams par byas/ /'di la slar sbyin dbrog mi bya/ /brje ba la ni nyes pa med/ /ji ste brje na mnyam pos sam/ /dge slong ma yi 'dod pa bzhin/ /rgya chen nor ldan dge slong mas/ /gal te 'bul na nyes
<p>19b.2</p>pa med/ /de bzhin legs gsungs bsnyen rdzogs byed/ /bor rlag gyur dang dbus yang ngo / /dge slong chos gos gsum yod pas/ /nye du ma yin khyim bdag dang / /de yi bdag mo las kyang rung / /chos gos nam yang mi blang ngo / /
<p>19b.3</p>kun du skyes pa khyim bdag ste/ /de yi bdag mor bud med brjod/ /bor rlag byung sogs slong ba ni/ /'di la nyes pa med par brjod/ /dbul po la ni bslangs pa yis/ /kha tshar la sogs thob pa dang / /gar mkhan la sogs pa yi gos/ /
<p>19b.4</p>bzang po la yang nyes pa med/ /chos gos phrogs pa la sogs kyis/ /mang po rnyed par gyur na yang / /dran pas stod g.yogs smad g.yogs las/ /lhag par blang bar mi bya'o/ /khru ni bcu gnyis stod g.yogs gos/ /smad g.yogs yang ni bdun dang gnyis/ 
<p>19b.5</p>re zhig 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i/ /stod g.yogs smad g.yogs zhes su gsungs/ /khru ni lnga gsum snam sbyar te/ /nyis rim stong g.yogs dag kyang ngo / /khru ni lnga dang gnyis po dag /re zhig bstan pa'i smad g.yogs so/ /bslangs nas dngos po lhag pa dag /gal te ga shed
<p>19b.6</p>nas ni rnyed/ /de ni go byas bzlog byas te/ /rjes su gnang na blang bar bya/ /khyim bdag mo 'am khyim bdag gis/ /gos kyi rin ni spags na der/ /dge slong rnam par rtog bzhin du/ /slong na de ni ltung dang bcas/ /sngar bzhin nye du min zhes bya/ /chos gos rnam pa bdun po
<p>19b.7</p>dag /yongs su spyad par bzod pa yis/ /gos de rung ba zhes bya'o/ /rin spags pa zhes bya ba ni/ /gser la sogs pa ma smos shing / /mgron du ma bos zhes pa ste/ /brtag btung dran par brjod pa'o/ /lnga dang bcu pa'i rin dag gis/ /nyos la byin zhes rjod byed cing / /
<p>20a</p>
<p>20a.1</p>sngon po sogs kyi kha dog ste/ /khru yi tshad kyis khru nyid do/ /rin la sogs pa gsum dag gis/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/ /ma bslangs na ni ma yin no/ /chos gos phrogs pa la sogs pas/ /gang yang rung
<p>20a.2</p>ba blang bya ste/ /dge slong rtags kyis lus la 'dir/ /ma g.yogs nam yang mdzes ma yin/ /so sor dpag pa la yang ni/ /thams cad sngar bzhin kho na ste/ /ji ltar byas pas ltung ba dang / /ltung ba med pa yang ni grags/ /bdag cag mi rung gnas brjod nas/ /pho nya las
<p>20a.3</p>ni rin mi blang / /legs sbyin chos gos bdag cag rung / /zhal ta pho nya de la brjod/ /de yis gang tshe chos gos rin/ /zhal ta byed la gtad pa na/ /dge slong chos gos don gnyer des/ /lan drug bar du dran par bya/ /der ni mngon par grub na ni/ /der ni blang bar rung ba nyid/ /
<p>20a.4</p>de las lhag par brtson byed na/ /ltung ba'i tshang tshing nang du ltung / /'di la lan drug bskul nas ni/ /rang nyid 'ongs nas ster byed na/ /dge slong gis ni 'di skad brjod/ /bdag gis 'di spangs dgos pa med/ /de lta na yang gal te de/ /shin tu phyag sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /ster na
<p>20a.5</p>dge slong len pa la/ /ltung ba med par gsungs pa yin/ /bud med dang ni rgyal srid la/ /dbang bskur gyur tam bram ze'am/ /rgyal po'i gnang chen pa la gtogs/ /blon po'am dmag dpon la sogs 'dod/ /'dug sa tshong khang chu gnas dang / /'bod gnas dang ni khyim gnas so/ /
<p>20a.6</p>tshong khang gang du nyo tshong byed/ /chu gnas chu snod sbed pa'i sa/ /'bod gnas 'breg mkhan dag dang ni/ /rdza mkhan la sogs ming can gyi'o/ /khyim gnas khyim du rab brjod pa/ /'di dag 'bod gnas bzhir gsungs so/ /tshur spyon legs par byon nam khyod/ /gdan 'di la yang
<p>20a.7</p>bzhugs nas ni/ /phyag zhabs legs par bkra ba dang / /bza' dang btung ba dgyes bzhin gsol/ /lan drug bskul ba'i sgo der yang / /ma thogs par ni rjod byed na/ /ltung med thogs nas rjod byed pa/ /ltung bar 'gyur ba kho na'o/ /gal te pho nya mi ma yin/ /sbyin bdag dang
<p>20b</p>
<p>20b.1</p>ni gnyis pa'ang / /sdom brtson nyer byas gsum gyi ni/ /dbyug pa rnams kyis mgo bo 'joms/ /sbyin bdag mi yin pho nya dang / /zhal ta ba ni mi min na/ /nyes byas gnyis so zhal ta tsam/ /mi ma yin na nyes byas gcig /gang du sbyin bdag pho nya dang / /zhal ta pa yang mi yin na/ /
<p>20b.2</p>de ni nges par ltung byed bskyed/ /khrims ldan ngan song gsum du 'phen/ /dge slong gang zhig phan byed pas/ /dge slong gang la chos gos bskur/ /de nyid la ni yid brtan pas/ /yongs su spyod pa nyes pa med/ /gang der shi na chos gos ni/ /gsal por de yi 'gyur ba yin/ /ma
<p>20b.3</p>thob pa las spang ba dag /gnyis ka la yang med pa ste/ /snga mas yongs su btang ba dang / /gzhan gyis bdag gir de ma byas/ /de la zhag bcu 'das na yang / /gnyi ga la yang ltung ba med/ /gang yang dge slong srin bal gyis/ /gsar pa'i stan dag byed na ni/ /de la ltung ba'o de yang
<p>20b.4</p>gnyis/ /g.yogs pa dang ni blings pa'o/ /byin par gyur dang de bzhin du/ /longs spyad pa la nyes med do/ /sbyin bdag bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir/ /dge slong gis ni blang bar bya/ /lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gis/ /gsar pa'i stan ni mi bya ste/ /de tshol ba yi sdug bsngal
<p>20b.5</p>gyis/ /klog dang kha don nyams par byed/ /dkar nag dang ni 'khob bal gyi/ /cha gnyis cha gcig bsres nas ni/ /blings pa nges par byed na ni/ /stan des ltung ba med pa yin/ /nag po rang bzhin gyis gnag nyid/ /mgrin pa rgyab dang glo gnyis dkar/ /spyi bo lto dang tshe'u
<p>20b.6</p>'gab/ /'khob bal dkar nag zhes su brjod/ /dkar nag 'khob pa la dkar po ni/ /srang phyed tsam gyis nyung ba zhig /byas nas gsar pa rtsom byed na/ /de la ltung bar the tshom med/ /de las gzhan pa ma rnyed na/ /nag pos kyang ni bya ba yin/ /gzhan las rab tu thob
<p>20b.7</p>pa ni/ /ci bde bar yang yongs su spyod/ /lo drug bar du nan tan gyis/ /byas pa'i stan de bcang bar bya/ /lo drug tshu rol de byas ltung / /nyes med tshogs kyis gnang ba yin/ /lo gcig la yang gnyis pa dag /gal te dge slong rtsom byed na/ /rtsom la nyes byas gcig yin te/ /
<p>21a</p>
<p>21a.1</p>yongs su rdzogs la dngos gzhir gzhag /de bzhin gnyis gsum bzhi dang lngar/ /brtsams pa la yang nyes byas 'thob/ /lo drug bar du zhugs gyur nas/ /rtsom pa la ni nyes pa med/ /gding ba gsar pa byed pa na/ /rnying pa la yang nges par mtha'/ /
<p>21a.2</p>kha dog ngan par byed 'dod pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang glan/ /gal te mtho gang tshad de las/ /bsams bzhin cung zad tsam spyod kyang / /de skabs ltung ba'i dbyug pa yis/ /mgo bo gcog par byed pa yin/ /gal te shin tu zegs pa'am/ /spyad mi bzod cing
<p>21a.3</p>dengs pa na/ /de tsam nyid dam chung ba gang / /glon pa la ni nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson rang gis bal dag ni/ /dpag tshad gsum las lhag mi 'khur/ /nyung du zhwa la sogs pa'i phyir/ /mngon par khyer yang nyes pa med/ /grong las rgyang grags phyed du yang / /sdom
<p>21a.4</p>brtson khur na nyes byas te/ /grong khyer nas ni grong khyer du/ /rgyang grags gcig khur ltung ba yin/ /dge slong gang zhig dge slong ma/ /nye du min la bal dag ni/ /rmel ba la sogs byed 'jug na/ /de yang bslab las nyams ldan 'gyur/ /rmel ba la sogs re res kyang / /mtha'
<p>21a.5</p>dag gis kyang kun nas bskyed/ /sdom brtson ltung ba dang bcas na/ /nyes byed bzhin du 'og tu 'gro/ /bcom ldan brtse bas dge slong dag /sa le sbram len bkag pa yin/ /chos gos lam rgyags nad pa yi/ /sman gyi rgyur ni ma gtogs so/ /gser dngul mu tig nor bu dang / /
<p>21a.6</p>mu sal gar b+ha g.yas su 'khyil/ /dmar dang shang ka she la dang / /byi ru la sogs reg na ltung / /thub pa'i dge slong don nyung dang / /bya ba nyung ba mdzes pa ste/ /mang pos dben pa dang ni dga'/ /nyung du tsam zhig bcad bar bya/ /sdom brtson gang zhig nor ldan pas/ /skyed kyi don
<p>21a.7</p>du gtong byed na/ /skyed thob ltung ba'i rdo rje yis/ /bdag nyid 'joms par byed pa yin/ /sbyor ba dang ni rab sbyor dang / /bsgrub dang brje ba de bzhin de/ /byed pa mi byed zhes bya dang / /mngon mtshan can gyi rnam pa bzhi/ /shing rta la sogs snod 'grems shing / /yul phyogs zong ni 'dri
<p>21b</p>
<p>21b.1</p>byed pa/ /grags po dag ni 'tshol byed pa/ /'di dag sbyor bar 'dod pa yin/ /rab sbyor bdun sde la sogs pa'i/ /skyed phyir nor ni gtong byed pas/ /dbang po gro ga snag tsha dang / /smyu gu tshol ba dag la 'dod/ /'dod pas rnyed la chags pa yi/ /nyis 'gyur la sogs spel ba'i phyir/ /
<p>21b.2</p>gro ga la sogs sgrub byed pa/ /de ni bsgrub par gsungs pa yin/ /nor bu mu tig byi ru sogs/ /rdzas rnams yongs su brje ba na/ /snag tsha gro ga la sogs tshol/ /de ni brje bar yongs su grags/ /skyed ma thob kyi bar du 'dir/ /nyes byas dri mar yongs su grags/ /gang tshe
<p>21b.3</p>skyed thob de nyid tshe/ /gsal por ltung ba nyid du grags/ /byed pa mngon mtshan can la sogs/ /gtong bar brjod do mi byed pa/ /slar yang gser sogs mi gtong ba'o/ /cho ga 'di yang sngar bzhin te/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni/ /rnyed pa 'dod pas sbyor ba dag /'jig
<p>21b.4</p>rten spyod pas gzhan min brtag /rigs ldan zhal ta la rung ste/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal po'i 'khor/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi drung du ni/ /nam yang sbyor ba mi bya'o/ /'di dag rnams las rnyed med dam/ /'on te dka' bas rnyed kyang rung / /khyer nas mi ster gta' mi blang / /khyer
<p>21b.5</p>yang ster nus de lta min/ /nyo byed shes rab can med na/ /gang nyo 'dod pa'i dge slong gis/ /rdzas rnams rjes su brtags nas ni/ /nges par lan gsum bar du brjod/ /rnyed pa'i don du mi btsong zhing / /nam yang nyo na ltung ba nyid/ /dgos pa rjes 'brel dor byas pas/ /
<p>21b.6</p>nyo tshong la ni nyes med de/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun phyir/ /'jig rten chos lugs rjes 'brang ba'i/ /zhal ta pa yis nyo tshong bya/ /gzhan du gzhan gyi ma yin no/ /mchod phyir gus pas rtag tu ni/ /gtsug lag khang du tshong byed na/ /de la skyed dang bcas sbyin te/ /sbyin
<p>21b.7</p>bdag dad pa skyed phyir ro/ /so ba til dang mud ga sogs/ /srog chags dang bcas ma brtags pa/ /bsil grib kyi ni sa phyogs su/ /de ni rab tu bkram ste bzhag /de lta na yang de nas de/ /gal te bral bar ma gyur na/ /de tshe slar yang gnas khang du/ /bzhag nas sgo
<p>22a</p>
<p>22a.1</p>ni rtag tu bsdams/ /zhag bcu las 'das lhung bzed ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bcang mi bya/ /lcags dang sa las byas rang bzhin/ /lhung bzed rnam pa gnyis su brjod/ /tshad ldan chung ngam chen po ni/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i don phyir yang / /
<p>22a.2</p>mang po yin na yang ni rung / /'chang ba la ni smad pa med/ /lhan pa gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhis/ /lhung bzed gzhan dag bslang mi rung / /dge ba'i sems kyis bag yod par/ /rin gyis nyos la nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson mi brtan ldan pas ni/ /lhung bzed bug rdol
<p>22a.3</p>glan mi bya/ /rgya skyegs tshig ma tshon mo steng / /sbra tshil bu ram sas ma yin/ /brtan po lhan rings gang brjod dang / /bye ma yang na lhan pa nyid/ /tham phran dang ni lhan thabs nyid/ /de bzhin chu srin so yang ngo / /chos kyis yongs su brje ba la/ /nyes pa med do gzhan du
<p>22a.4</p>slar/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /thob pa na ni spang bar 'gyur/ /grub na dge bas lhung bzed de/ /dge 'dun la ni brim par bya/ /de yang lhung bzed tha ma ni/ /de yi lung bzhin du ni bcong / /bre chung do zan tshod mar bcas/ /blugs nas bzhag pa de la ni/ /lag
<p>22a.5</p>pas bkan tshe mi reg pa/ /de ni chen po'i tshad du brjod/ /bre chung gang zan tshod mar bcas/ /shong ba chung ngur rab tu grags/ /'di dag gnyis kyi bar dag ni/ /'bring por brjod de lhung bzed gsum/ /gang zhig lhung bzed gas dang rdol/ /de ni gus pas glan par bya/ /de byed pa
<p>22a.6</p>yang tshog chas kyang / /dge 'dun gnas khang gzhag par bya/ /'gro na lhung bzed bcas yin te/ /gal te lhung bzed med nyid dam/ /gzhan du rkun pos 'jigs pa'am/ /slar log 'dod pa yin na rung / /thags mkhan nye du ma yin la/ /gla rngan med par 'thag 'jug na/ /
