<p>22a.7</p>ltung bcas ltung ba med pa ni/ /nye du yin nam gla byin na'o/ /nges par dge slong ched du ni/ /khyim bdag chos gos 'thag 'jug na/ /de yis der song thags mkhan la/ /snyan tshig bsngags te grub na ltung / /zheng che thar tshags bzang sogs don/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni 'dod mi
<p>22b</p>
<p>22b.1</p>bskyed/ /de ltar byed na sdom brtson la/ /thob pa'i tshe na spang bar 'gyur/ /zheng che ba ni tshad chen te/ /mnyen 'gyur 'jam po zhes bya'o/ /thar gyis zhag pa 'jur mdud med/ /tshags thar bzang ba dam pa yin/ /bsod snyoms kyang ni 'dir shes bya/ /bza' sogs lha yi rigs las
<p>22b.2</p>byung / /ston mo lha yi rigs dag ni/ /de yi rgyags su rnam par shes/ /chos gos dge slong la byin nas/ /gzhan du khro dang chags pa yis/ /de phrogs na ni nyes byas te/ /phan par 'dod pas nyes med do/ /lus kyi rab g.yo lus kyis ni/ /byed pa'o ngag gi g.yo ba yang / /brjod
<p>22b.3</p>pa yis ni 'phrog byed na/ /gnyis sam gcig gis kyang ni rung / /ji srid chos gos gra yang ni/ /lus dang bral bar ma gyur pa/ /de srid nyes byas tsam yin te/ /bral na spang ba'i ltung ba yin/ /dbyar ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa nyid/ /rab tu 'gyed par byed na ni/ /nyes byas 'di ni 'das
<p>22b.4</p>nas sam/ /de ma yin la ma yin no/ /dbyar gang bdag gir byed mi 'dod/ /chos gos sbed pa med par ni/ /chos gos gtad pa las byung ba'am/ /dbyig la sogs pa rung ba yin/ /'chi phyir dang ni 'chi bas gtad/ /nad pas nad pa nyid phyir ro/ /'gro bar chas pas gang
<p>22b.5</p>byin pa/ /'di dag gtad pa las byung lnga/ /mtha' yi zhag bcu'i nang du ni/ /bgos kyang rung ba nyid yin te/ /sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par ni/ /nam yang bcangs na dngos gzhi'o/ /chos gos byin pa'i dus gang ni/ /mkhas pas yang dag bstan pa 'dir/ /dgag dbye bya ba'i
<p>22b.6</p>nang rol du/ /zhag bcu'o de las lhag pa min/ /'dir bdag rang gi lag nyid kyis/ /rab tu dbul zhes sbyin bdag la/ /gal te 'jog par byed na ni/ /nam yang dge slong skyon yod min/ /dgag dbye'i dus kyi rnyed pa gang / /thams cad dbyar gnas gang de dbang / /gang zhig
<p>22b.7</p>dbyar gnas ma bcas pa'am/ /gang dang lhan cig dgag dbye byas/ /'jigs bcas dgon par gnas pa yis/ /chos gos gsum po dag las ni/ /gcig ni khyim du bzhag bya ste/ /bag yod dge ba 'dod pas so/ /dgos pa'i ched du gzhan du ni/ /zhag drug 'das kyang
<p>23a</p>
<p>23a.1</p>nyes med de/ /der yang mtshams gcig chos gos kyis/ /bdun pa'i skya rengs shar na ltung / /dbyar gyi nang du zla shol thob/ /dbyar gnas phyi mar rab tu grags/ /'jigs bcas zhes brjod gang du 'dir/ /nges par rkun po'i 'jigs bcas 'dod/ /seng ge
<p>23a.2</p>stag sogs 'jigs pa ni/ /dogs bcas 'dod par shes par bya/ /sha sbrang la sogs 'jigs pa dag /'jigs pa tha dad yin par gsungs/ /so ga'i zla ba lhag ma la/ /khrus don lus rab sba ba'i phyir/ /dbyar gos ras chen ming can gyi/ /chos gos brtul zhugs
<p>23a.3</p>can gyis btsal/ /'di ni dbyar zla gsum dag las/ /zla phyed bar du bcang bya ste/ /snga bar tshol lam lhag par ni/ /'chang ba la yang ltung bar 'dod/ /dgag dbye'i dus kyi gos bzang ba/ /sra brkyang gding ba'i don du ni/ /tshogs la gsol ba sngon 'gro bas/ /las byed
<p>23a.4</p>pa la yang dag bsgo/ /tshogs kyis yang dag gnang nas ni/ /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis gus byed la/ /gsol ba rkyang pa nyid kyis gtang / /de yis ji ltar rigs par ni/ /kha bsgyur la sogs byas nas ni/ /song nas tshogs kyi dbus su zhu/ /de nas cho ga bzhin du 'dir/ /
<p>23a.5</p>gding bya sra brkyang bting ba yi/ /dge slong rnams la phan yon mang / /phan bzhed ston pas yang dag gsungs/ /zhag bcu zla ba nges pa dang / /ma brtags par ni 'chang ba dang / /snam sbyar med par grong sogs 'jug /yang yang za ba nyid dang ni/ /'dus shing za ba nyes pa med/ /
<p>23a.6</p>bsgo ba ma byas par yang 'gro/ /smin drug dang ni khra yi bar/ /sra brkyang gding ba dus su gsungs/ /mgu ba spyad dang mgu ba byas/ /spo ba dang ni de las langs/ /dbyar ma rdzogs dang dbyar bral dang / /dbyar ni phyi mar gnas de bzhin/ /lkog tu gyur pa'i dge tshul dang / /bslab
<p>23a.7</p>pa spyod par byed pa ste/ /'di dag la ni phan yon med/ /rnyed pa kho na ma bkag go/ /lta dang tshul khrims dri ma can/ /gang zhig dge 'dun gyis rab spangs/ /chos ma yin pa'i phyogs lhung dang / /de bzhin gzhan du dbyar gnas te/ /lnga po 'di la rnyed pa dang / /phan yon
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>yang ni med par gsungs/ /'dir ni bzang dang mkhas kun la/ /yon tan dang ni rnyed pa yod/ /dge 'dun la bsngos rnyed pa gang / /brtul zhugs can dag dbang byed na/ /spong ba'i ltung byed lcags tshan gyis/ /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /rnyed pa gos dang dbyig
<p>23b.2</p>la sogs/ /bza' ba la sogs zang zing yang / /gnyis ka'ang bsngos par bsgyur ba ni/ /rab tu bkag pa gsungs pa yin/ /tshogs kyi gzhan la gzhan gyi der/ /rnyed pa phan tshun sgyur byed na/ /nyes byas dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dngos gzhi ru ni mi brtag go/ /dge 'dun mthun
<p>23b.3</p>pa nyid kyi ni/ /dge 'dun gzhan la bsngos pa yi/ /rnyed pa bdag gir slong byed na/ /thob pa'i tshe na spong bar 'gyur/ /gang zag sku gzugs mchod rten dang / /dud 'gro rtswa dang nam mkha' la/ /bzhag sogs sa la ka ba ste/ /khang bzangs sogs la nyes byas yin// //
<p>23b.4</p>bam po gsum pa/ dang por byin len byas nas ni/ /mar sogs dge slong byin gyis brlabs/ /rang gis blangs nas spyad bya ste/ /zhag bdun de las lhag par min/ /sdom brtson de don la mkhas pa/ /spang bar 'os pa spangs nas ni/ /de nas ltung de las ldang phyir/ /nub kyis chod nas
<p>23b.5</p>bshags pa bya/ /mkhas pas bskul ba byas nas ni/ /gnyis pa la ni blang bar bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i brtag pa dag /mi byed pa las ltung bar 'gyur/ /ltung ba bcos pa'i don du ni/ /bdag gi don du chos gos sogs/ /cung zad tsam yang de dag gis/ /gzhan las blang bar
<p>23b.6</p>mi bya'o/ /ltung 'di spang bar ma byas na/ /gzhan du grol bar 'gyur ba min/ /spang bar yang ni shes bya la/ /chos gos la sogs spang bar brjod/ /spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu po/ /bslab bya dang bcas bshad nas ni/ /de rjes ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa/ /dgu bcu rab tu gsal bar bya/ /rgyal
<p>23b.7</p>po'i khab tu bcom ldan 'das/ /blta 'dod khyim pa mang rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid gang na zhes/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la dris pa dang / /gzhan na bcom ldan bzhugs bzhin du/ /gzhan du nye bar bstan las bcas/ /de phyir mdo las gsungs pa gang / /ston pas tshigs bcad
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>gnyis 'di gsungs/ /chos gcig las 'das gang yin pa/ /lus can brdzun du smra ba ste/ /'jig rten pha rol spangs pa yin/ /'di yis sdig pa mi bya med/ /lcags gong me lce 'bar ba dag /zos par gyur pa mchog yin gyi/ /tshul 'chal yang dag
<p>24a.2</p>mi sdom pas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms za ba min/ /bslab pa'i gzhi ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /nges par brdzun tshig bkag pa ste/ /lag brgyud smra ba'i khyu mchog nas/ /brtsams te brdzun du smra rnams la/ /shes bzhin du ni brdzun smra ba'i/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed brjod/ /brdzun tshig
<p>24a.3</p>rnam pa dgu yin te/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi bar du brjod/ /sdom brtson dag la drungs 'byin chos/ /phas pham la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /tshul khrims lta ba cho ga dang / /'tsho ba yi ni smra ba dgu/ /mthong sogs rnam pa gsum yin te/ /de dag gis ni smra ba la/ /brdzun tshig rnam pa brgyad
<p>24a.4</p>ces 'dod/ /tshul khrims lta spyod cho ga 'tsho/ /mthong dang thos dang dogs pa yis/ /sdom brtson brdzun du smra ba la/ /gang yang rnam pa bdun nyid brjod/ /smra 'gyur de bzhin smra ba dang / /smras pa zhes bya tshig gsum dang / /mthong ba la sogs tshig gsum ste/ /brdzun du smra ba drug
<p>24a.5</p>tu brjod/ /de ltar re re dor ba yis/ /tshig gis 'dir ni shes bya ba/ /brdzun tshig rab tu shes pa la/ /brjod nas go ba rnam pa gnyis/ /slar yang phas pham la sogs lngas/ /phas pham 'gyur bar shes bya ste/ /phas pham gnas su gang brjod pa'i/ /sngar smras mtha' ni phas
<p>24a.6</p>pham nyid/ /gzhan la nam yang mi bzhed do/ /dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ni/ /bag tsam gyis sam rtsa bas skur/ /chos la chos min la sogs nges/ /gang zhig dge 'dun dbus smra na/ /de la sbom por 'gyur ba yi/ /brdzun tshig ces ni rnam par gzhag /gso sbyong dus
<p>24a.7</p>kyi las dag la/ /'di la dag gam zhes brjod tshe/ /kha rog nyes pa sbed byed na/ /nyes byas dri mar 'gyur bar brjod/ /de ltar de dag gang bstan pa/ /brdzun gyi tshig ni rnam pa bzhis/ /de las gzhan pa ltung byed du/ /'gyur ba'i brdzun tshig ces byar bstan/ /ma mthong sogs
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>la mthong sogs dang / /mthong sogs la'ang de las bzlog /shes bzhin du ni smra byed na/ /don rig pa na ltung byed 'dod/ /dud 'gro la yang rwa chag sogs/ /skyon nas tshig tu smras pa na/ /sems zhum las byed mi brtson na/ /shes ldan mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /de phyir
<p>24b.2</p>sems can thams cad la/ /phan bzhed bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag /mi rnams la ni skyon brjod pas/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed yin/ /skyon brjod bsam pa'i dge slong gis/ /khyod ni bram ze rab byung zhes/ /bram ze la ni rigs dris na/ /de la nyes byas ltung bar 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i
<p>24b.3</p>sems kyis rgyal rigs la'ang / /smra byed nyes byas kho na ste/ /de bzhin rje rigs dmangs dag la/ /smra byed sdom brtson ltung byed yin/ /thags mkhan lha rten lha mkhan dang / /shing mkhan tshem bu smyig ma mkhan/ /de la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyis/ /yongs su smra na ltung byed
<p>24b.4</p>brjod/ /rdza mkhan dang ni mgar ba dang / /bran dang ko lpags mkhan dang ni/ /bya shor nya ba rngon pa dang / /gtum po sogs brjod nyams par 'gyur/ /khyod ni bram ze yin te de'i/ /rigs kyi bya ba gtsang sbra sogs/ /bslab bya khyod la dge slong gis/ /ci bya zhe na'ang nyes byas nyid/ /khyod
<p>24b.5</p>ni rgyal rigs khyod kyi las/ /mtshon cha'i rigs pa mdung dang ni/ /mda' sogs slobs shig ces smra na/ /gang yin de la nyes byas so/ /de bzhin rje rigs dmangs rigs kyi/ /las la nges par sbyar yang ngo / /thags mkhan smyig ma mkhan sogs la/ /ltung byed kyi ni ltung bar brjod/ /
<p>24b.6</p>mchod sbyin dang ni gdol ba sogs/ /khyod kyis rang las byos shig ces/ /smra yang mi mkhas de dag la/ /snga ma bzhin du nyes byas yin/ /'thang po zhar ba lag rdum dang / /sgur po mi thung long dang 'on//zhes smra na yang ltung byed kyi/ /me yi nang du sreg pa 'thob/ /khyod ni mdze can
<p>24b.7</p>khrag nad skyug /nyam chung g.yan pa 'og grol dang / /de la sogs brjod ngan tshig rnams/ /sdom brtson la ni ltung byed 'dod/ /khyod ni ma dag lhung bas bcom/ /gdug pa dang bcas 'gyod pa can/ /khyod ni khro bas sems bsregs pa/ /zhes smras sogs la'ang de nyid do/ /
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>dge slong skyon brjod bsam pa yis/ /bong bu sogs kyis gshe byed cing / /rgya gad la sogs kun ldang bas/ /spyo na ltung byed kyis reg 'gyur/ /de ltar rigs dang bzo dang ni/ /las rnams dang ni rtags dang nad/ /ltung dang khro ba la sogs pa'i/ /tshig gis
<p>25a.2</p>smra bar mi bya'o/ /the tshom bsal ba'i don du ni/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni gang yin pa/ /rgyal rigs las gang rab byung ba/ /zhes sogs smra la nyes pa med/ /dge slong phra ma smra na yang / /ltung ba 'di nyid yang dag ldan/ /phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir/ /nyon mongs can gyi tshig yin
<p>25a.3</p>te/ /dper na 'breg mkhan gyol po khyod/ /de skad su zhig smra zhe na/ /smras pa dga' byed kyis smra zhes/ /'di ni phyogs tsam bstan pa ste/ /'dir yang thams cad snga ma bzhin/ /rigs dang bzo sogs smras pa las/ /nyes byas la sogs shes bya ste/ /blo ldan gyis ni spang bar bya/ /
<p>25a.4</p>dge 'dun mchog gcig pa yis ni/ /gang zhig mthun par gyur pa na/ /las la skyo sngogs byed pa des/ /zad byed ltung ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchog gcig bsam pa gcig pa yis/ /chos bzhin cho ga bzhin du ni/ /'gyed pa la sogs rnam bzhi yi/ /dbang byas bstan pa
<p>25a.5</p>de dag gi /las la skyo sngogs zhes bya ba/ /'di la legs zhes brjod pa yi/ /rdzogs na the tshom gyis kyang ni/ /skyo sngogs byed na ltung bar bcas/ /byas sam 'on te ma byas zhes/ /the tshom gyis kyang skyo sngogs na/ /nyes byas 'gyur te de la ni/ /cig shos min zhes mkhas pas
<p>25a.6</p>gsungs/ /gzhan dag gi ni dbang byas la/ /gzhan gyi dbang byas 'du shes sam/ /rdzogs la ma rdzogs zhes pa la/ /ltung ba'i tshul ni sngar bzhin no/ /gnyug mar gnas dang las byed dang / /'dun pa phul dang lta ba smra/ /glo bur ba ste 'di dag ni/ /gang zag lnga zhes yongs su
<p>25a.7</p>grags/ /thog mtha' dbus su gang rig de/ /gnyug mar gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /las kyi dbang du byas pa las/ /gang zhig de byed de las byed/ /der ni gang zhig 'dun pa phul/ /de ni 'dun pa phul ba'o/ /lta ba smra ba zhes bya gang / /gang dag dge 'dun dbus su ni/ /zhu tshe
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>bdag gis 'di ltar mthong / /'di ltar min zhes smra ba'o/ /thog mtha' dbus su mi shes pa/ /de ni glo bur 'ongs par 'dod/ /dang po rnam pa gsum po yis/ /las la rtsod na ltung byed de/ /dam pa'i las la rtsod pa la/ /tha ma gnyis kyis nyes byas so/ /tshig lnga'am drug las
<p>25b.2</p>phar lhag par/ /rig pa'i skyes pa med par ni/ /bud med dag la chos ston na/ /ltung byed skyon du 'gyur ba yin/ /mtha' dag gzugs ni mi rtag cing / /de bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam par shes/ /mkhas pas tshig lngar nges rtogs bya/ /mig dang rna ba sna
<p>25b.3</p>dang lce/ /lus dang yid kyang mi rtag ces/ /tshig drug brjod pa 'di yin par/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /tshig lnga bstan par bya'o zhes/ /shes bzhin tshig drug rjod byed na/ /ltung ba'o de bzhin drug pa yang / /bdun pa rjes su ston na'o/ /'brel med smra ba nyes
<p>25b.4</p>med de/ /shin tu smra ba myur yang ngo / /dris lan mkhan gyi bud med ni/ /rigs ldan la ston nyes pa med/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang tshig /mnyam por chos brjod pa las ltung / /rjes su 'brang la nyes med de/ /'don dang kha ton sbyong ba la'ang / /gnas ngan len dang ldan
<p>25b.5</p>pa'i tshig /tshogs kyis gnad med brjod mi bya/ /de yang phas pham pa dang ni/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i gnas ngan len/ /yang dag bla mar gyur pa'i chos/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs gang zag la/ /sdom brtson gang zhig smra byed na/ /'di la yang ni ltung byed 'gyur/ /'dir ni sgrib pa rnam
<p>25b.6</p>pa lnga/ /mi rnams kyi ni chos su thos/ /de zad bla ma'i chos su 'dod/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bla ma'o/ /ma gnang bar ni dge 'dun gyi/ /gang zag dag la ster byed ces/ /byin nas rtsod pa rtsom na ni/ /sdom brtson de yang zad ltung 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed phyed gso sbyong dus/ /so sor thar
<p>25b.7</p>pa 'don pa'i tshe/ /gang zhig khyad gsod de la yang / /zad byed ltung bar 'dod pa yin/ /phra zhing phra ba 'di dag 'dir/ /nyer bstan dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /gang dag nyon mongs dbang gis ni/ /bslab pa khyad gsod 'di skad smra/ /rtsis kyi phyir dang khyad gsod phyir/ /bsreg phyir yongs
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>su gdung ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin rma 'gegs don du zhes/ /tshig 'dir re res zad pa ste/ /phran tshegs lung sogs las gsungs pa/ /ji srid 'dul ba dang 'brel bas/ /der ni dge slong khyad gsod na/ /de nyid ltung ba dang bcas 'gyur/ /dge slong rang ngam
<p>26a.2</p>gzhan gyis kyang / /sa bon tshogs ni ma lus dang / /'byung po'i gnas ni 'jig byed na/ /gsal por ltung byed du ni 'dod/ /gang zhig rtsa ba'i ngo bor skye/ /de ni rtsa ba'i sa bon te/ /yungs dang sge'u gsher gla sgang sogs/ /sdong bu'i sa bon de yang ni/ /sa gang la ni legs
<p>26a.3</p>btsugs pas/ /slar yang sdong bu skye ba ste/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang u dum bAr/ /a shod ka ra bI ra sogs/ /gang zhig bcad pa'i rtse mo yang / /'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ba gang / /ka shi bur shing 'dam bu smyig/ /de dag thog dgu'i ming can yin/ /bkas pas skye ba bkas pa
<p>26a.4</p>yin/ /sa bon ji lta bu zhe na/ /a dza ka dang sam bu dang / /dzam b+ha ri dang yan dzi ka /sa bon sa bon til mud ga /gang gzhan de 'dra'i sa bon yang / /'byung po'i sgra gcan sems can gyi/ /rigs kun la ni nges par brjod/ /'bu srin phye ma leb la sogs/ /de yi gnas
<p>26a.5</p>ni shing sogs grags/ /de la der 'du shes pas sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang gcod na'o/ /de ltar sa bon rtswa sngon dag /de 'joms na ni ltung bar 'dod/ /sa bon gzhan la gzhan 'du shes/ /the tshom gyis kyang ltung bar 'dod/ /gtun du sa bon rnam pa lnga/ /blugs nas nyams par
<p>26a.6</p>bya'o zhes/ /dge slong lhur len nyams na ni/ /ltung byed lnga nyid 'dod pa yin/ /ma nyams na ni de dag la/ /nyes byas kyang ni rnam pa lnga/ /mer 'jug na yang tshul de nyid/ /khu tshan la sogs par yang rung / /sems de lta bus rtswa sngon la/ /'chag par byed pa dag kyang ngo / /nyams
<p>26a.7</p>na dge slong ltung byed de/ /ma nyams na ni nyes byas so/ /shing dang re lde la sogs pa/ /sngo sar la ni 'drud pa dang / /khu tshan thug pa la sogs pa/ /'bod pa la yang 'dod pa yin/ /sbyor ba gcig nyid kyis kyang 'dir/ /shing gcig gcod par byed pa na/ /de la nyes
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>byas gcig dang ni/ /zad byed ltung byed gcig yin no/ /sbyor ba yang ni gnyis dag gis/ /sdom brtson shing sogs gcig gcod na/ /nyes byas gnyis dang ltung byed gcig /de ltar sbyor ba ji snyed pa/ /de snyed du ni nyes byas 'dod/ /rdzas kyi tshad kyi dbye ba yis/ /zad byed
<p>26b.2</p>ltung byed tha dad 'dod/ /'dab sngon me tog 'bras bu dang / /kha 'bus pa dang rtsa ba nyid/ /sdong bu dang ni chu ba gcod/ /nya lcibs 'don yang ltung byed nyid/ /shun pa dang ni 'dab skya dang / /mtsho skyes dag ni rgyas pa nyid/ /gcod pa la ni nyes byas gsungs/ /'di dag mdor
<p>26b.3</p>bsdus tshul yin no/ /so shing rtsa ba shun pa dang / /'dab ma me tog sogs 'dod na/ /bslang bya ri las chod dang shogs/ /zhes sogs tshig ni spangs nas so/ /sbrang tshad dang ni sha bal nyid/ /sha mo 'bu srin tshang de bzhin/ /bya tshang dang ni sbed sha dang / /pa rgya yang ni dbyung mi bya/ /
<p>26b.4</p>rung bas gcod dang 'don pa la/ /thams cad du yang nyes spyod min/ /'di dag shes par gyis shig ces/ /brjod na 'di ni rung ba yin/ /gsar pa'i las la las byed kyis/ /shing gi lha la gsol btab cing / /gtor ma me tog la sogs pas/ /cho ga bzhin du
<p>26b.5</p>mchod nas bya/ /rgyud chags gsum pa 'don byas nas/ /dam chos nyan pa sbyin byas ste/ /de la las lam bcu po ni/ /dge dang mi dge brjod par bya/ /dge bas 'bras bu bde ster te/ /cig shos kyis ni ngan song yin/ /ser sna'i skyon dang bcas dag la/ /
<p>26b.6</p>sbyin pa'i yon tan legs brjod bya/ /gang zhig dga' tshal la sogs su/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang lha rnams kyis/ /rtsed 'jo yun rings bde myong ba/ /de ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bur gsungs/ /bkres dang skom sogs me dag gis/ /lus ring lce mgrin skams pa yi/ /skal
<p>26b.7</p>ngan 'khor byed yi dwags gang / /mi yi gzugs 'dra sdug bsngal can/ /de ni thog med srid pa yi/ /bag chags kun khyab mthu ldan pas/ /mchog tu don med 'gyur ba ste/ /ser sna'i 'tshe ba yin par 'dod/ /khrag 'jag pa la sogs pa yis/ /zhag bdun rnam 'gyur mi ston na/ /
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>tshul 'di legs par rig nas ni/ /shing chen gcod pa la sogs bya/ /dge slong la ni 'phya ba dang / /gzhogs 'phyas kyang ni rnam pa mang / /byed na'ang ltung ba sngar ji bzhin/ /'dir yang ltung ba kho nar brjod//'di dag 'phya ba nyid dbang byas/ /dge slong
<p>27a.2</p>gzhogs 'phyas mkhan yang 'dir/ /gsol ba'i las ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dge 'dun gyis gang bskos pa yi/ /gus pas las ni nges ldan pa/ /de la dge slong gang zhig 'phya/ /khro sems ldan na ltung byed do/ /cig shos nyid ni nyes byas nyid/ /gtsug lag khang gtong zas dang
<p>27a.3</p>ni/ /'o thug 'bras bu 'gyed pa dang / /phyi de nyin par yang ni rung / /phran tshegs dag ni 'drim pa dang / /snod spyad 'drub dang sra brkyang gi /chos gos dag ni sbed pa dang / /chos gos rnams ni 'gyed pa dang / /dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang / /khang skyong de yi mngag gzhug dang / /
<p>27a.4</p>de bzhin sder spyad zhal ta ba/ /rtsod pa 'gegs dang chu 'drim dang / /bya rog la sogs skrod pa dang / /mal stan 'dug stan stobs pa dang / /zas 'dun 'jig rten bzlog pa dang / /gsol dang gnyis kyi las gang yin/ /'di dag dge 'dun gyis ni bsko/ /gang phyir dang po bcu
<p>27a.5</p>gnyis la/ /'phya dang gzhogs 'phyas gyis ltung 'gyur/ /gzhogs 'phyas brtse ba med pa'i tshig /'phya ba pha rol la smod pa'o/ /bsgo ba rna gzon ltung ba'o/ /bsgo ba zhes bya dri bar brjod/ /rna la gzon pa ngan song [(]kyis[,]gis[)]/ /nges pas lan gzhan smra ba'o/ /gzhan dris pa
<p>27a.6</p>na gzhan du ni/ /gzhan gdung bya phyir smra yang yin/ /gzhan du gsang bya'i gang zag ni/ /dgra bos dris tshe 'di skad du/ /nam mkha' 'am sor mo bdag mthong gi /dam pa'i don du sems can min/ /zhes ni kha nas bslu tshig dag /brjod pa la ni bkag pa med/ /rna la gzon
<p>27a.7</p>pa'i bsam pa yis/ /dris tshe sdom brtson mi smra 'dug /nyes byas kyis ni ngan song du/ /sdug bsngal mthar ni smra bar 'dod/ /dge 'dun mal stan khri'u sogs/ /bla gab med par bor nas kyang / /gzhan la ma bcol bar yang ni/ /'gro na zad byed ltung ba 'thob/ /brtul
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>zhugs can ni 'gro ba na/ /ji srid khri'u la sogs pa'i/ /phyi yi mtshams ni ma 'das pa/ /de srid du ni nyes byas so/ /slar log tshe na ma nyams na/ /nyes byas dang ni ldan 'gyur te/ /ji ste phan tshun gyur na ni/ /de la zad byed ltung byed do/ /me dang rlung dang char pa yi/ /dbye
<p>27b.2</p>bas phan tshun gsum du gsungs/ /rim pa gnyis par tshig na ni/ /me yi phan tshun zhes bya'o/ /rim pa gnyis dag bzlog na ni/ /rlung gi phan phun nyid ces bya/ /char pa zhes bya char chu yis/ /rim pa gnyis par phigs na yin/ /gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa na/ /
<p>27b.3</p>me la sogs pa'i phan phun la/ /nyes byas la sogs rnam gzhan dag /snga ma bzhin du yang dag bshad/ /lam du rab zhugs de lta'i gzhi/ /gal te dran par gyur na de'i/ /mod la byis pa'i rang bzhin zhes/ /bdag nyid la ni yang dag smad/ /de yis ji srid dge slong
<p>27b.4</p>gzhan/ /mthong nas nye bar song nas ni/ /gnas mal mal stan sba ba'i phyir/ /gus pa sngon 'gros gsol ba gdab/ /gal te de yis thos nas kyang / /de dag sba btul mi byed na/ /de yang ltung byed mda' yis ni/ /phog pa'i sdug bsngal nyams myong 'gyur/ /khyim
<p>27b.5</p>pas mgron du bos pa'i tshe/ /'dug stan la sogs g.yar ba na/ /de tshul dag gam khyim pa yis/ /bkur bar bya yis rang gis min/ /gtsug lag khang du khyim pa dag /zan za'i tshe na rdzogs kyi bar/ /'dug stan sbyin bya de dag la/ /rang don ma nyams pa yis bsrung / /
<p>27b.6</p>nad pa dang ni nad g.yogs dag /rgan por gyur dang tshul khrims 'chal/ /nad bcas bsnyen par ma rdzogs la/ /nam yang yid brtan mi bya'o/ /stan gcig la ni 'dug pa na/ /gsar bus de dag brtul bya zhing / /gnyi ga gsar bu yin na ni/ /stan gang phyi nas dong pas
<p>27b.7</p>yin/ /dam pa'i chos nyan la sogs dus/ /gnas brtan mkhrang mi tshugs pa yis/ /gang du 'dug der 'dug stan ni/ /gzhag bya 'gyel ba nyid phyir yang / /de phyir mkhyen mchog bcom ldan gyi/ /bsnyen bkur cho ga thams cad ni/ /gnyi ga la yang phan 'dod pas/ /
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>bla ma la brten bya bar gsungs/ /rings pa'i rkyen ni byung ba na/ /rtsig pa'i drung ngam shing drung du//bzhag pa la ni nyes med de/ /glo bur zas ni gcad mi bya/ /gang du song nas mi lta ba'i/ /ji srid chos gos nye 'khor ni/ /sngar gsungs de srid mal
<p>28a.2</p>stan gyi'ang / /shin tu bde ba sgrub byed pa'i/ /rin chen chos ni ston pa na/ /ston pa'i bka' ni mchod byas pas/ /stan mtho mdzes la 'dug par bya/ /gru bzhi rab mnyam bde ba'i stan/ /rgyab rten rkang rten skas dang bcas/ /chun 'phyang bla res legs bkod pa'i/ /seng ge'i
<p>28a.3</p>khri yang bcang bar bya/ /nor yod de tshe rjes gnang phyir/ /'dus byas mi rtag yid ches pas/ /rin chen kun gyis mdzes par ni/ /legs byas de la 'dug bya nyid/ /de ltar yid la byed pa dang / /sbyin bdag la yang phan pa'i phyir/ /sdom brtson rin chen sna tshogs kyis/ /mdzes
<p>28a.4</p>pa'i khri la 'dug par bya/ /gnod sbyin gnas dang klu yi yul/ /lha min lha yul skyon med de/ /gang 'di de dag bsod nams las/ /legs grub phyir zhes thub pas gsungs/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang dag tu/ /sdom brtson rtswa sogs bting nas ni/ /ma bsdus ma bcol
<p>28a.5</p>gyi nar yang / /rkyen med 'gro bar byed na ltung / /mal stan gyi ni rigs pa yis/ /rjes la bstan pa 'di la yang / /'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pas/ /nges par ltung ba nyid du bshad/ /gtsug lag khang du thob pa yang / /chu yi nang du dor nas sam/ /khyim gzhan du yang mi brtul
<p>28a.6</p>lam/ /ci gar ma brtul nyes byas so/ /bsam gtan pa yi 'chag pa'i sa/ /khru ni bco brgyad dag tu bya/ /kha ton pa yi khru bcu gnyis/ /rtsub na par thang la sogs gding / /gzhan du nad bskyed 'gyur ba ste/ /sa gzhi dag tu gding bar bya/ /bag yod shes bzhin dang
<p>28a.7</p>bcas bcag /zla ba phyed cing skyang nul bya/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang nas ni/ /sdang bas dge slong phyir skrod na/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed gsungs/ /de 'dra'i rkyen can ma gtogs so/ /gal te rang min dge slong gzhan/ /sdang bcas skrod du 'jug na yang / /de dag
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>gnyi ga la yang ni/ /ltung byed kho nar gsungs pa yin/ /dge tshul la sogs rnams kyis kyang / /sdom brtson skrod du 'jug byed na/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed de/ /de dag la ni 'gal tshabs can/ /kha zas ngan dang bzang pos sam/ /grang dang dro sogs kyis kyang rung / /
<p>28b.2</p>dge slong la ni tho 'tshams na/ /ltung byed kho nar 'gyur ba yin/ /bsnyen bkur ba dang khrus khang dang / /khang pa'i sgo mo nyid dang ni/ /gnas khang mdzod dang khang bzangs su/ /dge slong nyid la gtad nas ni/ /'dug stan gnas dang gnas mal la/ /dge slong snga nas gnas pa
<p>28b.3</p>la/ /'tshe ba phyis gnon ltung byed yin/ /gtsug lag khang steng gnas su ni//spang leb sogs kyis phub pa la/ /'dug par bya ste khri khang dag /'byung ba la ni ltung byed 'dod/ /de bzhin legs par gnas bcas dang / /rtsa ba 'byung ba zhes bya gang / /gtsug lag khang
<p>28b.4</p>gi steng gi thog /shin tu mkhrang pa ma yin la/ /mnan pas rtsa ba phyir 'byung ba'o/ /rkang rten byas pa nyid dang ni/ /bkan te bzhag nas 'dug pa la/ /'dir ni bkag pa yod min te/ /nyal ba la yang tshul 'di nyid/ /lcags kyi gzer bus bsdams pa dang / /rtsa ba brtan po
<p>28b.5</p>dag la yang / /bal ba dza sogs bcings kyang rung / /phur bu lta bu bkag pa yin/ /srog chags bcas pa'i chu yis ni/ /rtswa shing sogs la 'debs byed dam/ /'debs su 'jug pa nyid kyang rung / /sdom brtson la ni ltung byed yin/ /srog chags bcas la der 'du shes/ /the
<p>28b.6</p>tshom gyis kyang sdom can ltung / /med par 'du shes nyes med de/ /the tshom gyis kyang nyes byas nyid/ /bum pa dpyang thag bcas par ni/ /slong la ster byed nyes pa med/ /rnyog pa ka ta ka sogs kyis/ /dngas par byas te brtag par bya/ /rnyog pa nyid dngas byad bzhin gyi/ /gzugs
<p>28b.7</p>brnyan gang du ltar yod tshang / /de ni 'bad pas btsags nas ni/ /shin tu dag pas chu btung ngo / /khron pa bkod mas rnam dag dang / /zhabs tshags can sogs dam po dang / /dge 'dun dge slong gis dag pa/ /rung ba'i chu lnga yang dag gzung / /ril tshags zhes bya'i
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>rnam pa dang / /de bzhin grol bar byed pa'i ras/ /gru gsum pa dang zhabs tshags te/ /bum tshags gce'u can dang lnga/ /ji srid dag par nges pa'i bar/ /rtse gcig pa yi rgyun du ni/ /'bad pas chu rnams yongs brtag ste/ /'on kyang bla 'og yang
<p>29a.2</p>yang min/ /ma ga d+hA pa'i smyug mas gang / /ba lang drug pa'i shing rta ni/ /yongs su 'khor ba'i dus gang gi/ /tshad der chu de yongs su brtag /snod kyi skyon la sogs pa yis/ /gal te the tshom 'gyod skyes na/ /de ni slar yang brtag bya ste/ /the tshom med par yongs su
<p>29a.3</p>spyad/ /rgyang grags lnga yi bar dag tu/ /song nas phyin pa de na ni/ /grol byed ras la sogs pa yi/ /chu tshags yod pa yin na 'gro/ /slar log pa yi bsam pa yis/ /dpag tshad phyed 'gro nyes med de/ /don mthun la ni yid brtan pas/ /shin tu rgyang ring song yang ngo / /
<p>29a.4</p>chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'gro ba la/ /brtags pa'i chu 'thung nyes pa med/ /chu gzhan dang ni ma 'dres na/ /rgyang grags re rer brtag par bya/ /rgyun las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba yis/ /'jug ngogs re rer brtag par bya/ /chu gzhan dang ni 'dres pa la'ang / /sngar bstan tshul 'di nyid shes
<p>29a.5</p>bya/ /khron pa la sogs chu blangs nas/ /chu de gang gi yin pa dang / /de yi lhag pa'i lha yi phyir/ /bde gshegs kyis gsungs tshigs bcad 'don/ /bum pa'i kha ni bzlog pa yis/ /nam yang chu btung mi bya ste/ /lo ma la sogs ma rnyed na/ /dben par 'thung la nyes pa
<p>29a.6</p>med/ /ril tshags la sogs kha dag ni/ /'dab ma sogs kyis nges par dag ba/ /chu 'thungs de rjes bum pa sogs/ /ma bkab yal dor nyes byas yin/ /bum pa la sogs dri ma ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas bkru bar bya/ /bskam 'os dus na ji srid du/ /rung ba'i don du nye bar
<p>29a.7</p>bskam/ /khyim pas khyim pa nyid la ste/ /dge tshul gyis ni mi rung ngo / /dge slong gis ni khyim pa dang / /dge tshul gzhan la rung ba yin/ /dge slong de yis rnam brtags pa/ /gang phyir khyim pa la yang rung / /dge slong yang dag gnas pas brtag /gzhan du bslab la g.yel
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>bas min/ /khron pa rdzing bu la sogs pa'i/ /chu rnams zas sogs dri ma can/ /the tshom med par btsags nas ni/ /de yis rtog pa de med bya/ /khyim pa rnams kyis khron pa sogs/ /yongs su brtags pas dag pa yin/ /de yi gnas skabs shes nas ni/ /dus ma yin par yang
<p>29b.2</p>ni rung / /ba lang lhas la sogs par ni/ /dge slong song tshe chu med dam/ /nyung na zho ga chu'am ni/ /'o ma sogs kyis rkang bkrur rung / /bshang ba chang dang gci ba yi/ /snod dag rnam par spang bar bya/ /mar khu la sogs pa yi snod/ /me dang chu yis yongs su spyad/ /nya dang rus
<p>29b.3</p>sbal gyis bldags pa'i/ /gsher gyi dri ma spang ba'i phyir/ /rung ba'i chu ni skom pa la/ /dus ma yin par yang ni spyad/ /bud med dag la dge slong gis/ /chu sogs blud par 'dod pa na/ /rgyun gyis sbyin par mi bya ste/ /kun nas chags sems kyis kyang min/ /sgo leb ngos khung
<p>29b.4</p>dag dang ni/ /smad du chu khung btod pa dang / /skar khung 'bab stegs bcas pa yi/ /gtsug lag khang chen bya ba yin/ /char dang rlung ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /steng nas mnan par bya ba ni/ /rtswa bcas 'jim pa'i gong bu dag /gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de las lhag
<p>29b.5</p>par gang 'jog pa/ /nges par ltung byed 'gyur ba yin/ /so phag rdo ba dag gis sam/ /thams cad shing byed nyes pa med/ /tshul khrims ldan dang thos pa 'dzin/ /gnas brtan rgyal tshabs lta bu dang / /phun tshogs tshig ldan lus kyis ni/ /dge slong ma ni sun ma phyung / /chos
<p>29b.6</p>lnga 'di dang ldan pa la/ /dge 'dun gyis ni bskos pa dag /dge slong ma la 'doms pa ste/ /gzhan du ltung ba nyid yin no/ /mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon dang / /'brel ba'i don ni rab ston pa/ /gdams pa yin par 'dren pa yis/ /rtsod pa med par gsungs pa yin/ /
<p>29b.7</p>gnas brtan gyis ni bstan pa'i tshig /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis bzhed pa ni/ /slar yang gdams pa gzhan 'di ni/ /gnyis par yang ni gsungs pa yin/ /dge slong ma yi dge 'dun khyed/ /thams cad yongs su dag gam dri/ /khyed la rjes su ston pa ni/ /dge slong
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>su yang spro ba med/ /ngan song gsum 'gro 'jigs byed pas/ /ji ltar bslabs pa mi 'khrugs pa/ /thub pa'i bstan la rtag tu ni/ bag yod sgrubs shig sring mo rnams/ /gdul bya'i 'gro la rjes brtse bas/ /'dul ba gang de rgyal srid brjod/ /de
<p>30a.2</p>ltar 'di ni legs pa ste/ /dge slong rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /re shig gdams par 'dod pa ni/ /tshul ldan rnams kyis bskos pa yang / /nyi ma 'jig rten pa yi mig /ji srid ma nub bar du'o/ /nub la de ni 'du shes sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang gdams ngag dang / /rjes su ston na
<p>30a.3</p>zad pa yis/ /ltung byed dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ma nub nub par 'du shes sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang nges par ni/ /nyes byas mda' yis phog pa yi/ /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ /sgo 'am sgo dang nye bar yang / /gal te char ni 'bab gyur na/ /shin tu yun rings
<p>30a.4</p>'doms pa la/ /nub nas kyang ni ltung ba med/ /dge slong ma yi mkhas rnams kyi/ /bla ma ci nus bsnyen bkur bya/ /de yi spro dang bsod nams dag /spel phyir bla ma yis kyang spyad/ /phrag dog dri mas bsgos sems kyis/ /de la smod byed dge slong ni/ /ltung bas kun nas
<p>30a.5</p>bslang ba yis/ /dmyal me sbor bar byed pa yin/ /yang na zang zing 'dod pa yi/ /sred pa kho na'i dbang gyur pas/ /gdams pa byed na bden par ni/ /smra byed nyes pa yod ma yin/ /nye du ma yin dge slong ma'i/ /chos gos byed na ltung byed do/ /'di la ster na'ang ltung byed du/ /
<p>30a.6</p>rjes su bstan pa kho na'o/ /dge slong 'gron lam 'gro ba na/ /dge slong ma yi grogs byed bkag /chom rkun la sogs 'jigs bcas pa'i/ /lam du ltung bar mi 'dod do/ /dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma'am/ /dge slong yang ni dge slong mas/ /lam du na na bskur bya
<p>30a.7</p>ste/ /khur byed ye med gyur na'o/ /dge slong ma yis 'ongs pa yi/ /lam rgyags dge slong la ni rung / /dge slong gis 'ong de la yang / /rnam pa kun tu bkag pa med/ /dge slong dge slong ma dang ni/ /lhan cig rgyun dang bzlog phyogs su/ /grung 'jug pa ni bkag pa yin/ /
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>'jigs bcas thad 'gro nyes pa med/ /dben par bud med gcig dang ni/ /dge slong gcig pu lhan cig tu/ /'dug pas gnas par mi bya ste/ /khyad par dge slong ma dang 'greng / /dge slong gi ni zang zing zas/ /dge slong ma yi sbyor bcug pa/ /sngar ni mgron du gnyer ba yis/ /
<p>30b.2</p>yongs su spyod la nyes pa med/ /sgrub pa dang ni thos pa yis/ /sbyor bcug pa ni rnam pa gnyis/ /sgrub pa rgyun du zhugs pa nas/ /ji srid dgra bcom gyur gyi bar/ /thos pa mdo sde 'dul ba dang / /ma mo 'dzin pa nyid kyang ste/ /de nyid bden pa yin na ni/ /yongs su spyad kyang nyes
<p>30b.3</p>pa med/ /mi bden yon tan smra ba yis/ /rnyed pa sbyor bcug zos na ltung / /nad dang chos gos las dang lam/ /dus ma gtogs par sdom brtson ni/ /zas ni gzhan du 'dod pa yis/ /yang yang za na ltung byed yin/ /lan cig zos pas mi 'tsho ba/ /de ni nad pa zhes
<p>30b.4</p>bya'o/ /yul bzhir gru gang tsam gyis kyang / /chos gos kyi ni dus su 'dod/ /gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten la/ /tha na re lde tsam yang rung / /byug gam kun nas snyoms byed na/ /las byed dus su brjod pa yin/ /dpag tshad phyed du song nas ni/ /sdom brtson slar
<p>30b.5</p>yang log pa na/ /de ni lam dus shes bya ste/ /yang yang za la nyes pa med/ /chos gos bcas par rjes gnang bas/ /chos gos med par khas mi blang / /phyi ma'i za ba 'ba' zhig la/ /dang du blangs na nyes byas yin/ /dang por gos ni med pa dang / /phyi ma'ang gos bcas
<p>30b.6</p>yin grang na/ /gang phyir ston mo gnyi ga yang / /za ba la ni bkag pa med/ /dang po yang ni gos bcas la/ /phyi ma'ang gos can yin na ni/ /gnyi ga la yang ci 'dod du/ /za ba bkag pa yod ma yin/ /chos gos bor nas med gyur te/ /gos bcas dang du len pa la/ /
<p>30b.7</p>kun tu gos ni mi rnyed phyir/ /kun mkhyen thugs rje can gyis gnang / /grong du 'gron du gnyer ba na/ /dge 'dun mtha' dag go byas nas/ /rgan po gtsug lag khang skyong gis/ /dus su gaN+DI brdungs byas na/ /dge slong rang gi sde pa dang / /glo bur lhag pa mthong
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>ba la/ /'gro ba'i ched du bskul bya ste/ /gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /dge slong mu stegs 'dug gnas su/ /'dug nas der ni g.yos pa'i zas/ /zhag gcig las lhag zos na ni/ /nad pa las gzhan ltung bar 'gyur/ /nad pa min pas
<p>31a.2</p>nyin zhag ni/ /gnyis par gnas na nyes byas yin/ /bza' ba zos na ltung byed de/ /gzhan nas der za na yang ngo / /spyir na rje bos gsungs pa ni/ /nye du 'brel pa kho na la/ /lan brgya bza' ba zos kyang ni/ /ltung ba'i dri ma yod ma yin/ /ci bder stobs pa ma yin par/ /
<p>31a.3</p>dge slong phye dang khur ba yis/ /gang ba'i lhung bzed gnyis gsum las/ /lhag pa'i len na ltung byed yin/ /lhung bzed chen po gnyis dang ni/ /chung ngu gnyis dang chen po phyed/ /lhung bzed chung ngu gsum dang ni/ /'bring po gnyis su gang bstan pa/ /'bring po gnyis dang chung ngu gcig /
<p>31a.4</p>chen po gcig dang chung ngu gcig /len la ltung ba yod min te/ /'bring po gsum du len pa la/ /nyes byas nges par thob pa yin/ /bstan bzhin lhung bzed gang ba las/ /gzhan len dge slong ltung byed yin/ /gzhan du lhung bzed gang bar ni/ /len par byed la nyes pa med/ /phan sems nye du'i khyim las
<p>31a.5</p>gang / /len la nyes pa yod min te/ /de blangs lhan cig gnas pa yi/ /dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya/ /bza' ba spangs nas gang za ba/ /dge slong rnams la ma brtags yin/ /lhag por legs par ma byas pa/ /de la nges par ltung byed 'dod/ /bza' bar bya ba
<p>31a.6</p>spangs nas 'dir/ /nam yang rjes su ma gnang ste/ /bza' ba spangs nas slar yang 'dir/ /bca' ba 'cha' ba nyid kyang ngo / /sna tshogs chan dang zan dang sha /phye dang khur ba bza' ba ste/ /rtsa ba sdong bu me tog 'bras/ /lo ma yang ni bca' ba lnga/ /gang du zang zing zhes byar
<p>31a.7</p>brjod/ /bza' ba rnams su shes bya ste/ /de ster de yi rnam 'gyur dang / /spangs dang stan ni bor ba ste/ /gnas ni lnga po 'di dag la/ /dge slong spangs pa zhes byar brjod/ /gzhan du 'di dag min pa la/ /spangs pa yod pa ma yin no/ /re zhig tshig dang ldan pa yis/ /
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>tshim par gyur pa'i mthar phyin te/ /de bzhin song shig brjod pa yis/ /spang bar gyur la nyes pa med/ /glo nas ma yin rgyab nas min/ /pang du ma yin nam mkhar min/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi steng du yang / /nam yang lhag por mi bya'o/ /'bad pas lag pa rab bkrus nas/ /kha zas
<p>31b.2</p>de ni yongs su blang / /'dug sa mang por dge slong gis/ /gang zos de ni lhag por min/ /gus pas de yi mdun du ni/ /tsog pur 'dug nas 'di skad brjod/ /btsun pa dgongs shig bza' ba dag/ /lhag por byas pa bza' bar 'tshal/ /'di ni bdag gis phun tshogs pa'i/ /
<p>31b.3</p>bza' ba la sogs rung ba ste/ /lhag por mdzad nas gsol cig ces/ /gus dang bcas pas brjod par bya/ /des kyang de la kham gnyis sam/ /kham gsum zos nas de la khyod/ /song shig ji ltar bde bar ni/ /'di dag rnams ni bza' bar gyis/ /de ni zos nas spangs pa dang / /
<p>31b.4</p>gnas las ma langs pa yis ni/ /yon tan can gyi mdun 'dug nas/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya/ /de yis ma zos pa na yang / /de la de ni bya ba ste/ /song la 'di ni ci bder zo/ /tshul 'di lhag por cho gar brjod/ /sdom brtson mgul bar btung bya ba/ /'o ma zho la sogs pa
<p>31b.5</p>la/ /tshul 'di nges par brtag mi dgos/ /nas la sogs pa'i thug pa ni/ /thug pa sor rjes yod pa dang / /gang du steng ni sla bar gnas/ /gting na ska bar gnas mthong nas/ /ska de mdzub mos ldag byed la/ /spangs pa yod pa kho na ste/ /spangs pa der ni 'du shes
<p>31b.6</p>pas/ /thos sam the tshom gyis kyang rung / /ltung byed dmyal ba'i lam rnams spyod/ /gang du ma spangs par yang ni/ /gang phyir spangs par 'du shes sam/ /the tshom kho na yis kyang rung / /nyes byas sdug bsngal ster byed yin/ /dge slong gang zhig rab spangs nas/ /lhag por ma
<p>31b.7</p>byas dge slong gis/ /gang phyir ngan sems bsams pa yi/ /bza' ba stobs pa ltung byed do/ /lhung bzed rkang pa gnyis dag gis/ /mnan nas nam yang bza' mi bya/ /bder gnas yin na ltung 'gyur te/ /nad can dag la nyes pa med/ /mchil lham gyon nas bza' ba dag /mi rung
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>dge slong nad ma gtogs/ /des kyang mchil lham steng du ni/ /rkang pa bzhag gi gzhan du min/ /'dren byed rgyab dang rgyang ring dang / /glo dang cho ga mi shes dang / /dge slong gis bskyod blang mi bya/ /lag pa ma bkan pas kyang min/ /'dren pa nye bar gnas pa
<p>32a.2</p>dang / /mdun du 'dug dang cho ga shes/ /lag pa dag ni bkan pa yis/ /dge slong gis ni legs par blang / /lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs par ni/ /bza' ba gang zhig lhung gyur pa/ /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /byin len byas yin bza' bar rung / /rdul ni me tog
<p>32a.3</p>'bras bu zan/ /ltung ba dang ni gos kyang rung / /gang zhig sog 'jog de las gzhan/ /rung ba dang ni mi rung gang / /brtags pa 'di dag dgu po ste/ /bcu po rdul gyi rdul yin no/ /gzugs ni gsal po ma yin pa/ /de dag la ni nyes pa med/ /sog 'jog byas pa de dang
<p>32a.4</p>gang / /byin len ma byas pa yi zas/ /de yis gos sogs 'bags gyur na/ /bkru'o gzhan du nyes byas yin/ /lan tshwa la sogs brims nas ni/ /gsar dus blang bar mi bya ste/ /zas la mi mthun med par ni/ /ji bzhin dus su nges par bstan/ /gang zhig rgan po'i gong
<p>32a.5</p>du za/ /nges pa'am the tshom gyis kyang ni/ /de la nyin zhag re re la/ /nyes byas nges par 'phel ba yin/ /brtags pas nges par gzhan phyir byin/ /de ni sred pas cung zad cig /byin len byas kyang de la de/ /de tshe spyad par rung ma yin/ /sbyin pa po yis ltos med par/ /gang
<p>32a.6</p>gtad len pas thob pa ni/ /de ni byin len dag pa ste/ /zos pa na yang nyes pa med/ /nga la 'di las 'di byin zhes/ /'dren pa po la smra mi rung / /rigs pas thob par bza' bya yis/ /gzhan min nad pas nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson zos nas lhag ma yi/ /chang bu yang ni ci bder gzhag /
<p>32a.7</p>bya rog sogs la dmigs pa yi/ /kun slong khyad par mi bya'o/ /glo bur lhags dang 'gro 'dod dang / /dge skos dang ni nad pa dang / /de yi nad g.yog nyid la yang / /bza' ba sngar ni sbyin par bya/ /gro bzhin skyes kyi dbang byas nas/ /btung ba dge 'dun la yang gnang / /de yi phyir na
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>zhang dag ni/ /gzugs can snying pos phul bar bshad/ /'bras chan thug pa zan dron dang / /nya dang sha ni rung ba ste/ /'tsho ba srung phyir 'di dag ni/ /bza' bar bya ba'i sman du gsungs/ /rgun 'brum a shwad 'bra go dang / /ku shu chu shing rtsub 'gyur dang / /u dum wA ra rgya shug
<p>32b.2</p>dag /btung bar rjes su bsngags pa yin/ /khyim pa dang ni dge tshul gyis/ /legs par mnye zhing yongs su btsags/ /'di dag btung ba thun tshod pa/ /skyur bo zho ga chu de bzhin/ /'bru mar bu ram sbrang rtsi dang / /mar dag zhag bdun par ni gsungs/ /sha khar bye ma ka ra dag /
<p>32b.3</p>'di dag chu la gdus pa ste/ /gzhan yang ji srid 'tsho ba'i sman/ /rtsa ba sdong bu sogs sbyar ba/ /tshul bzhin du ni byin brlabs te/ /yongs su spyad par rung ba yin/ /rtsa ba gla sgang sge'u gsher sogs/ /sdong bur yongs su grags pa ni/ /tsan+dan thang shing sle tres dang / /
<p>32b.4</p>spur dang pad+ma dkar la sogs/ /'dab bdun pa to la sogs ni/ /lo ma'o de dag me tog kyang / /'bras bu na le sham dang ni/ /skyu ru a ru ba ru sogs/ /shing kun spra tshil rgya skyegs dang / /de bzhin thang chu dag kyang ste/ /til tshigs la sogs 'gyur byed lnga/ /de bzhin du
<p>32b.5</p>yang tsha lnga'o/ /a mra a mra'i nang shun dang / /'dab bdun pa dang shi ri sha'i/ /shun pa dag gi sman rnams ni/ /ji srid 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /gang gzhan de 'dra'i rigs dag ni/ /bza' ba'i don du bcang min pa/ /zos kyang bkres pa mi sel phyir/ /'di dag ji srid 'tsho ba'i
<p>32b.6</p>sman/ /rgun 'dru ma bal se'u 'bra go dang / /a mra la sogs 'bras bu ste/ /ut+pal la sogs rtsa ba dag /mkhas pas dus su rung bar gsungs/ /dus su rung sogs 'di dag ni/ /phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa na/ /snga ma snga ma'i dbang byas nas/ /yongs su spyad la nyes
<p>32b.7</p>pa med/ /nya dang rus sbal phag pa dang / /nya sgong chu srin byis pa gsod/ /dom dang ri bong phag rgod dred/ /tshil zhag byin len byas spyod rung / /sha rjen za ba dag la 'dir/ /dri zhim rdzas kyi phye mar bcas/ /sman pa'i ngag gis nad sos gnang / /de las phar ni ma yin
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>no/ sha ni bza' bar ma yin pa/ /mi dang lto 'phye glang po sogs/ /'drim na dge slong mkhas rnams kyis/ /'di ni gang gi sha zhes dri/ /mchod rten nye 'khor bla gab med/ /sgo dang bang rim chu yi gnas/ /khyams dang gnas khang dag tu ni/ /
<p>33a.2</p>bza' sogs 'tshed pa rnam par spangs/ /sems bsdus la sogs cho ga yis//rung ba'i gnas ni rnam pa lnga/ /'dren pas gtsug lag khang du ni/ /zas gnas dge 'dun don du gsungs/ /gtsug lag khang gi thig brkyang nas/ /so phag nye bar 'jog pa na/ /lag gi gla
<p>33a.3</p>ni mkhas pa yis/ /phan 'dod sems bskyed bya ba nyid/ /tshogs kyi rung ba'i gnas su ni/ /sa phyogs 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /ngag tu yang ni lan gsum brjod/ /de ltar sems bskyed sngon 'gro bas/ /gtsug lag khang phyed zin pa la/ /lag blas dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /
<p>33a.4</p>'di la sems rab sdus shig ces/ /lan gsum bar du brjod par bya/ /'di nyid zas kyi gnas nyid du/ /mdzes pa'i dngos por byin gyis brlabs/ /de ltar byed la sems bsdus pa'i/ /mtha' las byung bar mkhas pas gsungs/ /gtsug lag khang chen mang po dag /
<p>33a.5</p>sna tshogs sgo ni tha dad na/ /gcig tu legs par bya ba ste/ /kun nas ba lang lhas bzhin no/ /gtsug lag khang rnying nyams gyur cing / /dge slong rnams kyis bor ba na/ /'phral byung gyur la tshig gi mthar/ /gang de byin gyis brlab par brjod/ /gzhan yang 'dod don gcig pa
<p>33a.6</p>dang / /las brjod pa ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dge 'dun mthun pas las dag gi/ /cho ga zhes bya rdzogs la'o/ /de ltar zas kyi gnas gang dag /sdom brtson gyis ni ma byas na/ /gang zhig btsos pa'i zas dang ni/ /zhag lon pa yang rung ma yin/ /sen mo ne tso me mtshon sogs/ /
<p>33a.7</p>rnyings dang dbug dang brtol ba dang / /bcad dang gshegs pa'i ming can gyi/ /sa bon bcas pa'ang rung ba yin/ /rgan po'i mdun du 'dren pa yi/ /sam pras ta zhes brjod bya ste/ /de sgra bza' dang btung ba rnams/ /shin tu dag par bya phyir yin/ /gnas brtan gyis kyang bden
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>par ni/ /snyoms par brims zhes brjod par bya/ /shes bzhin ldan pas bza' bya zhing / /zos nas kyang ni yon bshad bya/ /yon bshad la ni 'dug pa na/ /dge slong gang gis bzar mi rung / /de ma thos la nyes med de/ /gzhan der ci bder bza' bar bya/ /tshigs bcad dang po
<p>33b.2</p>brjod pa na/ /nye bar gtad de bsdad nas kyang / /tshigs bcad mthar yang nyen byed na/ /de za ba la bkag pa med/ /dge 'dun gyi ni rgan po'am/ /nus ldan gzhan gyis kyang ni brjod/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi 'dod pa dang / /bsam pa ji bzhin chos bstan to/ /chos ni 'chad pa po la
<p>33b.3</p>yang / /nye gnas g.yog 'khor don du ni/ /dge slong rnams ni sbyin bya ste/ /gcig pu grong du mdzes ma yin/ /dga' ston dus tshe sku gzugs ni/ /rgan po'i gong du rtag tu bzhag /ston pa dang ni dge 'dun bcas/ /'jig rten gsum snang khyab bdag yin/ /mtshan mo sgron me
<p>33b.4</p>med par ni/ /chos nyan pa dang bshad mi bya/ /dbyar gyi dus su rtag tu ni/ /'od khang mig brgya pa yis dgab/ /khyim nas khyim du dge slong rnams/ /dgos pas mgron du bos pa na/ /khang bzangs gzhan du nam yang ni/ /de nas de dag 'gro mi bya/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun
<p>33b.5</p>tshul bzhin du/ /ci bder bza' ba zos nas ni/ /sbyin bdag gis ni gnang ba dang / /'gro bar byed la nyes pa med/ /sha dang nya sogs 'jig rten na/ /dam pa'i skye bos ma smad gang / /lhung bzed 'ongs pa de bza' ste/ /de 'dras ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig ched du byas pa'i sha /
<p>33b.6</p>mthong ngam thos sam dogs pa ni/ /nam yang bza' bar bya min par/ /'gro kun phan par bzhed pas gsungs/ /ro la brkam pas gsod byed pa/ /snying rje med pa'i bsam pa spang / /gang zhig srog gnas ched du ni/ /sha za ba la nyes pa med/ /stag gis mche bas bzung ba ni/ /
<p>33b.7</p>mthong ngam thos pa nyid na yang / /de ni bza' bar mi bya ste/ /de yis nam yang mi gtong phyir/ /sgog skya la sogs sman rnams ni/ /nad pa dag la rjes gnang ste/ /gang phyir tshe srog dge ba yi/ /chos rnams kyi ni snod yin phyir/ /gang du dge slong rnams kyi dri/ /ma dad pa yis mi
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>snom na/ /de la nyes sbyor rnams kyis kyang / /gnas kyi bya ba'i rgyur shes bya/ /bya ba rdzogs pa'i mthar yang ni/ /lus ni rnam par dag bya ste/ /dri ma lhag ma med pa na/ /slar yang gtsug lag khang 'jug bya/ /nub mo bdun dang nub mo gsum/ /de
<p>34a.2</p>bzhin nub gcig rim bzhin du/ /sgog skya dang ni breg tsong dang / /ke'u yang ni dag par gsungs/ /bsod snyoms dag la 'jug pa na/ /khang bzangs sgo mang rgyu bya ste/ /zas la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /sgor yang phyir ldog 'dod pas bzhag /sgra ldan khar gsil khyer bya ste/ /
<p>34a.3</p>de yis sbyin bdag go bar bya/ /khyi dang ba lang la sogs bsdigs/ /rnam yang brdeg par mi bya'o/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu bza' bya dag /dal gyis dal gyis dum bur bya/ /mnyes sam dum bur bsil nas ni/ /grong du dge slong dul bas bza'/ /mgron du bos tshe gos med par/ /
<p>34a.4</p>'chol pa'i gral gyis zas mi bza'/ /dus ma yin pa'i zan dag kyang / /sman pa la dris gnang na rung / /mu ge'i dus na mgron gnyer ba/ /shin tu mang yang dang du blang / /sbyin bdag gis ni gnang ba na/ /bgo bsha' yis ni yongs su spyad/ /gtso bor mgron du bos pa yis/ /
<p>34a.5</p>phyed zos kyang ni sbyin bya ste/ /tshangs par spyod la rab mkhas des/ /nyam nga ba dag yongs su bskyang / /thub pa'i bstan pa dang phrad srog/ /nyi ma gcig kyang rnyed dka' bas/ /yun rings 'tsho bar 'dod pa gang / /de dag gis kyang yongs su spyad/ /gal te lhung bzed 'phan can du/ /
<p>34a.6</p>khu tshigs dag ni mthong ba na/ /dngos po gang gis de bsal nas/ /lan gsum bar du bkrus te spyad/ /zos nas kha yi dri ma ni/ /sa dang lci ba sogs kyis sbyang / /chu khyor gsum mam lhag pas kyang / /bkru bshal yongs su dag par bya/ /dge slong min pas reg gam
<p>34a.7</p>zhes/ /blta bya the tshom med na bza'/ /gzhan du reg par gyur lta na/ /slar yang byin len ltos pa yin/ /lam du song tshe lam rgyags dag /khur khyer su yang med pa na/ /brje ba yi ni 'du shes kyis/ /rang nyid kyis ni khur bar bya/ /brje ba gzhan dag med pa na/ /nyi ma dang po
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>zan bcad bya/ /gnyis pa la ni spar gang tsam/ /bza' yi de las lhag pa min/ /nyi ma gsum par spar ba gnyis/ /de las phar ni ci bder bya/ /rang nyid 'bad pas bsgrubs nas kyang / /srog bsrung 'dod pas bza' bar bya/ /sa brkos nas ni rtsa ba'am/ /shing
<p>34b.2</p>la 'dzegs nas 'bras bu blang / /dge slong 'chi la thug pa yis/ /bkres pa bsal ba'i don phyir spyad/ /bcas pa'i kha na ma tho 'dir/ /gnas skabs rkyen dbang gis rjes gnang / /rang bzhin kha na ma tho 'dir/ /tshul ldan srog la thug kyang min/ /'dod na nye du dang lhan
<p>34b.3</p>cig /legs blos bzar rung kho na ste/ /gal te lam 'jigs snod med na/ /dge tshul dang yang rung ba nyid/ /dge sbyong za ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pas bzung / /kham gcod la sogs byed pa'i dus/ /lag ni rtag tu dran pas bsrung / /gang du bag med
<p>34b.4</p>khwa dag gis/ /zas la rig par gyur pa na/ /mchu reg nye 'khor dor nas ni/ /bza' ba de la brtag mi dgos/ /mar dang 'bru mar bu ram sogs/ /gzhan yang dge 'dun gyi ni rdzas/ /khyer nas dran pa brjed pa yis/ /gang lus de ni dor mi rung / /tshogs sam gang zag
<p>34b.5</p>gis kyang rung / /rung ba de ni yongs su blang / /las kyi dus la bab pa na/ /legs par zos nas las 'jug bya/ /bu ram 'bras phye 'dres gyur na/ /gtsang ma'i chu yis yongs sbyangs nas/ /dus min par yang spyod pa la/ /zas kyi nyes pa yod ma yin/ /thun tshod rung ba la
<p>34b.6</p>sogs sman/ /dus su rung dang 'dres pa na/ /dus ma yin par mi spyad cing / /reg nas byin len ma byas min/ /thun tshod rung ba'ang de las gzhan/ /zhag bdun pa dang 'dres na ni/ /thun tshod las gzhan sdom brtson gyis/ /spyad min byin len ma byas min/ /zhag bdun pa
<p>34b.7</p>yang ji srid du/ /'tsho bar dmigs dang 'dres na yang / /zhag bdun par ni spyad bya ste/ /lhag par ma yin byin len bya// //bam po bzhi pa/ dge slong gcig gis bu ram gang / /rang gis spyod phyir byin brlabs te/ /phan tshun yid gcugs gyur pa yi/ /
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>lnga po rnams la rjes su gnang / /nad pa nyid dang zan chang dang / /dge skos dang ni lag gi bla/ /lam du zhugs pa 'di lnga las/ /gzhan dag la ni rung ma yin/ /zang zing phra mo 'dres pa yis/ /bu ram chu shing mnyes nas ni/ /btsags nas sdom
<p>35a.2</p>brtson btung ba ni/ /dus min par yang rung ba'o/ /rnyed dka'i 'bras bu me tog sogs/ /yid 'phrog bza' bar bya ba gang / /rnyed na spang bar byas kyang ni/ /'dod na bza' bar gnang ba yin/ /bsod snyoms yang dag thob pa'i tshe/ /bsod snyoms pa yi spyod yul du/ /
<p>35a.3</p>khyim gzhan gnas te za ba ni/ /sbyin bdag bsod nams spel phyir rung / /slar yang za bar 'dod lta na/ /spyod yul dag nas 'ongs nas ni/ /bza' bya mu ge'i dus dag tu/ /sngar blangs bsam pas rung ba yin/ /khyim du zos pa'i lhag ma dag /gal te sbyin bdag
<p>35a.4</p>gis bkur na/ /sngar blangs pa yi bsam pa yis/ /nyam nga ba na de yang ngo / /gtsug lag khang gnas kun tu yang / /dus gsum kun tu gtor ma sbyin/ /dus dang dus min za ba nyid/ /gnod sbyin zas phyir 'dod rnams sbyin/ /bu dang bcas pa'i 'phrog ma la'ang / /
<p>35a.5</p>gtsug lag khang ni bsrung phyir dang / /bstan pa yang ni phun tshogs phyir/ /bde gshegs kyis ni gtor ma gsungs/ /na sogs dus ni ma gtogs par/ /'dus shing za na ltung byed do/ /dge 'dun la ni gang cung zad/ /byin blangs de la ltung ba med/ /glo bur gnyug ma'i
<p>35a.6</p>bza' ba gang / /de yang 'dus shing bza' bar 'dod/ /na dang las dang lam gyi dus/ /sngar ni rab tu bsnyen pa nyid/ /gru dang gru chen zhugs la sogs/ /dpag tshad phyed lam song nas ni/ /log nas gal te za byed na/ /dge slong ltung ba yod ma yin/ /gal te sbyin bdag
<p>35a.7</p>mang po yis/ /dge slong rnams la so sor gnang / /sbyin bdag dag ni nus pa'i ngor/ /sbyin pa'i dus ni lnga po'o/ /mu stegs dge sbyong gis zhus nas/ /sbyin bdag de yis gal te 'dren/ /de dag dad pa khyad par du/ /spel phyir bza' bar bya ba nyid/ /mtshams nang der 'du
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>shes pa'am/ /the tshom gyis kyang ltung byed yin/ /gsum po la ni nyes med do/ /so sor ma 'dus 'dug la sogs/ /so sor nges pas thob pa dang / /gtsug lag khang du tha dad za/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyis 'dod pa'i ngor/ /bkag pa yod pa ma yin no/ /nyi ma phyed kyi
<p>35b.2</p>dus nas phar/ /phyi ma'i skya rengs ma shar bar/ /dge slong bza' ba za byed na/ /ltung byed 'khor los rnam par 'joms/ /bza' ba la sogs dge slong gis/ /sog 'jog byas pa zos na ltung / /snga phyi gnyis su spyod pa yis/ /de ni rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /sngar spyod
<p>35b.3</p>byin len byas pa ni/ /phyi dro spyod pa bkag pa yin/ /phyi dro byin len byas pa ni/ /thun tshod 'das pa rung ma yin/ /chos gos lde mig kyog po dang / /lhung bzed lhung bzed dman pa la'ang / /lag pa 'bags pas mi reg ste/ /tshul de'ang rkyen dbang ma gtogs so/ /sdom
<p>35b.4</p>brtson gang zhig bza' ba sogs/ /byin len ma byas za byed na/ /de yang bslab pa zad byed de/ /chu dang so shing ma gtogs so/ /gang zhig ma tshos tshos pa 'dra/ /bsod snyoms pa yis rnyed pa na/ /sra ba nyid ni sum cha bangs/ /chos la byin len byas pa rung / /nya dang sha dang
<p>35b.5</p>'bras bu sogs/ /kha dog yongs su gyur pa na/ /ba 'o la sogs lan gsum khol/ /byin len bya bar rung ba nyid/ /reg nas byin len mi bya ste/ /nyam nga'i dus na bkag pa med/ /'dab ma can dang so shing dag /'o ma can ni yongs su spang / /dge slong rnams la sbyin bdag
<p>35b.6</p>gis/ /bza' ba gal te bor na ni/ /sgra mi snyan pa'i dbang byas nas/ /dus yol nas ni bza' bar bya/ /mgul du mid pa ma yin na/ /'di la byin len mi bya zhing / /ji srid 'tsho bar bsgrubs pa ni/ /byin rlabs ma byas mi bcang ngo / /tshang ni sog par mi nus pa/ /sbrang ma'am
<p>35b.7</p>ti tam ka la sogs/ /de ni dor nas spyad bya ste/ /byi ba sogs kyis nges par 'jig /lag pa gnyis ni lag pa dang / /de dang 'brel la des byin dang / /lag pa de dang 'brel pa yis/ /de dang 'brel pa dag tu yang / /byin len bya'o mi bde na/ /rgyang ring na yang rung ba nyid/ /
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>'di la cang shes glang po dang / /spre'u yis kyang byin len rung / /mar dang 'o ma nyid dang zho/ /sha dang nya sogs bdag nyid kyi/ /don du dge slong der gnas pas/ /blang bar bya ba min pa ste/ /nad pas ston mo'i dus su ni/ /slong bar byed la ltung ba med/ /
<p>36a.2</p>mi na ba yis slong ba na/ /nyes byas zos na ltung byed yin/ /bsod snyoms dag la rgyu ba na/ /kha rog 'dug ste spyod yul du/ /ci byin zhes ni 'dri ba la/ /ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya/ /srog chags bcas pa'i chu rnams la/ /phyi rol khrus la sogs spyod dang / /nang du 'thung bar brjod
<p>36a.3</p>pa yis/ /longs spyod nam yang bkag pa yin/ /'dir ni ltung byed ltung ba yi/ /rnam pa gzhan ni yongs btsags pa'o/ /rtswa sogs dag la 'debs pa rnams/ /gang 'dir slar yang ma bris so/ /longs spyod bcas pa'i khyim gang zhig /skyabs bcas par ni 'dug pa dang / /
<p>36a.4</p>'greng ba gnas skabs dge slong ni/ /rkyen dbang las gzhan ltung ba yin/ /gang du skyes pa bud med bcas/ /chags ldan 'dod pa spyod gyur pa/ /bud med skyes pa longs spyod pas/ /de ni longs spyod ces byar bstan/ /mu stegs rnams la rang nyid kyi/ /lag gis bza' sogs
<p>36a.5</p>mi sbyin te/ /lta las slar ldog don du ni/ /dum bur byas te rjes su gnang / /snod ni sa la bzhag pa la/ /snying rje ldan pas sbyin bya ste/ /de ni rjes su gzung phyir yin/ /nam yang gus phyir ma yin no/ /'thab tu bcas pa'i dmag tshogs la/ /nam yang lta phyir mi 'gro ste/ /
<p>36a.6</p>de lta bu yi rkyen dag gis/ /gyur pa las ni bkag pa med/ /gal te dgos pas song yang de/ /nub gnyis las ni phar mi gnas/ /yun rings dus su nang du ni/ /gnas na'ang gang zhig 'jigs pas sam/ /rgyal po 'am ni blon po sogs/ /mdza' bshes tshig gis kyang
<p>36a.7</p>rung ste/ /gnas pa na yang cho ga ni/ /rta dang glang sogs ched mi lta/ /dmag tshogs rnams kyi bkod pa dang / /dpung dang rgyal mtshan mchog gi yang / /rgyal po dang ni blon po yis/ /bshams pa dkrug par mi bya'o/ /de la dpung mchog gang du dpung / /de yi bkod pa
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>spras la bya/ /gang du gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog /de ni rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya/ /khros pa'i sems kyis dge slong la/ /sdom brtson rdeg par byed mi rung / /'dren pas bla ma'i dbang byas nas/ /brdeg par gzas pa'ang de bzhin bkag /'dir ni sor mo gcig gis
<p>36b.2</p>kyang / /rdeg par byed na zad par 'dod/ /mgo bo khu tshur rkang dang lag /rdo dbyug bong ba sogs brdeg ltung / /phyags ma la sogs kyis brdeg na/ /de yi nyag ma ji snyed pa/ /de snyed lus la reg pa'i grangs/ /sdom brtson dag la ltung byed gsungs/ /de bzhin sran ljang drug
<p>36b.3</p>sogs kyis/ /brdeg na'ang ltung byed kho nar brjod/ /de ni lus la ma phog par/ /'phangs pa yang ni nyes byas nyid/ /ma rungs gdul phyir ltung med de/ /gzhan par sngags grub mthu ldan gyi/ /dge slong dag gis brdeg pa dang / /gzas pa'ang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
<p>36b.4</p>dge slong rnams kyis gnas ngan len/ /shes nas 'chab pa yang bkag ste/ /'jigs pas ma gtogs 'jigs gyur na/ /gnas ngan len ni bcab bya nyid/ /phas pham pa nyid gtsor byas nas/ /ji snyed btung bar brjod pa dag /de snyed bslab pa'i gzhi 'di la/ /
<p>36b.5</p>mkhas pas gnas ngan len ces gsungs/ /nad pa ma yin dge slong la/ /nyon mongs bcas pa'i sems kyis der/ /nam yang zan gcad mi bya'o/ /ji ste byed na zad byed ltung / /dus ma gtogs par me dag gis/ /nye bar spor byed smad par gsungs/ /me gsod pa dang
<p>36b.6</p>bsro ba dag /nyam nga'i dus na nyes pa med/ /skra sen spu dang ngar snabs dang / /mchil ma lud pa 'jug pa dang / /me lce me mar mur la reg /nyes byas 'gyur ro dus ma gtogs/ /dkon mchog gsum dang pha ma dang / /tshangs par mtshungs spyod bla ma dang / /chos kyi don
<p>36b.7</p>du nyes med de/ /reg pa'i dus su brjod pa yin/ /'dun pa dbul zhes smras nas ni/ /dge 'dun las ni nye ba na/ /sdom brtson slar yang mi dbul na/ /de ni ltung bas 'joms pa yin/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs gang zag dang / /nub gnyis lhan cig nyal rung ste/ /de las
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>phar ni nub gsum sogs/ /ma yin gal te nyal na ltung / /thams cad g.yo zhing thams cad bskor/ /gnas khang bskor zhing g.yogs pa bzhin/ /phal cher g.yogs shing kun nas bskor/ /ngos bzhi pa yi khyams bzhin brtag /thams cad
<p>37a.2</p>g.yogs shing phal cher bskor/ /ngos gsum pa yi khyams bzhin te/ /phal cher g.yogs pa'i khang pa dang / /khang bzangs bzhin te rim bzhin no/ /de ltar khyim ni bzhi po ru/ /sdom brtson lhan cig nyal byed na/ /nyi ma gsum pa'i skya rengs 'od/ /'char tshe
<p>37a.3</p>gsal por ltung ba yin/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar po ste/ /skya rengs rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /sngon po nyid tshe'ang ltung 'gyur na/ /gzhan dag tshe na smos ci dgos/ /gang du sgra don so sor go /khyams dang khang bzangs la sogs par/ /de 'dra der yang sdom brtson ni/ /
<p>37a.4</p>nyal du rung ba ma yin no/ /gnang ba dang bcas gnas su ni/ /nad pa dag la rjes gnang ste/ /de yi nad g.yog dag kyang ngo / /de las gzhan gyis nam yang min/ /stobs chung mi na ba la ni/ /nyin mo nyal ba bkag pa yin/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan pa la/ /
<p>37a.5</p>yud tsam rjes su gnang ba yin/ /gnyis sam gsum po dag gis kyang / /khri gcig la ni nyal mi bya/ /rgya chen yin na gos sogs kyis/ /bar chad nyal ba rjes su gnang / /mun khung dag tu sa la mgo /gtugs nas bla mar phyag mi bya/ /der ni tshig gi bya ba'am/ /
<p>37a.6</p>yid kyis nges par phyag bya'o/ /dge tshul dang ni lhan cig tu/ /lam du nyal tshe gnyid mi log /mi nus ldang blos skyil krung dag /bcings te cung zad gnyid log rung / /ma nus pa na nyes pa med/ /thams cad du ni 'bad pa yis/ /dge tshul dag ni bskyang bar bya/ /
<p>37a.7</p>sangs rgyas ljon shing myu gu ste/ /de ni dgra bcom sgo nga yin/ /dge slong blo gros dman gang dang / /dge tshul gang yang 'di skad chos/ /'dod pas bar du gcod bstan mod/ /bar du gcod pa min ston na/ /de 'dir lan gsum par bzlog ste/ /'on kyang lta de mi gtong na/ /
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>'di las lhag sdig yod min pas/ /de yang rgyang ring spang bar bya/ /nyams pa de dang smra ba dang / /nam yang yang dag smra mi bya/ /gnas dang longs spyod la sogs kyang / /mi bya gal te byed na ltung / /yang dag smra ba kha ton yin/ /smra ba klog pa yin par 'dod/ /gnas sa 'dug
<p>37b.2</p>sa gcig tu ste/ /longs spyod chos dang zang zing ngo / /lta ba bzlog pa'i ched du 'am/ /nye du'am nad pa yin na ni/ /smra la sogs pa rjes su gnang / /longs spyod nam yang ma yin no/ /chos gos gsar pa rnyed pa na/ /kha dog ngan par byas te bcad/ /de yang dkar po gsar par
<p>37b.3</p>dgongs/ /kha dog ngan pa rnam pa gsum/ /rang bzhin dang ni bcos ma yin/ /sngon po dang ni btsag tu grags/ /me tog 'bras bu 'dab ma dang / /shun pa'i khu ba ngur smrig 'dod/ /mdog bzangs gzhan ni ma yin no/ /drag po sbrul gyi gdug pa yi/ /dug la rtag tu reg
<p>37b.4</p>bla yi/ /rin po che la reg pa dang / /rin chen smos pa de lta min/ /nor bu mu tig byi ru sogs/ /rin chen de ru smos pa yang / /g.yul 'gyed yan lag mtshon sogs dang / /rol mo'i yan lag rnga zlum sogs/ /gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal/ /thams cad
<p>37b.5</p>nang gir brjod pa yin/ /nang ma yin par slar yang ni/ /phyi rol nye 'khor yin par gsungs/ /phug pa'i nor bu mu tig sogs/ /reg pa la ni ltung byed de/ /ma phug pa la reg pa dang / /mching bu dag la nyes byas nyid/ /pi wang gling bu rnga zlum sogs/ /mtshon cha
<p>37b.6</p>mda' dang gzhu sogs kyang / /yan lag tshang dang ma tshang la/ /reg pa ltung byed nyes byas yin/ /gzhan 'dir go cha la sogs la/ /dge slong reg na nyes byas yin/ /mnga' dang gzhu sogs chas pa yi/ /mtshon cha la reg smos ci dgos/ /sku gdung dang bcas mchod
<p>37b.7</p>rten dang / /sku gzugs la reg ltung byed de/ /sku gdung med la gang reg pa/ /de la nyes byas mda' yis reg /gar dang rol mo glu sogs dag /mig dang rna ba'i yul du bkag /'thab mo bre mo'i gtam sogs kyis/ /nyes zhi mi byed 'ba' zhig zad/ /gar
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>dang glu sogs chags pa yis/ /gang zhig mchod rten phyag byed na/ /der 'gro gom pa re rer yang / /nyes byas phung po re re sogs/ /de phyir srid pa zad 'dod pa'i/ /dge slong rnams kyis gzugs sdug dang / /sgra snyan la sogs chags pa yi/ /sems
<p>38a.2</p>su nam yang mi bya'o/ /sa le sbram sogs smos pa gang / /skyed tshal gang du rnyed pa na/ /rtswa sogs dag gis bkab nas ni/ /zhag brgyad bar du bsrung bar bya/ /su dag don gnyer byung na de'i/ /mtshan ma dris nas bstan par bya/ /med na dge 'dun nang nyid du/ /zla
<p>38a.3</p>ba drug tu brtag phyir bzhag /gzhan gyi kha dog mtshan ma dang / /khyad par rtags kyis mtshon la sbyin/ /min na dge 'dun longs spyod phyir/ /de ni brtan pa'i dngos por bya/ /gal te gdod dbang byas nas kyang / /de thob blo chung slong byed na/ /de la de nor rin gyis sam/ /sbyin
<p>38a.4</p>bya skyed ni nam yang min/ /sdom brtson zla phyed nang rol du/ /dus ma gtogs par khrus byed bkag /na dang las dang lam dang rlung / /char dang de dag tshogs skyon med/ /na ba'i dus ni gang du de/ /khrus byas sos par gyur na'o/ /las lam dus ni sngar bshad bzhin/ /rlung
<p>38a.5</p>du grags pa'i dus bstan pa/ /gang du chos gos sne'u ni/ /rlung gis zlog par byed pa'o/ /lus la char thigs gnyis phog pa/ /char pa'i dus su grags pa yin/ /rlung dang char pa 'dres pa ni/ /de dag tshogs pa'i dus zhes bstan/ /gzhan yang tsha ba'i dus zhes pa/ /
<p>38a.6</p>zla ba phyed dang gsum pa'o/ /chos gos ma lus bzhag nas khrus/ /byed 'dod lte bar ma sleb byas/ /nyes byas lte ba nub par ni/ /khrus byed de ni nyes par zad/ /chu bo pha rol rgal ba dang / /rgyal ba sogs la 'debs byed rung / /'ga' zhig tu yang chu klung dag /zab mo
<p>38a.7</p>brgal la nyes pa med/ /dge slong grur zhugs pha rol du/ /chu bo dag la 'gro ba'am/ /gzhan du rgya mtsho la yang rung / /bshang gci sogs byed bkag pa med/ /'jug ngogs gang du bud med dam/ /rgyal po 'am ni de yi dmag /skyes bu g.yon can khrus byed pa/ /de
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>ni rgyang rings spang bar bya/ /'og tu gting ring byi zul lam/ /yang na steng du nya brgal lam/ /chu la rkyal ba la sogs kyang / /rtsed mo'i don du mi bya'o/ /gal te rkyal ni slob pa'am/ /nad dang bral bar 'dod pa yis/ /shin tu dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /rkyal la sogs pa
<p>38b.2</p>kun du spyad/ /shes bzhin rang ngam gzhan gyis kyang / /sdom brtson dud 'gro'i skye gnas gang / /gsod na ltung byed me lce yis/ /reg pa'i sdug bsngal nyams myong 'gyur/ /shes bzhin nyon mongs sems kyis ni/ /tshangs spyod dang ni bcas rnams la/ /'gyod pa
<p>38b.3</p>skyed byed nges bkag ste/ /byed na ltung byed gzhan du min/ /khyod lo nyi shu ma lon na/ /khyod kyi bsnyen rdzogs gang na ste/ /mkhan po'ang tshul khrims 'chal pa yin/ /de ni mtshams kyi phyi rol yin/ /'gyod pa skyed pa'i don du ni/ /de la sogs pa smra byed na/ /de la ltung
<p>38b.4</p>byed bden pa yi/ /skyon 'gyur brjod na nyes pa med/ /blo chung sor mo gcig gis kyang / /dge slong rtse phyir g.ya' sgog na/ /ltung byed sme ba nag po dag /ston pa la ni nyes pa med/ /dga' g.yengs chu la rtsed mo dag /byed na thad ltung 'gyur ba yin/ /de yang pha rol tshu rol
<p>38b.5</p>du/ /phar brgal tshur brgal byed sogs so/ /ma bsrungs bud med lhan cig tu/ /gal te nang ngam phyi rol du/ /dge slong nyal du mi rung ste/ /sgo bcings pa la nyes pa med/ /'dir ni legs dang nyes smras don/ /gang zhig so sor rtogs dang ldan/ /mi mo de ni bud med ces/ /
<p>38b.6</p>shes rab ldan pas yang dag gsungs/ /thams cad g.yog dang yongs bskor zhes/ /bya ba 'di yang snga ma bzhin/ /nyal bar brjod pa gang yin pa/ /glos ni sa la phab pa'o/ /sdom brtson gnyid kyis non dus su/ /reg pa'i rlung gis sbar ba yi/ /ltung byed me ni gang yin pa/ /
<p>38b.7</p>kun nas sreg par byed pa yin/ /gnas khang sogs su bud med dag /gang na yod pa'i skas sogs brtul/ /srung byed bzhag nas dge slong ni/ /nyal ba la ni smad pa med/ /khyad par nyin mo nyal ba yi/ /cho ga yang ni 'di yin te/ /mdud pa bor nas rjes su gnang / /gzhan
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>du nyes byas 'gyur ba yin/ /dge slong rang ngam gzhan gyis kyang / /dge slong sngangs par byed pa bkag /sems can kun la mi 'jigs mdzad/ /bla ma sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/ /sha za gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i/ /sdig can gzugs ni bzung
<p>39a.2</p>nas kyang / /de yi gzugs sgra dri rnams kyis/ /sngangs par byed la zad byed ltung / /gya nom lha dang dri za dang / /bram ze la sogs 'jigs pa yis/ /bzung nas khyod ni bsad ces brjod/ /gal te brda phrad nyes byas yin/ /phan par 'dod pas mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal
<p>39a.3</p>ltung ba'i 'jigs skyed phyir/ /dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro'i gzugs/ /gal te 'jigs ston nyes pa med/ /dge slong gzhan gyi lhung bzed sogs/ /yo byad dngos po nam du yang / /bzhad gad kyi ni dbang byas nas/ /dge slong gis ni sbed pa bkag /dge slong chos
<p>39a.4</p>gos byin pa la/ /gdeng med par ni longs spyod na/ /ltung byed gal te mdza' bo 'am/ /mchod 'os bla mas nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson dge 'dun lhag ma yis/ /dag pa'i dge slong skur 'debs na/ /ltung byed nyid du nges bstan te/ /phyi ma rnams kyis nyes byas so/ /lam du
<p>39a.5</p>skyes pa med par ni/ /bud med dang ni mi 'grogs te/ /'grogs na de yi spyi bor ni/ /ltung byed gnam lcags 'bab par 'gyur/ /grong der sdom brtson nam son dus/ /nges par ltung byed nyid 'gyur te/ /grong gi lam phyed phyin pa na/ /nyes byas tsam du brjod pa yin/ /rang nyid
<p>39a.6</p>snga phyi byas nas ni/ /lam mi shes pa bstan par bya/ /nyam nga'i lam du bud med dag /khrid na ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rkun ma'i grogs dang 'grogs/ /de la'ang ltung byed kyis reg 'gyur/ /'di la yang ni nyes med da/ /gal te sngar bzhin song na'o/ /tshangs
<p>39a.7</p>pa'i sho gam la sogs pas/ /'phrog par byed de rkun mar 'dod/ /grong dang lam la sogs pa dag /gang 'joms drag po smos ci dgos/ /lo ni nyi shu ma lon 'di/ /gang phyir bkres skom la sogs gnod/ /mi bzod mi brtan lus blo'i phyir/ /bsnyen par rdzogs par mi
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>byar brjod/ /ma tshang lo la der shes bzhin/ /gang zhig smra yang bsnyen rdzogs na/ /rdzogs byed de dag zad par ldan/ /the tshom gyis kyang ltung bar brjod/ /gang zhig ma tshang tshang ba'i blos/ /lo ni tshang bar smra ba la/ /rdzogs byas ltung ba yod ma yin/ /tshang la tshang bar 'du
<p>39b.2</p>shes gang / /tshang la nyid smra dag kyang ste/ /the tshom gyis kyang smra ba la/ /de la ltung ba med pa nyid/ /de ltar 'dir ni phyogs tsam zhig /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/ /brtul zhugs dang bcas blo ldan rnams/ /shin tu nges dang bcas par bya/ /dge slong gis ni
<p>39b.3</p>shes bzhin du/ /sa mi brko'o brkor mi gzhug /so phag 'ba' zhig pa dag dang / /kun nas bye ma yin nyes med/ /skyed byed skyed byed ma yin pa'i/ /sa ni rnam pa gnyis su grags/ /char 'bab rjes su gyur pa la/ /zla ba drug gis skye ba ste/ /skyed byed la ni 'dir
<p>39b.4</p>nges yin/ /sa mang bye ma nyung na ltung / /nyes byas 'gyur ro bye ma dang / /gseg ma dang ni rdo ba dag /lhag par bcas la mi skye'i phyir/ /ltung byed dang ni nyes byas su/ /'dul ba'i de nyid rig pas bshad/ /sa gzhi dang ni rtsig ngos la/ /phur pa brdeg na ltung byed
<p>39b.5</p>yin/ /de nyid 'don dang gnon pa'am/ /'dam bskyod pa la nyes byas so/ /rtsig pa'ang de bzhin zhal zhal lam/ /chu dogs rtib na zad ltung 'gyur/ /chad pa 'am ni gas pa la'ang / /rko bar byed na nyes byas 'dod/ /chu 'gram 'dam ni bskyod pa la/ /'gro bar 'dod pas
<p>39b.6</p>nyes pa med/ /rtsis kyi don du ri mo yang / /sa'am rtsig ngos 'dri ba dang / /skyed mos tshal sogs rgyu ba na/ /'jigs min dus su rung ba nyid/ /dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi las ni/ /mgron du bos pa khas mi blang / /yang yang rtag tu ba dang dus/ /so sor mgron du bos ma
<p>39b.7</p>gtogs/ /rtag tu mgron bos gang yin pa/ /gang du rtag pa nyid du 'bod/ /so sor mgron du bos pa ni/ /so so tha dad nyid la brjod/ /dus ni ji srid 'dod pa des/ /yang yang zhes brjod yang yang dang / /mgron bos 'di dag ma gtogs pa/ /gsal por ltung byed nyid
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>du brjod/ /gya nom pa la bos bzhin du/ /sdom brtson dman pa slong ba na/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /de longs spyod na'ang nyes byas so/ /dman pa la ni bos pa na/ /bzang po slong ba dus ji srid/ /nyes byas longs spyod pa la ni/ /zad byed ltung bar
<p>40a.2</p>brjod pa yin/ /'o ma la bos sha dang zho/ /yang na 'o ma la ni mar/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /zos na nad pa ma gtogs ltung / /dad ldan yo byad phun tshogs shing / /sbyin phyir gtong la 'jigs med pa/ /de ni yun rings bsod nams phyir/ /dang du len pa bkag
<p>40a.3</p>pa med/ /gang tshe bslab pa 'di la khyod/ /bslab par bya zhes dge slong gis/ /rab bskul de tshe lan du gang / /de la byis pa sogs brjod smod/ /blo chung de ni ltung byed kyi/ /dbyug pas phog nas nges par 'gyel/ /'jigs ltung 'bar ba'i sgo nas ni/ /dmyal
<p>40a.4</p>ba'i me yis g.yengs par gyur/ /byis pa zhes bya ngan sems can/ /rmongs pa mdo sogs mi mkhas pa/ /mi gsal 'dul ba'i tshig la ste/ /mi mkhas de yi don la'o/ /byis pa rmongs sogs tshig las ni/ /re re yis kyang bzlog pa na/ /dmyal ba'i mer ni
<p>40a.5</p>'jug byed pa'i/ /ltung byed kyis ni dge slong ltung / /de yis de tshig bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pa dag la dri bar bya/ /mkhas pa'i tshig gis bya ba ste/ /long ba rnams kyis tshad ma de/ /yang na brdzun pa nyid du ni/ /byis pa la sogs tshig gis kyang / /mkhas pa min yang
<p>40a.6</p>bsgo ba na/ /bden don smra na nyes pa med/ /phan tshun mi mthun dge slong gang / /glags skabs tshol zhing co 'dri na/ /bya rog nyan rnas 'dug na ni/ /de yang ltung byed yang dag gnas/ /gnas khang la sogs bsam gtan dag /byed tshe sgra brda ma byas par/ /
<p>40a.7</p>zhugs pas sgra don gtso bo ni/ /ma thos sgra nyan nyes byas 'gyur/ /de ltar khang bzangs skas dang sgo/ /lam du 'jug tshe tshul ldan la/ /ltung byed sngar bshad ji bzhin te/ /zhi bar bya phyir nyes pa med/ /gsol ba'i las la sogs pa yi/ /chos ni gtan la 'bebs
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>pa'i gtam/ /byed tshe gzhan la ma smras par/ /sdom brtson de bor 'gro mi bya/ /las kyi gegs su ma gyur tam/ /zhes bsams rab tu bsgo bar bya/ /de ltar mi byed dge slong ni/ /myur du ltung byed rgya mtshor ltung / /ma gus pa la ltung byed de/ /dge 'dun
<p>40b.2</p>dang ni gang zag gnyis/ /dge 'dun la ni ltung byed brjod/ /gang zag dag la nyes byas so/ /dge 'dun nang na dge skos kyi/ /tshig ni rab tu bzlog pa yang / /ltung byed bla ma'i dge 'dun dang / /rgan po gang zag gzhan la min/ /don med pa
<p>40b.3</p>yi tshig la ni/ /rigs pas shad kyis sbyang ba yis/ /zlog byed smra ba po la 'dir/ /ltung ba med par gsungs pa yin/ /'bru 'am bcos pa'i chang dag ni/ /ku sha'i rtse mo tsam yang spang / /'di dag 'thung ngam ster na yang / /gnyis ka bag med khang chen yin/ /
<p>40b.4</p>kha yi nad la mkhur phug tu/ /bsrel ba tsam la nyes pa med/ /sman pa'i ngag gis 'thung bar ni/ /srog la bab kyang 'dod mi bya/ /phabs dang 'bras phye zan gyi tshogs/ /rnam 'gyur bye brag las skyes pa/ /'jig rten btung ba'i khyad par gang / /de ni 'bru yi chang zhes bya/ /
<p>40b.5</p>sdong bu me tog 'bras rnams kyi/ /khu ba rnams ni yongs gyur pa/ /bcos pa'i chang du nges bstan te/ /sbrang rtsi rgun sogs las byung ba'o/ /gang tshe ma red nyams pa yis/ /myos byed nus pa zad pa na/ /chang gi rgyu mtshan spangs pa'i phyir/ /'thungs kyang de tshe nyes pa
<p>40b.6</p>med/ /su lu ka dang zho ga chu/ /sug ta skyur po btsags nas ni/ /chu bsres btung ba'i don du ni/ /dus min par yang bkag pa med/ /'bru chang skyur por gang gyur pa/ /su lu kar ni yongs su grags/ /bcos chang skyur por gang gyur pa/ /sug ta zhes byar brjod pa'o/ /
<p>40b.7</p>ko tra ba sogs bkag pa'i phyir/ /'bru chang bcos pa'i chang zhes smos/ /ma red nyams la chang gi ni/ /dngos po bzlog phyir myos 'gyur smos/ /chang gi mdog dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang myong ba dag gis kyang / /gal te myos zad chang gi ni/ /dngos med nyes byas gzhir 'dod do/ /
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>de ltar kha dog la sogs pa/ /gsum gnyis gcig 'thung myos nus zad/ /gsum gnyis de bzhin gcig pu la/ /myos pa'i nus med nyes byas rnams/ /rtsa ba sdong bu me tog 'bras/ /'dab ma yang ni myos byed dang / /phabs dang zan chang bsres pa dag /zos na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /
<p>41a.2</p>sdom brtson grogs yod ma smras par/ /sdom gnas dus min grong 'jug na/ /de 'dra'i rkyen la nyes pa med/ /gzhan du zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed kyi mtshams gnas par/ /phyi ma'i skya rengs ma shar bar/ /dus ma yin zhes 'dod pa ste/ /dus dang dus min
<p>41a.3</p>mkhas pas so/ /dge slong dus min 'jug byed cing / /dus min dus su 'du shes dang / /the tshom gyis kyang rnam par 'joms/ /dus la dus min 'du shes dang / /the tshom za na nyes byas yin/ /khyim pas khyim du dge slong rnams/ /gang phyir mgron du bos pa na/ /
<p>41a.4</p>nam yang khyim gzhan dag tu ni/ /de ni de ltar 'gro mi bya/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la ci bder ni/ /bden pas gdugs tshod gsol smras nas/ /khyim bdag gis kyang gnang na der/ /song ba la yang nyes pa med/ /gang zhig rgyal po'i sgo gtan nam/ /de yi nye 'khor
<p>41a.5</p>nyid dang yang / /skya rengs tha ma ma shar 'das/ /bder gnas de yang sdig byed yin/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /gsum pa btsun mo'i 'khor dag gi /sgo gtan de dang nye ba na/ /nye 'khor zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /dge slong nam ni ma langs par/ /ma langs
<p>41a.6</p>pa yi 'du shes kyis/ /grong khyer sgo gtan 'das pa la/ /sdom brtson nyes byas bskyed par 'gyur/ /mi yi bdag po'i sgo 'am ni/ /btsun mo'i 'khor du 'das pa la/ /ma langs de ru 'du shes sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang zad lhung reg /cig shos dag tu 'du shes pas/ /
<p>41a.7</p>thams cad la ni nyes byas so/ /rin chen ma bsdus zhes bya ni/ /sba brtul ma byas pa la brjod/ /zla ba phyed phyed yang dang yang / /so sor thar pa thos nas kyang / /'di dag mdor ni gtogs pa dang / /chos su rang byung gis bstan pa/ /ji bzhin rnam gzhag de byas dag /ma
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>lus bdag gis da gdod shes/ /de ltar go byed tshul 'chos can/ /sdom brtson de ni ltung byed 'dod/ /rus pa ba so rwa yi ni/ /rang bzhin khab ral gang zhig byed/ /blo ngan de 'dir ltung byed kyi/ /chu srin kha ru ltung 'dod yin/ /de yis khab ral bcag nas ni/ /ltung ba de ni
<p>41b.2</p>bshags bya ste/ /rigs pa'i khab ral byed de la/ /bya ba'i cho ga 'di yin te/ /snu gu dang ni chang ba yi/ /rnam pa de dang 'tsham pa'i tshad/ /khab dang gri gu yang dag ldan/ /de las gzhan du nam yang min/ /khab kyang zangs ma 'khar ba dang / /ra gan lcags dang rnam pa bzhi/ /gri
<p>41b.3</p>gu lcags nyid kho nar gsungs/ /de la rab 'bring tha mar 'dod/ /rab tshad sor ni brgyad shes te/ /tha ma yang ni sor bzhi yin/ /bya gag gshog pa'i rnam pa ni/ /gri gu'i dbyibs su bya ba yin/ /gang tshe grong gzhan 'gro ba na/ /dge slong rings par gyur kyang der/ /khab kyi bslab bya
<p>41b.4</p>bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gcig tsam nges par khyer bar bya/ /dge 'dun khri dang khri'u sogs/ /byed na bder gshegs sor gyis ni/ /rkang pa la ni sor brgyad bya/ /lhag par dge slong mi bya'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad la/ /khru gang tshad du 'dod pa yin/ /de las lhag pa dge slong
<p>41b.5</p>gis/ /bcad nas ltung ba so sor bshags/ /tho mtshams don du dge slong gis/ /dge 'dun mal stan la sogs la/ /shing bal la sogs bdal mi bya/ /bdal na de zad ltung bar 'gyur/ /ra bal lug bal ka sha dang / /shal ma la yi bal yang ste/ /dngos po de ni bsdus nas
<p>41b.6</p>su/ /ltung bshags par bya ba yin/ /steng du 'grems par byed pa gang / /de 'dir bdal bar shes par bya/ /gang dang 'brel pas dge slong gi/ /gos dag mdzes par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /srid du bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /mtho gsum de las lhag par min/ /zheng du phyed dang gnyis yod
<p>41b.7</p>de/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gdeng ba bya/ /lhag pa bcad nas ltung ba ni/ /gang la bshags par byed pa na/ /tshul ldan des kyang khyod kyi 'di/ /bcad dam zhes ni dri bar bya/ /'di nyid dbang byas bzhi dang gnyis/ /chu dang zheng du bsngags pa ste/ /dge slong g.yan pa dgab
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>pa ni/ /de las lhag na ltung byed de/ /dbyar gos ras chen zhes bya ba/ /srid du drug yin shes par bya/ /rgyar ni phyed dang gsum yin te/ /gang phyir ston pa'i mtho yi'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi/ /tshad du chos gos mi bya ste/ /mnyam pa 'am ni
<p>42a.2</p>lhag par yang / /de la mtho ni bcu dang drug /bslab pa nyams byed byis pa gang / /mi zad ngan song gsum dag tu/ /des ltung 'jigs brgya bskyed pas na/ /de phyir ltung byed ces bya'o/ /ltung byed yang dag bshad nas kyang / /de yi rjes thogs brjod par bya/ /rang gi mtshan
<p>42a.3</p>nyid dbye ba yis/ /so sor bshags pa rnam pa bzhi/ /sdom brtson rang gi spyod yul du/ /nye du ma yin dge slong ma/ /de las bsod snyoms blangs nas ni/ /zos na so sor bshags pa yin/ /khyim gang dag tu dge slong rnams/ /gsol tshe dge slong ma gang zhig /'di la mar
<p>42a.4</p>sbyin 'di dag la/ /zas sogs byin zhes gal te smra/ /dge slong rnams ni zan za'i bar/ /sring mo ma smra zhes ni bzlog /de las gcig kyang mi smra na/ /kun la so sor bshags pa yin/ /nang dang bar dang phyi gnas ni/ /sum char gdugs tshod gsol rnams te/ /dge
<p>42a.5</p>'dun gyis ni gnas brten nam/ /yang na gsar bu kun gyis brjod/ /dge slong rnams ni gsol gyi bar/ /'di ni ma smra 'dug ces so/ /dge slong ma la ma bzlog gam/ /zhes ni phyi rol gnas pas dri/ /bar nas bra ba rnams kyis ni/ /ma dris zos na ltung ba yin/ /phyi rol ba la nyes
<p>42a.6</p>byas te/ /gal te gcig kyang mi smra na/ /dge 'dun gnas brtan la sogs pa/ /kun la so sor bshags pa yin/ /de yang ltung byed ji bzhin du/ /sdom brtson gcig gi mdun du bshags/ /dge slong ma yi dbyar khang du/ /bsko sham byed la bkag pa med/ /de ni de yi rang
<p>42a.7</p>rdzas te/ /khang bzangs rgya chen 'gar yang ngo / /dge 'dun mthun pas slob pa yi/ /khyim gang bslab pa'i sdom can gyis/ /dge slong bru bas nyen na yang / /mgron du ma bos zan mi bza'/ /mar dang zho dang 'o ma dang / /sbrang rtsi bu ram btung ba dang / /nya sha sha dang sha skam dang / 
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>mar dang bcas pa bkag pa yin/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /dang du len pa 'gal ba med/ /dam pa'i chos ni ston pa na/ /mal stan spyod pa la yang ngo / /sdom brtson khyim gzhan zos nas ni/ /bza' lhag khyim du byis pa la/ /dum bur bgos te sbyin bya ste/ /tshul ldan
<p>42b.2</p>la ni de dag dga'/ /gang zhig 'jigs dang bcas pa yi/ /dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang gnas pa'i/ /dge slong phyi rol 'ongs nas ni/ /bza' ba len pa bkag pa yin/ /de thob der ram gzhan du 'am/ /gtsug lag khang du mi za yang / /nags nyul nas ni ma gtogs
<p>42b.3</p>te/ /dge slong la ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar byas na ci rigs par/ /kun dga' ra bar sdom brtson mdun/ /bdag la mi rigs smad pa'i gnas/ /byung ngo zhes ni so sor bshags/ /de ltar so sor bshags rnam bzhi/ /gang du ji bzhin
<p>42b.4</p>bshad nas ni/ /da ni gang zhig bslab pa'i chos/ /mang po'i skabs son bstan par bya/ /sham thabs steng gi gos gyon pa/ /de ni shin tu zlum por bgo /ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin dang / /ha cang 'jol ba ma yin brjod/ /glang po'i sna ltar ma yin dang / /ta la'i lo ma ltar
<p>42b.5</p>mi 'dod/ /sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka lta bu dang / /sbrul gyi mgo bo nyid ltar min/ /brtul zhugs ldan pas sham thabs ni/ /'bru yi phur ma ltar mi bgo /stod g.yogs stobs kyi lha bzhin du/ /bgo bar yang ni mi bya'o/ /shin tu bsdams dang legs par bgo /gnya'
<p>42b.6</p>shing gang tsam lta ba dang / /lta ba mi yengs pa yi ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis grong 'jug bya/ /mgo bo g.yogs dang brdzes pa yis/ /grong du 'jug par mi bya'o/ /mi gzar ba dang gnya' gong gzed/ /cog pu de bzhin dkur mi brten/ /sdom brtson mchong sogs mi bya zhing / /
<p>42b.7</p>lag pa mi sbrel phrag mi sprad/ /lus dang lag pa mgo bo dag /bsgyur zhing kyogs pas grong mi 'jug /ma brtags pa dang ma bsgo dang / /lus kun gyi ni ljid mi dbab/ /rkang pa yis ni rkang pa dang / /long bus long bu bsnol mi bya/ /rkang pa mi rkyong mi dgug cing / /mi gdang
<p>43a</p>
