<p>43a.1</p>byin pa bsnol mi bya/ /brla yang phan tshun bsnol mi bya/ /khyim du mnyam gzhag min mi 'dug /lhung bzed la lta mthar chags dang / /tshod ma mnyam dang byur bu yis/ /yongs su blang bar mi bya zhing / /zas steng lhung bzed mi gzhag go/ /bza' ba nye bar
<p>43a.2</p>mi stobs par/ /lhung bzed sngar bzed mi bya'o/ /slar yang 'dod pas tshod ma dang / /zan ni phan tshun dgab mi bya/ /ro la chags pas mi bza' zhing / /shin tu mang po ma yin no/ /zas la ma gus brnyas bcas dang / /kham ni che min chung ma yin/ /kham ni ma bzas bar du
<p>43a.3</p>ni/ /kha gdang mi bya 'gram mi bskyod/ /dge slong kha bkang smra mi bya/ /zas la sgra ni gsal ches min/ /tsug tsug zhes kyang mi bya ste/ /phu phu la sogs kun mi bya/ /dge slong zas la 'phyas mi gdags/ /tha dad phye nas mi bza' ba'o/ /'gram pa zas kyis mi dgang zhing / /
<p>43a.4</p>kham ni 'phro yis gcad mi bya/ /nam yang zas ni za ba'i tshe/ /lce brkyang ba yis ma yin no/ /lag pa dag ni mi ldag cing / /lhung bzed kyang ni byog mi bya/ /lag pa sbrug par mi bya ste/ /lhung bzed bskyoms par mi bya'o/ /mchod rten rnam par byas nas ni/ /bcom ste bza'
<p>43a.5</p>bar mi bya'o/ /drung na 'dug pa'i lhung bzed la/ /smad pa'i don du mi lta'o/ /lag pa zas dang bcas pa yis/ /chu snod dag la gzung mi bya/ /zas dang bcas pa'i chu yis ni/ /drung na gnas la gtor mi bya/ /zas bcas chu dang zas lhag ni/ /lhung bzed kyis ni dor mi bya/ /
<p>43a.6</p>khyim pas rjes su gnang ba na/ /khyim gzhan du ni nyes pa med/ /gad kha dang ni g.yang kha dang / /dkan ngos lhung bzed mi bzhag cing / /langs nas bkru bar mi bya'o/ /'bab chu drag tu 'bab pa yi/ /rgyun las bzlog nas lhung bzed kyis/ /chu ni blang bar mi bya'o/ /lhung bzed
<p>43a.7</p>kun tu mi rnyed phyir/ /'dug la 'greng bas chos bshad min/ /nyal ba la ni 'dug pas min/ /'dug stan dma' mos mthon po dang / /phyi bzhin 'ongs pas chos mi bstan/ /de bzhin lam min 'dug nas kyang / /lam nas 'gro ba la yang min/ /mgo la zhwa 'am cod pan
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>thogs/ /phreng ba'am gtsug tor can la min/ /glang chen rta dang khyogs la zhon/ /mchil lham gyon pa dag dang ni/ /gdugs 'dzin pa dang dbyug thogs dang / /mgo bo g.yogs pa la sogs pas/ /gnas pa la ni mi rung ste/ /dge slong dag gis chos bshad pa/ /nad pa
<p>43b.2</p>la ni 'gal ba med/ /sdom brtson rkyen med langs nas ni/ /bshang gci dor ba'i bya ba dag /mi bya lus ni bder gnas pas/ /byas nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gang yang sdom ldan der gnas pas/ /chu 'am rtswa sngon dag la yang / /bshang gci dang ni skyugs pa dang / /
<p>43b.3</p>mchil ma ngar snabs mi dor ro/ /ci ste 'dor byed de la 'dir/ /nyes byas bskyed par the tshom med/ /de 'dra'i rkyen dag byung na ni/ /sdom brtson ltung ba yod ma yin/ /rkyen ma gtogs par mi gang las/ /lhag par shing la 'dzeg mi bya/ /kun mkhyen yab kyis bstan pa yi/ /spyod
<p>43b.4</p>pas rtag tu gnas pa ste/ /'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /'chag pa la yang de bzhin te/ /gang phyir bdag ni mtha' yas yon tan 'byung gnas kyi/ /yab gcig bde gshegs sras yin des bstan spyod yul ni/ /chos kun rang bzhin de sems zhi byed rtogs par yang / /
<p>43b.5</p>'dod pas bdag nyid phyi rol g.yo ba bzlog par bya/ /de ltar de dag thams cad du/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i bslab pa spyad/ /'di ni bslab par bya ba'i chos/ /mang po mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/ /de rjes bdun gyi dbang byas nas/ /zhi byed bstan pa de 'dir brjod/ /rtsod pa
<p>43b.6</p>'khrug long rtag tu brjod/ /zhi byed de yi rjes kyi chos/ /thams cad gang zag khyad par las/ /zhi byed de ni rnam pa bdun/ /gang zhig lus ngag bsdams pa yis/ /gzu bo yang dag spro bya ste/ /dge 'dun mtha' dag dbus su de/ /tshul bzhin legs par 'grang bar bya/ /'dun
<p>43b.7</p>dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs/ /rnam spang yang dag rtsod pa dag /byed 'dod de la sbed pa dang / /sped pa yang ni shes pa'o/ /gzu bo rtsod pa mngon sum dang / /gang zag de yang mngon sum brjod/ /tshul bzhin de chos mngon sum dang / /ston pa yi ni bka' bzhin te/ /mngon
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>sum du ni zhi byed 'di/ /mngon sum 'dul bar brjod de gcig /blo dman rnams kyis dran pa'i phyir/ /'di ni phyogs tsam bstan pa yin/ /gang yang dgu 'am bcu yis sam/ /lnga 'am de las lhag pas kyang / /gang mang gis ni rtsod pa dag /zhi byed de ni
<p>44a.2</p>gang mang brjod/ /gal te gzu bo gang mang dang / /gang la mdo sde 'dul ba yi/ /bstan bcos shes pa'i gnas brtan nam/ /gzhan gyis kyang rtsod ma zhi na/ /tshogs la dbul lo tshogs kyis kyang / /chos lnga ldan pas yang dag bsko/ /sngar bzhin 'dir yang tshul shing brim/ /
<p>44a.3</p>gang des tshul shing bya ba ni/ /chos dang chos min ston byed gnyis/ /chos kyi tshul shing mchod 'os te/ /drang po dri zhim reg na bde/ /cig shos de las bzlog pa ste/ /yon po dri ngan reg bya rtsub/ /chos kyi lag pa g.yas su bcang / /cig shos steng nas bkag ste'o/ /dge
<p>44a.4</p>'dun yang ni 'dug pa na/ /nan tan ldan pas lan gsum par/ /chos kyi tshul shing dang po ste/ /gnas brtan smos nas rab tu brim/ /gal te 'dir ni chos kyi brda/ /dge ba rnams ni mang gyur na/ /tshul shing de yis chos kyi don/ /rtsod pa de yis go bar bya/ /de la skyor
<p>44a.5</p>byed dge slong la/ /sngar bshad pa yis ltung bar 'gyur/ /slar yang cig shos de lta na'ang / /de ni zhi bar brjod par bya/ /chos min las skyor dge slong la/ /de lta na yang nyes byas te/ /gang mang zhes ni grags pa yi/ /'dul ba 'di ni dpa' bos gsungs/ /'di ni
<p>44a.6</p>rtsod dang 'khrug long las/ /brtsams pa'i 'dul ba gnyis par grags/ /gsum pa mi gdams rtsod zhi byed/ /'dul ba rig pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /mngon sum 'dul dang de bzhin du/ /dran pa ma smyos pa yis 'dul/ /mngon sum 'dul ba snga ma bzhin/ /
<p>44a.7</p>snga ma ji lta de ltar brjod/ /dran 'dul shes par bya ba ni/ /gyad bu nor la sogs pa'i tshig /dge slong ma ni mdza' mos sngon/ /ston pa la zhus ji bzhin te/ /tshul 'dis dge slong khyed cag gis/ /gyad bu nor la dran 'dul sbyin/ /'di ltar yang ni sbyin bya ste/ /des ni
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>rgan pa'i mtha' logs brjod/ /gson cig dge 'dun btsun pa rnams/ /bdag la tshul min sogs kyis bskur/ /de ni tshogs la dran pa yis/ /'dul ba bdag la gnang zhes gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod rjes la/ /dge slong gcig gis gsol byas nas/ /chos
<p>44b.2</p>dang ldan zhing cho ga bzhin/ /dran pas 'dul ba de la sbyin/ /ma smyos 'dul ba gsungs pa ni/ /bye skyes bzhin du de tshe dag /sems 'khrugs pa'am smyos pa'am/ /blo ni tshor bas gzir ba ste/ /des na sdom brtson rnams kyis bdag /dman phyir yang dang yang du bskul/ /
<p>44b.3</p>ma myos 'dul ba dge 'dun la/ /gsan du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod/ /ma myos 'dul ba 'di la yang / /gsol ba sngon brjod las kyis sbyin/ /de ltar tshul des rtsod zhi ba/ /ma myos pa yi 'dul bas so/ /ltung phyir rtsod pa dag la yang / /'dul ba bzhi
<p>44b.4</p>yis myur du zhi/ /yang dag khas blangs mngon sum dang / /rtswa bkram de nyid tshul la ni/ /ltung bar bcas pa glengs pa'am/ /ma glengs na yang dge slong gis/ /dge slong mdun na tsog pu yis/ /'dug ste thal sbyar phyag byas nas/ /brjod de dgongs shig khyod kyi mdun/ /
<p>44b.5</p>ltung ba bshags brjod des kyang der/ /mthong ngam zhes dri mthong lan smra/ /phyin ci ma log de yi tshig /phyin chad ltung la dga' min dri/ /dga' bar mi byed ces tshig brjod/ /thabs yin zhes kyang nges brjod de/ /khas blangs rtsod de zhi ba'o/ /phas pham la sogs
<p>44b.6</p>tshogs mchog la/ /khas blangs 'dul ba gsol ba na/ /de ltar rtsod de zhi don du/ /khas blangs nyid du mkhas pas brjod/ /'di ltar yangs pa can du sngon/ /dge slong nag pos chos gos dag /khyer song dge slong yangs can rnams/ /mnyan yod 'ongs pa las gyur
<p>44b.7</p>te/ /mngon sum rtsod pas 'gro ba la/ /mngon sum 'dul ba yang dag bstan/ /mngon sum 'dul ba'i de nyid 'di/ /slar yang rab bshad bzlas pas so/ /phan tshun rtsod pas 'grel pa la/ /rtswa bkram lta bur rab tu gsungs/ /gnas brtan gzhan zhig song na'ang
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>der/ /'di ltar yang dag rjes bstan bya/ /khyed cag rtsod la mngon dga' zhing / /slar ldog byed pa'ang dka' bar gnas/ /khyod 'dir legs pa rnyed min te/ /'di 'dra dge slong yin nam ci/ /gzhan yang khyed dang bdag cag la/ /nges par ltung ba gang byung
<p>45a.2</p>ba/ /sbom po'am mthar thug spangs nas ni/ /de ni nyer zhi spro bas gnas/ /de la des smras mi nyan pa'ang / /min na de tshe rang bzhin gnas/ /cig shos kyi ni phyogs la yang / /de ni sngar bzhin brjod par bya/ /de yang gal te ma zhi ba'i/ /sems ldan de tshig nyan min na/ /
<p>45a.3</p>rtsod de nye bar zhi ba ni/ /rtswa bkram tshul gang nyid kyis so/ /ltung ba khas blangs pa la yang / /slar yang log par shes pa yis/ /tshogs nang de slar khas mi len/ /dge slong me bzhi ji bzhin du/ /'dir yang de yi ngo bo nyid/ /tshol bas de 'dul dge slong la/ /sbyin zhes
<p>45a.4</p>gzhan la phan byed pa'i/ /'gro ba rnams kyi rtsa lag gsungs/ /des kyang de ltar rgan pa yi/ /mthar ni kun la gsol bar bya/ /de la de bzhin tshogs kyis kyang / /cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin/ /bya phyir rtsod la dge slong gi/ /tshogs kyis kun gyi zhi ba thob/ /mi
<p>45a.5</p>mthun byed min kha cig la/ /zhi byed de 'dir shes par bya/ /'di ni so sor thar pa yi/ /mdo don mdor bsdus tsam zhig ste/ /gzhi la sogs par gang gsungs pa/ /de yang ci nus brjod par bya/ /rigs ngan reg 'os ma yin dang / /chang 'tshong khyim dang rgyal po'i khab/ /
<p>45a.6</p>smad 'tshong khyim du brjod pa ste/ /lnga po dge slong spyod yul min/ /grangs can la sogs brdzun pa yi/ /bstan bcos rgyun du bden pa'i blos/ /klog par byed na de dag la/ /bsod snyoms dug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /mi bzad ngan song nad kyi sman/ /bder gshegs bstan
<p>45a.7</p>bcos shes nas ni/ /sun dbyung ched du gzhan dag gi /bstan bcos kyang ni blta bar bya/ /gang phyir kun mkhyen dag pa'i bka'/ /sbrang rtsi'i tshogs chen yod bzhin du/ /su zhig mu stegs kyis bstan pa'i/ /nim pa tsha ba'i ro myong byed/ /khri'u rkang pa ri mo can/ /mu
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>stegs rgyal mtshan nyid kyang ste/ /snod kyang ha cang mang ba dang / /sna tshogs bkra ba spang bar bya/ /skyob pas na dang rgan po la/ /bzhon pa thams cad rjes gnang mdzad/ /chad pa'i las kyi dus dag la/ /gsang ba'i gnas ni bkri ba yang / /khur gyi rim pas 'gro ba dang / /
<p>45b.2</p>dbyig pa dang ni dra ba sogs/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan rnams la/ /bcas pa gus pas sngon 'gro bya/ /mig sman mchu yi byi dor dang / /de bzhin chos gos dri zhim dgod/ /sen mo 'chos dang mgo bo'i khrus/ /gdugs dang mchil lham khra bo bkag /lo ma 'am
<p>45b.3</p>ni smyig ma nyid/ /'di nyid sdom brtson dag gis gdugs/ /rtag tu grong gi dbus su ni/ /de yi yu ba bsgreng mi bya/ /yu ba gdugs kyi tshad nyid de/ /nam yang de las ring du min/ /kha gdang tshe ni nam du yang / /rang gi lag la sogs pas dgab/ /sdom brtson so yi
<p>45b.4</p>rus pa ni/ /bstan te bgad par mi bya'o/ /sgra dbyangs chung dus ston pa yi/ /yon tan brjod bya dam chos kyi/ /dbyangs ni mngon par mi shes na/ /dben par slob pa bkag pa med/ /ston pa'i dam chos mdzes phyir te/ /nyon mongs bcas pa'i sems kyis min/ /dge slong
<p>45b.5</p>dge slong ma la sogs/ /rnam pa lnga la ston pa yis/ /dbyar gnas pa dang dbyar gyi mthar/ /dgag dbye bya bar rjes su gnang / /bslab pa mtha' dag blangs pa gang / /dge slong dge slong mar shes te/ /bcu yi gnas la dge tshul nyid/ /dge tshul ma yang de bzhin no/ /gcig
<p>45b.6</p>pu lam du mi 'gro zhing / /chu bo'i pha rol rkyal mi bya/ /skyes pa la ni mi reg cing / /de dang lhan cig 'dug mi bya/ /kha na ma tho mi bcab cing / /smyan du 'gyur ba mi bya ste/ /'di dag dge slong ma rnams kyi/ /chos drug ces ni yongs su bsgrags/ /sa le sbram ni len pa dang / /
<p>45b.7</p>gsang ba'i gnas kyi spu 'dreg dang / /sa rnams brko bar byed pa dang / /rtswa sngon la sogs gcod pa dang / /byin len ma byas zas len dang / /gsog 'jog byas pa za ba las/ /ldog pa zhes bya de bzhin gzhan/ /rjes mthun chos ni drug tu 'dod/ /gsung rab las ni
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>gsungs pa yi/ /dge chos bcu gnyis ldan pa yis/ /'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa la/ /dge slob ma yi ming can yin/ /dge 'dun dag gi rgan rabs kyis/ /'bad pas tshes grangs dran par bya/ /gtsug lag khang skyong dag gis kyang / /nyin re tshogs
<p>46a.2</p>kyi thad du brjod/ /dus rnams yang dag 'pho ba na/ /zla phyed gsum gsum rjes la chad/ /lo la zhag res ma tshang ba'i/ /zla ba drug tu bstan pa yin/ /lo dang zla ba zla shol dag /rgyal po'i bka' yis kyang ni bsngags/ /bka' btsan grags ldan shes rab can/ /dpung
<p>46a.3</p>ldan de yi rjes 'brang bya/ /snod dang lag pa legs bkrus nas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis byug ris bya/ /ci nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / /mchod rten lta bur mi bya'o/ /sdom brtson lam du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /gang du lha yi gzugs dag mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>46a.4</p>tshigs bcad ni/ /gus pas se gol gtogs te brjod/ /de dag phan dang gnod pa can/ /rgyal bas nyes byas dag tu bcas/ /des na bslab pa rjes bsrung bas/ /rtag tu dran par bya ba yin/ /lha yi gzugs ni bya ba ste/ /de yi mchod pa rang nyid kyis/ /bslab pa yang
<p>46a.5</p>dag thob pa'am/ /sdom gnas dge slong gzhan gyis so/ /dgos grub ched du gzugs de la/ /gtor ma me tog la sogs sbyin/ /lha rnams rang gi gnas su ni/ /mi mthun pa dag mi ston phyir/ /'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes par/ /lha rnams kyis ni rjes bsngags
<p>46a.6</p>pas/ /sangs rgyas 'khor du gtogs pa la/ /ci nas gnod pa mi byed gsungs/ /mgon pos sems can thams cad la/ /kun du byams pa rab bsngags te/ /gang la sa bon de yod na/ /sred pa las byung sdug bsngal med/ /gang zhig lha ni gang dag la/ /gus pas
<p>46a.7</p>mchod byed de la 'dir/ /'jig rten gnas pa gang yin du/ /srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod thob byed/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs song nas/ /rnam pa gzhan gyis gzhan bsten na/ /gsal por sems ni g.yo ba can/ /de brten 'bras bu ga la yod/ /yul 'khor dag gi
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>bsod snyoms kyang / /'bar ba'i me mdag lta bur spyod/ /ngur smrig cha lugs tsam gyis ni/ /dge slong rtags sun 'byin pa yin/ /blo ngan dran pa'i don du ni/ /'dul ba la sogs bri bya ste/ /rang ming bdag gi ba dag ni/ /dgag phyir sbyin pa'i chos zhes bri/ /ma
<p>46b.2</p>dad pa'am dad chung dag /tshul khrims can gyi bsro khang dang / /lus kyi dril phyi bsku mnye yi/ /las dag la ni rab tu bkag /khrims ldan gyis ni khrims 'chal la/ /bsnyen bkur phyag sogs mi bya'o/ /'di ni nye gnas skal med do/ /'di nyid bstan pa'i tsher ma yin/ /
<p>46b.3</p>mkhan po dang ni slob dpon dang / /pha ma de bzhin nad pa dag /tshul khrims nyams kyang bsnyen bkur bya/ /de la med na nye gnas kyang / /bsod snyoms dngos po phyed dag kyang / /sdom ldan rnams kyis pha ma bgo /de dag dka' ba byed pa'o/ /rtag tu phan 'dogs kyang yin
<p>46b.4</p>phyir/ /yongs su spyad bya 'di dag ni/ /sus kyang kun du bzlog mi bya/ /rkang pa'i mthil gyi bsku mnye dang / /khrus dang dril phyi sogs kyang ngo / /gal te de la g.yan pa'i nad/ /byung na long bu man chad du/ /'drud dang skud dang rkang pa dag /bkri ba la sogs pa yang ngo / /
<p>46b.5</p>mchod phyir thogs pa'i se ral kha/ /rkang gdub dag kyang mi gdags te/ /rims la sogs pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /skud pa dpung pa g.yon par rung / /de ni nad dang bral ba na/ /rtsig pa la sogs khung bur gzhug /nges par sman pa'i man ngag gis/ /tsan+dan la sogs byug
<p>46b.6</p>par bya/ /ma dad rigs can skye bo dang / /ci nas dad spong mi 'gyur bar/ /tsan+dan la sogs byugs nas ni/ /dben par 'dug gis phyi rol min/ /gal te kha cig nan tan gyis/ /dris byug bsod nams 'dod pa na/ /rtsig ngos maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /de yis mthong ba gsal phyir mnam/ /nam yang dri ni rkang par
<p>46b.7</p>min/ /gal te dad pa can dag gis/ /khas blangs rjes thogs de yi tshe/ /chu mang po yis bkru bar bya/ /me tog mdzes shing dri zhim dag /rnyed de snom par 'dod pa na/ /mig gi ched du rnam bsams nas/ /bsnam gyis 'dod chags blos ma yin/ /gang su la yang mtshon cha dag /
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>ma dad sems kyis sbyin mi bya/ /sman rnams sba phyir lcags dag las/ /byas pa'i sgo lcags bcang bar bya/ /zangs lcags ra gan sa dang ni/ /shing ngam zha nye rdo las byas/ /rgya dag thub pas gang zag dang / /tshogs la yang ni rjes su gnang / /
<p>47a.2</p>gang zag la ni thod pa dang / /yan lag drug gi rus pas mtshan/ /dge 'dun dag la kun rdzob pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor los rnam par mdzes/ /gsal mthong rung ba mi bcang ste/ /lhan cig spyod pa'i tshul ngan bkag /sbyin bdag dad pa spel ba'i phyir/ /bcos pa nyid do
<p>47a.3</p>tshogs kyi yang / /me long ngam ni chu sogs la/ /rang gi bzhin ni blta mi bya/ /lus kyi na tshod mtshan ma'am/ /rma dag lta phyir nyes pa med/ /rang gi lus skyes mi dgug cing / /rdo la sogs pas mi gzhom mo/ /'dod chags me ni 'phel ba na/ /mi sdug chu
<p>47a.4</p>yis zhi bar bya/ /glang chen rmig rjes lta bu yi/ /sa yi rang bzhin rkang khrus snod/ /'od ma ta la'i lo ma yi/ /bsil yab kyang ni rnam pa gnyis/ /lo ma yal 'dab ras ma dag /sha na tha na bal gyi ste/ /sbrang ma la sogs zlog byed pa/ /rnam pa lnga ni rab tu gnang / /
<p>47a.5</p>shing ngam skas la 'dzeg pa na/ /sham thabs mtha' sna bcing bar bya/ /lci ba'i khur ni dge slong gis/ /phal pa bzhin du bskur mi bya/ /so mangs sogs kyi yan lag mchog /bshad par bya ba ma yin no/ /mgo skyes lag pa dag gis kyang / /gyen du brdze bar mi bya'o/ /
<p>47a.6</p>skra la rdul gyis gos pa na/ /lag pa'am ni gos kyis kyang / /mgo bo yongs su sbrug phyi ba/ /brtul zhugs ldan la nyes pa med/ /skad gsang ha cang che chung gis/ /thub pa'i bka' ni mi brjod de/ /brjod bya dang ni mi 'gal bar/ /yul skad dus dang rjes mthun bya/ /gtsug
<p>47a.7</p>lag khang gi steng ngos kyi/ /byang dang nub kyi phyogs cha ru/ /bshang gci bya ba'i khang pa dag /bya ba yin te phal cher ro/ /gtsug lag khang gi nang gi ngos/ /lho dang shar gyi mtshams su ni/ /chu yi snod du nus ji bzhin/ /chu don gnyer ba rnams la sbyin/ /dge slong dam ni
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>khyim pa yang / /rgan po sbrid pa byung ba la/ /tshe ring gyur cig ces brjod de/ /de dag tshe ring 'dod phyir ro/ /gsar bu la ni rgan po yis/ /a rog gya zhes brjod bya ste/ /gsar bu yis kyang rgan po la/ /lus kyis phyag ni bya ba yin/ /phyag mi bya dang mi blang dus/ /brtul ldan
<p>47b.2</p>zas la 'khod pa dang / /'og gi lam ni mi gtsang dang / /gos gcig gis ni 'dug pa dang / /ma mid na yang gang zhig gis/ /kha ni zas kyis bkang pa la/ /phyag mi bya zhing des kyang ni/ /gzhan la phyag ni mi bya'o/ /gzhan yang phyag bya'i yul min yang / /sbom gu
<p>47b.3</p>spyod pa la sogs yin/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sdom pas rgan/ /rtag tu dge slong phyag bya gnyis/ /bstan la dam par bya ba yi/ /dge slong phyag ni rnam pa gnyis/ /gcig ni dkyil 'khor lnga pa ste/ /gzhan gyi sgyid pa nas 'khyud yin/ /skra yi rang bzhin srad bu yis/ /lag
<p>47b.4</p>'gro gzung bar mi bya ste/ /zhi bas rang bzhin mi 'gro na/ /de ni bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya// //bam po lnga pa/ /tha gu shin tu 'jam po yis/ /mgul par bcings te legs par dor/ /g.yang sa ma yin sa phyogs ni/ /'gro ba 'tshe ba med par ro/ /de bzhin
<p>47b.5</p>gzhan la gnod med par/ /byi ba la sogs skye 'gro rnams/ /dal gyis bag yod rab bzung nas/ /'bad pas ci bder dor bar bya/ /bslab pa rjes bsrungs brtse ldan gyis/ /shig rnams dal gyis bzung nas ni/ /bsdus nas rtsig pa la sogs pa'i/ /bu gar snying rje can
<p>47b.6</p>gyis gzhug /rtswa sngon stug po'i sa phyogs su/ /rtsa shig dag kyang dor bar bya/ /lhag ma gzhan yang ma snad par/ /rang gi spyod yul dag tu dor/ /che ba phul chad chung ngu phyed/ /'bring po de dag bar ma ste/ /'bru mar snod du nyer bstan pa/ /rnam gsum de las gang 'dod cing / /
<p>47b.7</p>lam 'gro chos kyi gtam nyid dam/ /mi smra ba yis 'gro bar bya/ /ngal bso'i tshe na tshigs bcad 'don/ /mtshan mo'i gnas tshe rgyud gsum pa'o/ /khru ni brgya dang lnga bcu brgyad/ /che dang chung dang bar ma ste/ /rnam gsum bas mthar shes bya zhing / /gang la ji ltar rigs pas
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>kyang / /chu rab che ba'i sa phyogs sam/ /chu yis khyab par yang ni rung / /rjes mthun nyid kyis khyer bya'am/ /mi khyer ba ni go rims bzhin/ /gal te sdom brtson dge slong ma/ /rnams la 'dul ba ston pa na/ /yol bas bar du gcad bya ste/ /gzhan du
<p>48a.2</p>'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gal te rkun mas bor nas ni/ /yongs su ma bzung rnyed lta na/ /skye bos go byas khyer ba la/ /nam yang 'gal ba yod ma yin/ /kun dga' ra ba byed 'dod pas/ /gal te dge slong ljon shing btsugs/ /de yis lo lnga'i bar dag tu/ /gnas de
<p>48a.3</p>mngon par blta bar bya/ /dge slong gis ni lhung bzed sogs/ /rtsod dang mna' ni dor mi rigs/ /khyim pa rnams ni sho be can/ /tshul ldan cho long ji ltar rung / /gang du sdom brtson bud med dam/ /des kyang sdom ldan mthong ba yis/ /chags skyes gyur na des de yis/ /
<p>48a.4</p>spyod yul de ni myur du spang / /dge slong ma ni nyer 'ongs na/ /bla ma lta bar 'dod gyur cing / /dam chos mnyan par shes pa na/ /'dir legs 'dug ces brjod bya ste/ /so phag shing stan phyed tshal lam/ /gor bu dag gam srab mo yis/ /stan rung gzhan dag dge slong gi/ /mdun du
<p>48a.5</p>dge slong ma yis min/ /dge slong rnams kyi mal stan gyi/ /lhag ma dge slong ma la gnang / /dman pa 'am ni 'bring po ste/ /bzang po nam yang ma yin no/ /dge slong dge slong ma rnams kyang / /phan tshun ltung ba bshags pa rnams/ /phan tshun du ni rang gi skyon/ /gang phyir
<p>48a.6</p>sgrogs par ma nus na/ /ltung ba'i the tshom tshul 'di la/ /dge slong mas ni go bya'i phyir/ /dri'o bla ma'i 'du shes kyis/ /dge slong la ni phyogs gzhan du'o/ /gang tshe dge slong ma gang zhes/ /dge slong gnas su 'jug tshe dri/ /nad dang bcas pa ma yin na/ /shog ces des kyang
<p>48a.7</p>brjod par bya/ /mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba dang / /rgyu skar dang ni nyin zhag shes/ /dgon pa'i phan yon 'dod pa rnams/ /grong nas rgyang grags gnas par bya/ /nags khrod dben par 'dug pa la/ /nges par chom rkun dga' skyed phyir/ /'bru mar la sogs nyer mkho'i snod/ /
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>mkhas pas nye bar gzhag par bya/ /tshul ldan sngar ni bzo shes kyis/ /rang gi bzo cha spang bar bya/ /sngon ni sman pa 'breg mkhan na/ /'chang bar byed la bkag pa med/ /'phangs pa'i tshe yang dge slong gis/ /brtson la dga' ba dor mi bya/ /rab byung brtson 'grus ngo bo nyid/ /
<p>48b.2</p>de spangs 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus can yang spyod bcas gang / /yang dag rjes su bstan par bya/ /de med de la lta ba dang / /dad dang sgom pa yod ma yin/ /man ngag dang ni bral ba'i sems/ /bsam gtan la ni sbyar mi bya/ /de sbyar 'khrul pa nyid gnas
<p>48b.3</p>'gyur/ /bsam gtan gang yin rnyed par dka'/ /gnas khang gos dang mal stan sogs/ /dri zhim spos kyis bdug pa dang / /me tog dri zhim bsam gtan dag /byed na'o 'di las gzhan du min/ /lag gi bla yis shing dag gi/ /mtshon gyi las la sogs pa yang / /
<p>48b.4</p>shing drung la sogs mi mkho ba/ /de yis byin na nyes pa med/ /rab zhi kun spyod la mkhas pa/ /spyod yul gyur na 'bad pa yis/ /de ni lhan cig gnas par bzung / /ma brtags par ni ma yin no/ /gal te chu dang me nang sogs/ /bud med gang dag 'chi 'gyur na/ /dge
<p>48b.5</p>slong snying rje ldan pa yis/ /de 'don byed la nyes pa med/ /gzugs brnyan rnams kyi bzo dag ni/ /shes pas gang de 'dod pa na/ /sdom can gyis ni bya ba ste/ /'jig rten sems ni bsrung phyir ro/ /mkhar gyi sgo dang de bzhin du/ /khang bzangs dang ni khang bzangs sgor/ /bud
<p>48b.6</p>med rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /'dug dang gtam sogs mi bya'o/ /de phyir gzugs sogs rnam lnga yi/ /'dod yon rtag tu spangs nas kyang / /rgyun du dran pa nyer gzhag gi /rnal 'byor rnams ni yang dag bsgom/ /gang phyir lam 'di 'das pa yi/ /sangs rgyas phan bzhed kun
<p>48b.7</p>gyi ste/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /nyan thos rnams kyi sngon 'gro yin/ /bla ma legs par rnam brtags nas/ /gnas ni cho ga bzhin du bzung / /bla mas kyang ni yongs brtags pa'i/ /gnas pa yongs su gzung bar bya/ /phan tshun skyon dang bcas pa yis/ /
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>nges par 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gang gi gnyi ga dag kyang ni/ /phan tshun 'di ltar yongs su brtag /khrims ldan nad g.yog byed pa dang / /chos dang zang zing ser sna med/ /dus su 'doms pa'i bla ma ni/ /bla ma'i yon tan yang dag ldan/ /gnas
<p>49a.2</p>pa'i tshul ldan shes rab can/ /dul zhing bzod dang ldan pa dang / /bla ma la ni rtag tu gus/ /bsam gtan klog pa'i las dang ldan/ /phyag mi byed dang rang dbang can/ /mkhan po dang yang phrad pa las/ /rjes su bstan pa mi slob cing / /de bzhin mi mthun phyogs la brten/ /
<p>49a.3</p>'di dag la ni gzhan des kyang / /gnas kyi ltos pa med pa yin/ /'di ni ngan par shes byas te/ /slar yang gzhan ni yang dag gzung / /gnyi gas ltos pa spangs pa la/ /gnas ni 'jig par brjod pa yin/ /gcig gis kyang ni ltos bcas na/ /slar yang gzhan ni mi
<p>49a.4</p>gzung ngo / /gang du dgos pas 'gro ba na/ /slar yang phyir 'ong 'dod pa yis/ /gnas de la ni go byas te/ /snga ma nyid las gzhan mi btsal/ /gnas med dag gi zhag lnga'i bar/ /tshogs kyi rnyed pa dbang ba yin/ /gang phyir gnas kyang de tsam las/ /lhag pa
<p>49a.5</p>rung ba ma yin no/ /sdom brtson gyis ni dge slong dag /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang dag las/ /mi dbyung chad pas gcad bya ste/ /dge slong gnas khang lnga dag yin/ /gnas ni bzlog par bya ba dang / /klog dang gdams ngag longs spyod dang / /yang dag smra ba dgag
<p>49a.6</p>pa ste/ /chad pa rnam pa lnga zhes brjod/ /ci ste chad pa bzod nyid na/ /de la rjes su gnang bar 'os/ /mi 'os pa na gnyi ga la/ /de byed na ni 'gal tshabs can/ /ma dad le lo can dag dang / /gdug sems can dang tshig ngan can/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang ma gus pa'i/ /
<p>49a.7</p>bzod pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /mthang gos dang bcas bla gos bskon/ /chu tshags snod dang yang dag bcas/ /bla mas legs par yongs brtags te/ /dge tshul yang ni bskrad par bya/ /gzhon pa la 'os yo byad drug /dge tshul de la byin nas su/ /bla mas bskrad par
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>bya ba ste/ /min na bzod pa bya bar 'os/ /nges par de ni gnas med par/ /zhag gcig kyang ni 'dug mi bya/ /gzhan du lo lnga lon gyur cing / /'dul ba'i don rig lam du'o/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan phyin na ni/ /de yi zhag lnga yis kyang ni/ /gnas kyi slob dpon
<p>49b.2</p>btsal bya ste/ /de med par ni 'dug mi bya/ /yan lag dril dang mtshon sogs kyi/ /las ni cho ga ji bzhin du/ /bla ma rnams kyi bya ba ste/ /gnas pa rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bla ma yon tan shes pas kyang / /rang gi bya ba shes bya ste/ /bla ma dang ni slob mas kyang / /rtag
<p>49b.3</p>tu yongs su bsrung bya yin/ /klog pa yi ni slob dpon la'ang / /mkhas pas nye gnas bya ba ste/ /kun spyod khyad par 'phags pa kun/ /gnas kyi slob dpon dag la bya/ /klog pa med par mi gnas shing / /gnas med par yang ma yin te/ /de lta'ang gnas kyi slob dpon la/ /
<p>49b.4</p>sems ni rtag tu zhen par bya/ /sde snod gsum shes nyon mongs zad/ /lo bcu lon pa ma yin na/ /ston pa'i bka' ni mdun byas nas/ /des kyang gnas ni gzung bar bya/ /zla ba phyed dang de phyed la/ /brtson pas nyin re lan gsum du/ /ring dang nye bar gnas pa yi/ /gnas
<p>49b.5</p>ster ba la phyag bya'o/ /gang zhig dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ /gnas pas zla ba phyed na ste/ /de phyed de phyed gnas pa yi/ /lan gsum der gnas nyid kyis so/ /gal te dbyar ni phyi ma la/ /bla ma dus las 'das gyur na/ /so so'i rten gyis phan tshun du/ /bltas te yang ni gnas par
<p>49b.6</p>bya/ /dbyar ni gnas par gyur pa na/ /gal te rgan po ma rnyed na/ /gnas ni gnyis pa med pa'i phyir/ /der ni gso sbyong mi bya'o/ /sdig pa'i sman gyi gso sbyong ni/ /dgag dbye byas nas yang ni bya/ /gso sbyong dag pa'i ched du ste/ /dgag dbye'i las kyang de dag nyid/ /phan tshun
<p>49b.7</p>gdams pa'i don du ni/ /dgag dbye rjes su gnang ba yin/ /gso sbyong zla phyed re re yi/ /sdig rnams yongs su dag phyir ro/ /glo bur lhags dang gnyug mar gnas/ /mnyam mam lhag pa yin na yang / /rjes su bzlas pa'i gso sbyong bya/ /kha ba so ga dbyar rnams kyi/ /zla ba gnyis
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>dang bzhi yi ni/ /mar ngo la ni bcu bzhi pa'i/ /gso sbyong sdom brtson dag gis bya/ /sa ga dang ni chu stod dang / /de bzhin khrums smad smin drug dang / /rgyal dang dbo zhes bya ba nyid/ /drug po'i mar ngo bcu bzhir brjod/ /de bzhin de las gzhan dag ni/ /bco brgyad
<p>50a.2</p>bco lnga bar ni 'dod/ /glo bur lhag pa mang gyur cing / /cig shos dag ni nyung ba na/ /glo bur lhag pa'i yon tan can/ /de dag 'dod pas gso sbyong bya/ /dge 'dun thams cad ltung bcas na/ /dge slong 'dul ba shes pa yis/ /dga' gcugs kyis legs go byas nas/ /rab tu
<p>50a.3</p>'bad pas rim pa bzhin/ /tshangs pa mtshungs spyod mngon sum du/ /ji bzhin yang dag mthol bshags bya/ /de la bltas nas gzhan dag kyang / /de bzhin mkhas pas byed du gzhug /mtshams kyi mtha' ma mnan nas sam/ /la lar yang ni dkyil 'khor pa/ /de bzhin las ni
<p>50a.4</p>thams cad la/ /mtshams ni bcad par rung ba yin/ /dge 'dun tshogs pa med gyur na/ /gang zag gcig gi mdun nyid du/ /byin gyis brlab po de yang ni/ /med na rang gi sems kyis brjod/ /de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyi lhung bzed dang / /chos gos 'gyur ro
<p>50a.5</p>sems kyis kyang / /de bzhin mgron du bos pa yang / /gang gi 'khor ni 'dul ba yi/ /cho ga la ni mkhas yod na/ /de la gtad nas kyang ni gnas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa 'am ci 'dod pa/ /bslab la gus shing 'jigs bcas la/ /ltung ba brtag pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /dgag dbye de ltar
<p>50a.6</p>shes bya ste/ /de yang lnga yi tshogs kyis so/ /mthun par bsams pa bzang po yis/ /dgag dbye bya ba kho na ste/ /dga' bas tshangs pa mtshungs spyod pa/ /gzhan la so sor gus pas so/ /nyin zhag bdun nam brgyad dang ni/ /bcu rnams kyis ni dgag dbye dag /byed pa na ni
<p>50a.7</p>'khon can rnams/ /rab tu 'bad pas sbyang bar bya/ /las kyi phyir ni dkyil 'khor pa/ /bya'o mtha' mtshams bkrol nas kyang / /mtshams gcig tu ni ma 'dres pas/ /tshogs kyi las ni bya bar brjod/ /nyi shu yang na bcu'am lnga/ /dge slong bzhi zhes bya ba rnams/ /tshogs
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>kyi phrin las 'di lta ste/ /'di dag tshogs zhes bya bar grags/ /dge 'dun kha skong sangs rgyas kyis/ /bya ba'i las ni 'ga' yang med/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog dge 'dun las/ /tha dad de yi las de'i min/ /nyi shu yis ni dbyung ba ste/ /bcu yi tshogs kyis bsnyen par
<p>50b.2</p>rdzogs/ /lnga rnams kyis ni dgag dbye ste/ /bzhi po rnams kyis gso sbyong ngo / /brjod pa la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /las ni gang du byed pa de/ /gnas zhes bya bar brjod pa ste/ /bzlog pa la ni gnas mi brtag /chos smra ba ni dag nyid de/ /dge slong mi smra'i yid ma bkag /
<p>50b.3</p>'di ni mu stegs skye bo dag /blun po sgrub pa spang phyir ro/ /mthong dang thos dang dogs pa yis/ /dngos po kun gyi bya ba ste/ /dbyar gnas pa na brtul zhugs can/ /gnas gsum gyis ni dgag dbye bya/ /bar chad ma gtogs gang du yang / /dgag dbye ma byas mi 'gro ste/ /me
<p>50b.4</p>sogs bar chad byung ba na/ /rgya mtsho yang ni brgal bar bya/ /glags tshol phung khrol chom rkun dang / /rgyal po me yi bla ma rnams/ /'di dag gus pas nyan na ni/ /'dul ba mi bshad mi bya'o/ /dad pa can ni nor med dang / /dad chung rnams la de yod pa/ /rab tu mnyan phyir 'bad pa la/ /
<p>50b.5</p>bshad par bya'o ltung ba med/ /mdo sde la sogs mkhas pa rnams/ /gzhag par bya bar rab tu grags/ /de dag las la mi bsko ste/ /'di nyid de dag nyid kyi las/ /mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba rnams/ /'dzin dang tshogs la klog pa dang / /nad pa tshogs kyi rgan po ste/ /drug
<p>50b.6</p>po dag las mi byed pa'o/ /dge slong mdo sogs mkhas pa la/ /lam phyed 'ongs pa thos pa na/ /ji srid dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ /ba dan bsgreng sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /gaN+DI brdungs te dge 'dun gyis/ /rang gi nus sbyar bsu bar bya/ /'ongs nas dga' bas rnyed pa yang / /
<p>50b.7</p>der dbul tshogs kyis kyang ni thob/ /gnas khang 'dug stan mal stan rnams/ /de dag gus pas rtag tu dbul/ /nye gnas la yang las su bsko/ /mi dbab par ni rab tu bshad/ /bslab pa 'cha' ba bder gshegs te/ /skrod pa la ni dge 'dun dbang / /dge 'dun gyis
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>ni khros pa yis/ /rab byung bslab pa mi bca'o/ /dge 'dun bsam pa tha dad pas/ /byas na yang ni ma byas yin/ /gnyis med gsungs pa'i bslab pa ni/ /sus kyang gzhan du bya mi nus/ /gro zhun zla ba'i tshes gcig nas/ /snga ma'i dbyar de gtso bo
<p>51a.2</p>yin/ /de nyid khrums stod zla ba yi/ /tshes gcig nas ni phyi mar grags/ /zla gsum dbyar ni 'gro ba yi/ /spyod pa dge slong rnams kyis spang / /bya rnams kyis kyang rang gi gnas/ /dbyar gyi dus su mi spong ngo / /chu stod can gyi zla phyed nas/ /kun nas nye phyir 'bad pa
<p>51a.3</p>yis/ /gtsug lag khang rnams sbyong ba'i las/ /byi dor la sogs bya ba yin/ /bco lnga la ni ma lus pa/ /'dus nas kyang ni gnas mal dag /de stobs pa ni legs brtags nas/ /spro bar byas te kun nas bsko/ /'dun dang zhe sdang 'jigs rmongs pa/ /skyon rnams
<p>51a.4</p>ring du spangs nas ni/ /gang zhig bstabs dang ma bstabs pa/ /ma lus pa ni shes pa bzung / /de nas gtsug lag khang skyong gis/ /khrims su bya bar rab tu bsgrags/ /mkhas pa yis ni bde ba la/ /reg par gnas pa'i ched du bya/ /gang zhig spro ba gzhi med pa/ /bzhad
<p>51a.5</p>gad rtsod pa ma yin no/ /gnas 'di dag tu brims pa yi/ /tshul shing dag ni long zhes so/ /gsol ba 'ba' zhig bya ba ste/ /de ring tshes ni bco lnga la/ /dbyar gnas pa yi ched du ni/ /tshogs kyi tshul shing blang du gsol/ /de nas rgan rims ji bzhin du/ /tshul shing brims
<p>51a.6</p>pa'i rjes la ni/ /gnas khang la sogs ci rigs par/ /sbyin no gnas mal dag kyang ngo / /dbyar ni nye ba'i dus na yang / /dge slong gis ni 'bad pas brtag /gnas dang spyod yul nyid kyang ste/ /yon tan grub par 'dod pas so/ /gnas khang na ni mkhas pa yis/ /
<p>51a.7</p>tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang / /yon tan can dang thos pa 'dzin/ /snying rje can yid der mngon nas/ /thog mar ltung ba mi 'byin cing / /byung ba slar yang 'chos byed pa/ /de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis/ /gnas ni yongs su brtag par bya/ /sman dang bsod snyoms dag
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>kyang ni/ /gang du snying las chung dus rnyed/ /smad 'tshong tshogs kyis gang ba dag /ma yin der ni spyod yul dag /steng g.yogs can gnas dge slong gi /mdun du dge slong tsog pur 'dug /'di la dbyar gnas thob bya'i phyir/ /ji lta de ltar nges par brjod/ /sbyin bdag
<p>51b.2</p>dang ni nye gnas grong / /zhal ta ba dang nad g.yog smos/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /zla gsum dbyar gnas snga ma'am/ /phyi ma 'di la gnas bgyid de/ /ral dang grum pa bcos pa'i phyir/ /'di nyid bdag gi dbyar yin te/ /phyi rol dbyar gnas ma yin no/ /de ltar
<p>51b.3</p>dbyar ni gnas pa dang / /de nas phyi rol gzhan du gnas/ /nyes byas tsha sgo can gyi chu/ /ngan song thur 'bab mi brgal lo/ /dge slong gcig gi mdun song la/ /zhag bdun yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dgos pa'i ched du mdun du 'dir/ /mi 'dug kyang ni nyes pa med/ /kun
<p>51b.4</p>dga' ra ba la sogs bzhi'i/ /gzhi ni nye bar dgod pa dang / /mchod rten mchod dang tshogs ston mo/ /chad pa'i las byin grogs nyid dang / /dge 'dun lhag ma dbyung ba ste/ /dge slong dgos pa 'di dag gis/ /zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /the tshom med par 'gro bar
<p>51b.5</p>bya/ /'di dag las kyang dge slong ma'i/ /bya ba slar yang lhag ma yin/ /lci ba'i chos nyid ldan pa yis/ /de las dbyung ba mngon 'dod pas/ /dge tshul las ni lhag pa yi/ /dge slong sdom pa 'dod pa dang / /chos dang rjes chos slob pa'i phyir/ /dge tshul ma las dge slong ma/ /
<p>51b.6</p>lhag ma'i bslab pa la slob ste/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob phyir du/ /tshangs spyod nyer gnas 'dzin phyir ro/ /dge slong ma yis byed pa dang / /yang na gsol ba la sogs las/ /gsang ste ston pa nyid dang ni/ /gang phyir mi 'dod ma yin na/ /gnyi ga'i tshogs la bsnyen
<p>51b.7</p>rdzogs ni/ /khyim pa dag gi khyim song la/ /gal te yod na snga ma las/ /lhag par bu dang bu mo rnams/ /bag ma gtong len la sogs dang / /pha ma dkon mchog gsum dang ni/ /slob dpon la sogs dgos sgrub la/ /zhag bdun brlabs sam lhag par rung / /mtshan mo nyi
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>shu sum cu'am/ /nyin zhag bzhi bcu yang ni rung / /tshogs la zhus nas 'gro bya ste/ /yul gyi dgos pa sgrub phyir ro/ /dgos pa khyad par 'phags pa ni/ /rnam par shes te zhus nas kyang / /gsol ba gcig ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /brjod pa 'di la tshogs
<p>52a.2</p>kyis sbyin/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni phongs pa'am/ /sman yang rnyed par dka' ba dang / /nye gnas 'ga' yang med pa na/ /dbyar ni dral yang nyes pa med/ /de bzhin mi rung sgrub pa yis/ /tshangs spyod nyams par byed pa ste/ /nye du ma yin bud med dam/ /rgyal pos mgron du gnyer na'o/ /de bzhin ma ning la sogs
<p>52a.3</p>zhes/ /rang gi gnas su bud med 'ga'/ /chags skyes de ni bzlog dka' na/ /gnas gzhan yang dag bsten par bya/ /rgyal po rkun ma sbrul gdug dang / /mi dang me dang me min dang / /chu yi 'jigs pas dge slong dag /song ba na yang nyes pa med/ /gang du sdig pa'i blo can gyis/ /
<p>52a.4</p>dge slong dge 'dun 'byed pa rtsom/ /de thos phrad pas 'jigs pa yis/ /gal te song yang nyes pa med/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / /'jam pos bzlog phyir 'gro bya ste/ /ma song 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /des dbyar dral yang nyes pa med/ /gtsug lag
<p>52a.5</p>khang 'dir 'gro zhes bya/ /dbyar gyi dngos po 'di'o zhes/ /brjod de dge slong go byas nas/ /ma song na ni nyes byas yin/ /zhag 'dun yang ni lhag par ni/ /byin gyis brlab po dge slong gang / /bar der 'ongs te song ba yang / /byin rlabs de nyid gzhan yod min/ /sngar gyi byin
<p>52a.6</p>rlabs de nyid ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa la/ /de stong rgyu yi tshogs pa ni/ /de las gzhan du mi 'thob bo/ /mtshams bcings rab tu rnam mang las/ /mdor bsdus tshul ni rnam pa bzhi/ /'di yang mdor bsdus dbang byas nas/ /phyogs tsam bstan pa brjod par bya/ /dpag
<p>52a.7</p>tshad phyed dang gsum pa'i mtshams/ /chen po de ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /ljon shing chu bo brag ri dang / /lam chen sogs kyis mtshon de bcad/ /dge 'dun thams cad tshogs pa na/ /dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya/ /de bzhin brjod pa gcig las kyi/ /mtshams ni rab tu
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>'grub phyir yin/ /shar phyogs mtshams nas tshu rol du/ /gnas mal nyid kyi mthar thug par/ /grong dang de yi nye 'khor dag /spangs te mtshams ni bcing bar bya/ /chos gos dag dang mi 'bral phyir/ /slar yang gsol ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /las nyid bya'o tshul ldan dag /
<p>52b.2</p>bde la reg par gnas phyir ro/ /chos gos gsum po med par yang / /sdom brtson mtshams 'dir gnas rung ste/ /grong dang de yi nye 'khor dag /ma gtogs gzhan du ci bder ro/ /sngar gyi chen po mi mkho na/ /chung ngu yang ni bya ba ste/ /gsol dang bzhi yi las nyid kyis/ /
<p>52b.3</p>chen po nye bar bkrol nas ni/ /chung ngu bcings nas snga ma bzhin/ /mtshan ma brtan po rnams kyis so/ /dkyil 'khor pa zhes grags pa der/ /tshogs kyi las ni bsgrub par bya/ /sngar bzhin chung ngu bcings nas kyang / /de nas chen po bcing bar bya/ /gzhan yang der ni go
<p>52b.4</p>rims 'di/ /mtshams bcing ba la gnang ba yin/ /dge 'dun thams cad shi srid dam/ /yang na mtshan ni gzhan gyur ram/ /bslab pa phul lam mtshams nyid kyi/ /phyi rol skya rengs shar ba dang / /gsol ba sngon 'gro'i las kyis te/ /mtshams 'jig rgyu ni rnam lnga'o/ /ljon shing
<p>52b.5</p>gcig gi phyed cha 'am/ /gnyis pa mtshams kyi phur pa ste/ /phur ba 'am ni shing gcig la/ /cha bzhir rnam par phye ba yis/ /bzhi char du yang thob pa ste/ /lnga pa nam yang ma yin no/ /'og tu yang ni dpag tshad dag /phyed dang gsum mo steng du yang / /ri yi steng gi shing
<p>52b.6</p>rtse 'am/ /spyil po la sogs pa yi mthar/ /sbyin bdag rjes gzung don gyi phyir/ /ston pa nyid kyi sku gzugs la/ /sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'bar bas/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan spud rjes su gnang / /rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub dang / /rkang pa la sogs rgyan rnams ni/ /dgag go
<p>52b.7</p>rmad byung 'di dag ni/ /nges par bud med rgyan yin na/ /skyes bu seng ge chen po ni/ /rtag tu rjes su 'dzin mdzad la/ /smad 'tshong gyon pa lta bu yi/ /bud med gos ni mi rigs so/ /tur+ya'i sgra yis 'dug khang du/ /ltad mo ba ni song ba'i tshe/ /sku gzugs dag la brgyan pa yi/ /mchod pa slar
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>yang bsdu bar bya/ /skye bo mang po 'dus pa'i tshe/ /ca co'i sgra yis g.yengs pa na/ /dus tshod brda ni sprad pa'i phyir/ /rnga 'am dung sogs sbyar byas 'dod/ /bcu 'am brgya 'am stong phrag ni/ /mdun du byas te nye bar bsgo/ /rnyed pa brtul can ci 'dod dag /bltas
<p>53a.2</p>te de skal rnam par brtag /bgos nas de ni shi gyur na/ /de slar dge 'dun thams cad kyi/ /ma bgos na yang de skal ni/ /gzhan des rnam par bgo bar bya/ /skal de sbyin bdag kho na'i ste/ /gang la de phul de yi yang / /thams cad du ni ma gnang ba/ /dge slong rnams la de mi 'os/ /
<p>53a.3</p>dge slong rnams ni mgron bos shing / /dge slong ma yang mgron bos na/ /mchod ston tha ma der ni gang / /rnyed pa rgan pa'i mthar bzhag na/ /gnyi gas kyang ni go ba'am/ /yang na sbyin bdag 'dod pas so/ /zang zing skal ba mnyam por ni/ /kun du skyob pa la yang yin/ /dbyig
<p>53a.4</p>rnams rnam par 'god 'dod na/ /dge slong ma las cha gnyis te/ /'di la bsnyen par rdzogs 'dod pa'i/ /dge tshul la yang ci rigs brjod/ /de las gzhan pa'i dge tshul ma/ /rnams la yang ni sum cha 'os/ /dge slong dge slong ma rnams ni/ /skal ba mnyam par bgo
<p>53a.5</p>bya nyid/ /gang du dge slong mang gyur cing / /dge slong ma tshogs nyung na ni/ /de ni mnyam por mi bgo ste/ /rnyed pa re re'i grangs kyis so/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'jig rten gyi/ /yams kyi 'tshe ba zhi bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs grong sogs su/ /spyan drang bar ni
<p>53a.6</p>gsungs pa yin/ /der ni chag chag byug pa dang / /srang gi bzhi mdor sa gzhi la/ /sna tshogs me tog bkod pa yis/ /rab tu mdzes par bya ba yin/ /tsan+dan a gar ga pur gyi/ /bdug spos kun nas dbul bar bya/ /phyogs kyi sgo nas dri zhim dag /dal zhing dal ba'i rlung gis
<p>53a.7</p>bskyod/ /sgra chen pa Ta ha dag dang / /'khar rnga ting ting shag sogs sgra/ /rgyun du 'brug sgra lta bu yi/ /sgra yi tshogs rnams rjes su bsgrag /yang yang dal ba med par ni/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi/ /grangs mang rol cha sna tshogs dang / /gsal por dga' ston chen po
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>bya/ /rgyal mtshan rnams ni tshar du yang / /dngar ro de yang rnam pa lnga/ /mkha' lding seng ge chu srin dang / /khyu mchog glang po zhes bya nyid/ /rab byung chen po rnams kyis ni/ /khyim pa'i 'khor rnams la ni sbyar/ /kun mkhyen grong du gshegs pa na/ /de 'dra la sogs bsgrub par bya/ /
<p>53b.2</p>de nas sangs rgyas mdun bdar te/ /mthong bar dga' ba'i sems pa yis/ /klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i/ /'jigs pa zad par sel ba yin/ /rnyed pa kun nas thob pa dag /tshogs kyi thad du btsong bar bya/ /dge 'dun gnas brtan blo ldan gyis/ /shes na rin thang gdab par
<p>53b.3</p>bya/ /nges par nyo bar 'dod pa na/ /de la skyed par rung ba yin/ /rin ni thams cad ma gzhal bar/ /sdom brtson de longs spyad mi rung / /dkon mchog gsum la su dag gis/ /gus pas chung ma sogs phul na/ /de la rin ni mi gdab ste/ /sbyin bdag 'dod pas gtang bar
<p>53b.4</p>bya/ mi khyod glu gar rol mo rnams/ /byos shig ces ni dge slong gis/ /khyim pa rnams la bsgo mi bya/ /'di ni tshul ldan las ma yin/ /'di la tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /mchod cha ston pa mchod pa ni/ /ji ltar mdzes pa de ltar ni/ /bzhin bzangs 'bad pas byos shig brjod/ /mchod
<p>53b.5</p>pa'i phyir yang mchod rten la/ /phur bu la sogs mi gzugs te/ /dang po rtsom pa'i dus nyid du/ /gzugs rten byed la nyes pa med/ /mar me 'og tu dbul bya ste/ /brtul zhugs can gyis steng du min/ /dge tshul la sogs gzhan yod bzhin/ /mchod bya'i steng du 'dzeg
<p>53b.6</p>mi bya/ /gzhan dag med na dri yi chus/ /sdom brtson rkang pa dag bkrus nas/ /gus pas ston pa'i 'du shes ni/ /yid la byed pas rang gis 'dzeg /dngos po gcig lhag brgya dang ni/ /gsum la sogs pa bya ba ste/ /gtsug lag khang gi glo dang 'bur/ /de yang lnga brtsegs
<p>53b.7</p>dag tu brjod/ /kun du bdun brtsegs bya ba ste/ /de yi skar khung nang stegs can/ /dbus su ston pa'i khang chen te/ /sgo ni phyi sgo'i drang thad du'o/ /dge slong ma yi dbyar khang ni/ /sum brtsegs las ni lhag mi bya/ /gtsang khang skar khung nang stegs can/ /kun du lnga brtsegs
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>bya ba yin/ /sku gzugs mchod rten bder gshegs kyi/ /bka' yang mngon par bri ba ste/ /rnyings sam brlag na dge slong gis/ /slar ni gso bar 'os pa yin/ /gang du gang zhig sngar byas der/ /'di nyid de ltar gzhag bya ste/ /snga ma'i gzugs
<p>54a.2</p>las chung ngu min/ /lhag pa nyid du bya bar brjod/ /gtsug lag khang gi 'du byed ni/ /sbyin pa po yi 'dod ji bzhin/ /chen po dang ni chung du'ang rung / /mkhas pas yo byad dang sbyar bya/ /mchod rten sku gzugs grib ma dang / /maN+Dal yang ni 'gom mi bya/ /dgos pa'i ched du
<p>54a.3</p>bde gshegs kyi/ /tshigs bcad sngon du byas te bgom/ /bsod snyoms dag la rgyu ba'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brda yi tshig /sdom can la ni su dag 'dri/ /de la gsal por go bar bya/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod pa'am/ /yang na rkang gnyis mchog ces brjod/ /sdug
<p>54a.4</p>bsngal zad ces yang na gzhan/ /bdag gam chos lam gang de gsungs/ /de bzhin dge 'dun dag la yang / /brjod bya so so'i bdag nyid kyis/ /yon tan gang la de dag 'gyur/ /de ni de la brjod par bya/ /gcig pu mgron du bos pa la/ /dge slong ma rnams 'khod pa na/ /gang
<p>54a.5</p>du dge slong zas kyi phyir/ /'dug pa'i stan ni dang por bzhag /dge tshul gyis ni gral yang rung / /de ru 'dug ste zos nas ni/ /gal te dge slong nus med na/ /dge slong ma yis yon bshad bya/ /grong rgyu ba la song nas ni/ /gar song de don zhal ta bas/ /len pa dge slong med pa na/ /
<p>54a.6</p>rnyed pa de yi skal ba bzhag/gal te 'ongs na de yi'o/ /rnyed pa mtshams kyis bsgrub pa dang / /khrims su byas la brten pa dang / /ci 'dod dge slong dge 'dun rnams/ /sbyin bdag gis ni bsnyad pas so/ /mngon du ba dang dbyar dang gnas/ /so sor smos pa de bzhin te/ /brgyad
<p>54a.7</p>po yang dag grags pa 'di/ /thob dang mi thob 'byed pas so/ /gdugs dang me tog rgyal mtshan sogs/ /bsnyen bkur dang bcas sdom brtson ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /dur khrod du ni khyer bar bya/ /me chen rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /der ni yongs su brtags
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>te sbyang / /gal te yod na mar dag dang / /tsan+dan la sogs byug par bya/ /srog chags dang bcas rma can ni/ /'bad pas sa ni brkos nas su/ /sbas te de la rtswa dang ni/ /lo 'dab sogs kyis dgab par bya/ /lus can rnams la srin bu'i rigs/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong
<p>54b.2</p>yod pa rnams/ /lhan cig skye zhing 'jig pa'i phyir/ /ming can de dag tshig par 'gyur/ /mthang gos dang bcas bla gos kyis/ /sdom brtson ro ni g.yogs te dbyung / /lhung bzed chos gos gzhan la ni/ /btsongs te bgo bar 'os pa yin/ /de rjes mi rtag rnam pa'i tshul/ /
<p>54b.3</p>ston byed chos nyan sbyin bya ste/ /'di dag skyo ba bskyed phyir dang / /mya ngan dag kyang bsal phyir ro/ /gang phyir 'dus byas thams cad ni/ /rkyen gyis gzhan du 'gyur ba ste/ /rtswa rtse rlung gis bskyod pa yi/ /zil ba bzhin du mi brtan no/ /gang zhig 'chi bdag khrel rgod kha/ /
<p>54b.4</p>dgang dka' der ni mi 'jug pa/ /mtho ris yang dag sa stong du/ /skyes pa de la yod dam ci/ /ji ltar sa gzhi brtan pa la/ /sreg pa'i me byung kho na bzhin/ /rang bzhin skyes cig skyes pa 'dir/ /mi rnams 'chi ba de bzhin no/ /gzugs rigs long tsho thos pa dang / /tshul khrims
<p>54b.5</p>la sogs rtag min te/ /rgyal po 'jig rten mgon gcig bu/ /gang gzhan 'dod chags bral ba yi/ /sdom brtson yang srid zad pa yang / /kun du gnas pa ma mthong na/ /gang gis ji skad ji ltar bzlog /tshe ni chu yi ri mo 'dra/ /de ltar mi rtag chos bstan nas/ /de yi
<p>54b.6</p>dngos po'i yon yang bshad/ /rkang lag gdong pa rab bkrus nas/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas nas so/ /ji snyed 'dus byas de dag 'dir/ /mi rtag la sogs thub pa'i bka'/ /dran pa yang dag thob pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas ni/ /lung bzhin skal ba mnyam
<p>54b.7</p>por ni/ /shi ba'i yo byad sbyin bya ste/ /ro yi bsnyen bkur la sogs 'di/ /sras kyi gtso bo rnams la bcas/ /gaN+DI rgyud gsum mchod rten la/ /phyag byed tshe na gang zhig yod/ /tshul shing 'brim dang gsol ba la/ /gang yod de la 'os pa yin/ /gal te rdzas de 'god pa
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>na/ /brel bas der kun ma tshogs na/ /rnam par 'gyed pas cha gnyis ni/ /rgan po gsar bu dag la sbyin/ /de ltar byas pas de yi nor/ /ma lus legs par bgos par 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kha cig glo bur du/ /lhags kyang de la skal ba
<p>55a.2</p>med/ /'chi ba po yis 'dir bzhugs dag /'di snoms brda ni gal te sprad/ /de yis byams sems kyis bsdos na/ /de ni tshogs kyis thob pa yin/ /gal te byams sems ma yin pas/ /'tsho ba'i tshe na bsngos nas ni/ /gang zag gis ni blangs na yang / /de la
<p>55a.3</p>nyes pa yod ma yin/ /khyim pa rnams ni ltos byas te/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de lta min/ /de phyir gang la ltos yod pa'i/ /dge slong de la de mi rung / /gnyen la yongs su bsngos pa'i nor/ /'di ni tshe 'phos rjes la yang / /gos dang lhung bzed la sogs pa/ /de ni
<p>55a.4</p>tshogs kyi thad du dbul/ /rnam par spyad de dbul ba des/ /cho ga bzhin du bgo bar bya/ /rin chen la sogs yod pa na/ /der ni bgor mi rung zhes brjod/ /dge slong shi ba'i yo byad ni/ /dge slong dbang bar 'os pa nyid/ /de dag med na dge slong ma/ /de yang sring mo yin phyir
<p>55a.5</p>dbang / /dge slong ma ni shi ba'i nor/ /de la dge slong ma yin 'dod/ /de dag med na de la yang / /dge slong rnams ni bdag por 'dod/ /dge slong med par dge slong dag /khyim pa'i grong du shi ba na/ /de yi nor de der lus na/ /gang phyir gnyis kar 'dod na yang / /cig car nyid du
<p>55a.6</p>slong byed phyir/ /gnyi ga la yang rung ba yin/ /gang gis gang la dmigs te byin/ /de ni ci bder de yir 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang gi mtshams dag gi /bar du dge slong shi ba na/ /gang du mgo bo bstan pa de/ /chos gos la sogs dbang ba yin/ /bu lon blangs nas dge
<p>55a.7</p>slong gang / /'chi bdag khar ni zhugs pa na/ /de ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis/ /de yi nor las sbyin par bya/ /dge 'dun don du zhal ta bas/ /bu lon blangs te shi ba na/ /de kun tshogs kyis sbyin par ni/ /lung gis shin tu nges pa yin/ /gzhan du bu lon zhal ta bas/ /
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>nges par 'di ni blang bya ste/ /rgan po rgan po go byas nas/ /dbang po dang bcas yi ger bri/ /lhan cig gnas pa rnams kyis ni/ /ba dan gos dang mal stan sogs/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /tshogs la phul na nyes pa med/ /gal te 'gyod pa'i me lce yis/ /de dag
<p>55b.2</p>sems ni bsregs pa na/ /slar yang bzlog pa'i chu yis ni/ /ma lus zhi bar bya ba nyid/ /'di la rang bzhin gnas pa dang / /gzhan dag gnas nas phyung ba shi/ /gcig gi yang ni yo byad rnams/ /rang bzhin gnas la rung ba yin/ /mdun du yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /rang
<p>55b.3</p>bzhin gnas pa med gyur na/ /gnas nas phyung ba la yang ni/ /'di yis dbang thang bkag pa med/ /yi ger bri ba byas nas ni/ /gal te tshogs la phul ba na/ /shi nas de ni bgo bya ste/ /nor dang 'dra ba nyid las so/ /gtsug lag khang 'os der gyur pa/ /de ni de la mkho ba
<p>55b.4</p>nyid/ /mtshon cha 'ching byed kun ma gtogs/ /rgyal po la 'os rgyal la byin/ /mtshon cha la ni khab la sogs/ /rjes mthun dngos po bya ba nyid/ /de bshig nas ni rtsa ba yi/ /mtshon cha gzhan du mi bya'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bde gshegs kyi/ /tshigs bcad
<p>55b.5</p>gcig tsam bklags pa na/ /legs gsungs dam pa'i chos dag gi /rnyed pa de la mi 'os min/ /thub dbang dam chos rnam pa gnyis/ /lung dang gzhan yang rtogs pa'o/ /lung de 'dzin pa'i don gyis na/ /chos kyi rnyed pa 'os pa yin/ /khrims ldan sngar ni dbyar gnas par/ /
<p>55b.6</p>khas blangs gal te shi ba'am/ /bslab pa phul lam gzhan gyur kyang / /dbyar gyi rnyed pa 'os pa yin/ /bde gshegs sras kyi lhun po'i tshad/ /sku gzugs mchod rten bya bar 'os/ /zur bzhi logs mnyam mdzes byas nas/ /bang rim la sogs gzhan rim bzhin/ /de
<p>55b.7</p>yang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga/ /'bras bu'i rim pa gdugs kyi tshad/ /mchod rten byi bo yon tan can/ /so so'i skye bo rnams la 'os/ /'di yi mthar ni ston pa yi/ /gdugs kyi tshad la nges pa med/ /brgya lhag ri bar bye ba snyed/ /mchod rten yang ni bya bar 'os/ /dman
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>pa bse ru'i spyod pa la/ /gdugs ni rim pa bcu gsum ste/ /de la char khab med pa dag /bya'o zhes ni thos pa yin/ /logs dag tu ni slob ma zung / /ston pa'i mchod rten dbus su ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni gral rim bzhin/ /de yi phyi rol 'phags min
<p>56a.2</p>rnams/ /slob ma rnams ni phan tshun du/ /rab gus mnyan pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /dge 'dun gyis kyang cho ga bzhin/ /sman dag gis kyang nye bar bsdu/ /lhung bzed chu gtsang dri ma med/ /khrus phyir nad pa slong la sbyin/ /lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus nas kyang / /sangs rgyas tshigs
<p>56a.3</p>bcad bzlas nas so/ /sman dag byin len byas nas ni/ /tshul ldan nad pa la ni sbyin/ /byin len stobs pa med na ni/ /rang nyid len pa la yang rung / /chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa dag /nad pa la ni mi bslang ste/ /yang na de yis phul yang ni/ /dge slong rnams kyis bgo mi bya/ /
<p>56a.4</p>gang 'dir chags pas de len dang / /sbyin bdag de ltar bskul ba dang / /nges par 'gegs pa nyid la brtson/ /de dag gsum char skyon dang bcas/ /'phags min 'phags pa'i nad la yang / /nam yang le lo mi bya ste/ /'khrul 'khor la sogs sbyor ba dang / /sman pa dad pa chung bas
<p>56a.5</p>min/ /sangs rgyas la mchod tshogs ston mo/ /nad pa gal te gso byed na/ /ngan zhing sman yang byin brlabs te/ /chos gos sogs kyis bya ba yin/ /de la nor med gyur lta na/ /gang yod gzhan las bslangs nas kyang / /nus pa ji bzhin bsgrub bya ste/ /de yis dad pa skyed phyir ro/ /
<p>56a.6</p>tha na rdo gu me tog dang / /phye ma dang ni bum pa'i chu/ /bsten nas kyang ni mchod pa dag /de yis nye bar bstan bzhin bya/ /gang zhig don min nad kyis gzir/ /nor la yongs su chags pa na/ /'bad pas de ni blangs nas der/ /mchod dang brtul zhugs can ston bya/ /rang gi lhung bzed
<p>56a.7</p>gos sogs kyang / /de la byin nas de yi tshe/ /nad g.yog gis ni bde gshegs sogs/ /mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /khyad par du yang nor bdag la/ /chags pas gang du srog mi 'chad/ /ci 'dod de yi lhung bzed sogs/ /yon tan ldan pa gzhan la dbul/ /dge
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>slong tshul khrims ldan yang sngon/ /lhung bzed la ni chags bzhin shi/ /rang gi lhung bzed nang du ni/ /gdug pa can gyi sbrul du skyes/ /sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /gzhang 'brum legs par gso bya ste/ /sman pa'i man ngag med par ni/ /sen mo sogs kyis gcad mi bya/ /
<p>56b.2</p>gang la slob ma la sogs pa'i/ /nad g.yogs med cing sman med na/ /de la sman dag sbyin pa dang / /nad g.yog kyang ni tshogs kyis bya/ /mdze can gyis ni dge 'dun gyi/ /mal stan nyer spyod spang bya ste/ /rdzing bu ljon shing nye 'khor dang / /spang sa 'dug sa la sogs so/ /khang
<p>56b.3</p>bzangs dang ni khyams kyi sgo/ /g.yos khang bshang gci'i khang par ni/ /mi 'dug dben par gnas bya ste/ /de ni tshogs kyis bskyang bar 'os/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag por ni/ /shi 'am bcings sam ring song na/ /dka' bas kyang ni lo lnga'i bar/ /gtsug lag khang du legs gnas
<p>56b.4</p>bya/ /lo lnga lon nas de drung ge /gtsug lag khang rten rnyed pa dag /blangs te de ru gnas bya ste/ /bsrung phyir gso sbyong tha dad do/ /de ltar lo ni bcur gnas kyang / /der ni 'dzin po med pa na/ /mal stan la sogs de byin nas/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan gnas par bya/ /'gro 'dod
<p>56b.5</p>rnams kyis ci 'dod par/ /sgo bsdams rgyas btab 'gro bya ste/ /slar yang de ni 'jug pa na/ /de la 'dug gnas sbyin par bya/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan dbang ba'i dkor/ /dge slong gzhan du spyod pa bkag /dgos pa'i phyir du de mthun pas/ /yongs su spyod la nyes pa med/ /
<p>56b.6</p>sbyin bdag rnams kyis mal stan dag /gtsug lag khang du phul ba gang / /mi 'dod kyang ni de lta bu/ /gzhan du dbul du gzhug mi bya/ /tshogs kyi gos ni gyon nas kyang / /dge slong rang gi las byed bkag /gos bkru ba dang tshon la sogs/ /de bzhin gzhan yang chen po gang / /
<p>56b.7</p>char dang kha ba 'bab pa na/ /bla gab med par mi gzhag cing / /bshang gci yi ni sa dag tu/ /de gyon pa ni bkag pa yin/ /gnas mal gnas skyong ma gtad par/ /mtshan mo'i dus su 'gro mi bya// //bam po drug pa/ gtod pa na yang yul gcig la/ /go bar byas te
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>bzhag par 'dod/ /tshogs kyi 'dug stan la sogs kyang / /rgan rims bzhin du sbyin bya ste/ /glo bur lhags pa'i ched du yang / /dngos po gang yang kun tu gzhag /gnas kyi dbye bas dgon par yang / /rgan rims sogs la ci 'dod par/ /sa dang shing gi phug la sogs/ /
<p>57a.2</p>rim pa ji bzhin thob pa yin/ /dgon pa'i glo bur lhags pa la'ang / /dngos po'i skal ba gzhag bya ste/ /chos gos la sogs sbas nas ni/ /gnas bya gzhan du ltung bar 'gyur/ /gang du sa gzhi khru do yi/ /tshad tsam la yang mal dag gnang / /zhabs tshags can dang so shing sogs/ /pha gu dang ni
<p>57a.3</p>sman gyi snod/ /kun nas 'jam por byugs te bya/ /gnas khang sogs su 'gro 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi 'dug gnas ni/ /gzhig nas 'gro bar mi bzhed do/ /gnas khang 'gyed pa la sogs dus/ /ma bsgo bar ni 'gro ba ni/ /slar yang rgan rims ji bzhin du/ /'dod kyang
<p>57a.4</p>de la 'os ma yin/ /gsar bu rnams dang de mnyam par/ /gnas mal bza' ba 'bras bu dang / /me tog la sogs sbyin pa nyid/ /bstan pa 'di la chos nyid do/ /nad tshabs che la gnas khang gzhan/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin sbyin bya ste/ /ji srid nad sos gyur gyi bar/ /khas len
<p>57a.5</p>mi byed na yang sbyin/ /gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du/ /gos stan mthong na nang gzhug cing / /rgan po na dang nyam chung gis/ /dge skos dag la go bar bya/ /dge 'dun mal stan yo byad dag /me yis tshig gam chus khyer na/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rjes bsrung ste/ /nges par bskyang ngo
<p>57a.6</p>grogs med na/ /dang po gang zag rnams kyi ste/ /phyi nas tshogs kyi de nas chos/ /de nas bde bar gshegs pa ste/ /'di ni dbyung ba'i rim par 'dod/ /go skabs 'byed bcug nges brtags te/ /gang phyir thabs kyis bsgrub pa nyid/ /don gnyer de yis dge slong la/ /mdo 'am 'dul
<p>57a.7</p>nyid dris te'o/ /'dug pa'i thad du nye bas sam/ /de yis 'gro bzhin du yang rung / /sdom brtson rang la blta ba yis/ /klog dang nye bar bstan pa sbyin/ /nye bar bstan pa 'dzin pas kyang / /bla ma sangs rgyas dang por gus/ /rtse gcig nyal bas spangs nas ni/ /nye bar bstan pa lan gsum
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>bzung / /nye bar bstan pa ston pa po/ /'di yis sgra ni mi thos pa'i/ /phyogs der de la gtad nas ni/ /lan brgya'i bar du yang ni bzla/ /'don dang rjes su 'don sogs kyi/ /dbyangs kyis thub pa'i gsung mi bsgrag /yul skad dag dang rjes mthun pas/ /'don par byed la 'gal ba med/ /
<p>57b.2</p>sdom brtson gang zhig khang bzangs kyi/ /ka ba ljon shing rtsig pa la'ang / /rab tu bteg na 'gal tshabs can/ /de yi phyir na de mi spyad/ /dpung rgyan dang ni gzhan min pa/ /so sor 'brang ma la sogs gdags/ /phan 'dod sngags ni bzla bya ste/ /gnod gyur gsang sngags ma yin no/ /
<p>57b.3</p>lha gzhan phyag 'tshal mchod pa ni/ /gsang sngags phyir yang bkag pa yin/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag byas nas/ /gzhan gyi gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /lhung bzed kha sbub byas pa la/ /stan dang ston mo bza' ba bkag /dam pa'i chos ni ston pa na/ /dad ldan
<p>57b.4</p>rnams kyis 'dus byas bsten/ /sa gzhi gos kyis g.yogs pa la/ /'dus byas mi rtag 'du shes kyis/ /dge slong rnams kyis 'gro ba gnang / /sdom brtson chos gos gsum 'dzin la/ /khrus kyi ras bsrel rjes su gnang / /sa bon chos par dka' ba'i rigs/ /rlangs pas
<p>57b.5</p>phog pa spyad du rung / /sgregs pa byung ba dor nas ni/ /gus pas kha nang bkru bar bya/ /sngon las bzlog dka' las grub pa'i/ /med pa gnyis yod ma gtogs so/ /mngon mtshan can dag 'chang ba ni/ /dge 'dun nyid la rjes su gnang / /bsod snyoms pa yi chos gos la/ /mdud pa bor ba la
<p>57b.6</p>sogs min/ /thams cad kha dog gcig pa yi/ /gos rnams nye bar longs spyad min/ /me tog 'bras bu shing sogs drung / /gci sogs kun tu spyad pa spang / /steng du shing las bya ba ste/ /rdo yi skas ni ma yin no/ /rlung nad can gyis phyag mi bya/ /de la yang ni gzhan gyis min/ /lus
<p>57b.7</p>gtsang byi dor byas nas ni/ /chos gos legs par bgo bar bya/ /de lus mnyed pa'i bsam pa yis/ /bsku mnye byas la nyes pa med/ /li sha'i me tog la sogs pa/ /rnyed na dben par 'dug nas ni/ /sbyin bdag rnams la phan 'dod cing / /lta byed tshim rgyas don du bsnam/ /chos
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>gos 'jam phyis byas pa sngon/ /dga' bo la ni mdzes mas byin/ /skur 'debs gyur gsan thub dbang gis/ /dgag pa'i tshul 'di rab tu gsungs/ /brdungs nas 'jam por byas pa yi/ /chos gos bcang bar mi bya ste/ /de ni su zhig 'chang byed pa/ /nges par 'gal
<p>58a.2</p>tshabs can du 'gyur/ /phag gi yan lag la sogs dang / /bu ram shing la sogs pa dag /chom rkun gyis ni bor ba gang / /skye bos mthong ba blang bar bya/ /rgyab dang mgo bo rked pa yis/ /khur po khur ba'i sdom brtson gang / /de yi 'gal tshabs sdug bsngal gyis/ /'jig rten
<p>58a.3</p>pha rol gzir bar byed/ /srin bus la ba rin po che/ /zos pa la ni nim pa dang / /'dab ma bdun pa la sogs pa'i/ /lo ma'i phye mas bsgo bar gsungs/ /pha ni dbul po ma yin pas/ /bu la nor skal ster ba na/ /tshul khrims ldan pas blangs nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi
<p>58a.4</p>dgos pa bya/ /mtshams gzhan gnas pas de yi tshe/ /'dun pa phul na nyes byas te/ /'bul du bcug kyang mi 'chags pas/ /nges par nyes byas las gzhan min/ /la ba la sogs bzang po gang / /tshogs kyi ci bder thob pa na/ /de ni btsongs te bgo bya yi/ /gshag
<p>58a.5</p>cing gtub par mi bya'o/ /gnas mal rab tu ma brtags par/ /nyal ba la ni nyes byas 'gyur/ /rta dang khyim bya bar te ke /glang sogs 'thab tu gzhug mi bya/ /bde gshegs kyis ni gnyis po la/ /pus 'khyud rjes su gnang ba ste/ /lus ni nad kyis nyams pa dang / /gzhan
<p>58a.6</p>yang rgan po de la'o/ /gnas nas 'gro bar 'dod pa yis/ /slar yang 'ong bar 'dod pa na/ /gnas mal kun nas sbyangs nas ni/ /legs par gtad de 'gro bar bya/ /gang la gtad pa de yis kyang / /de ni 'bad pas kun tu bsrung / /'ongs nas slar yang sbyin bya ste/ /rtags sam go
<p>58a.7</p>bar byas te'o/ /gang sngon brang 'gro ma mthong nas/ /mnan pas dge slong bzung nas ni/ /gnyis ka yang ni shi bar gyur/ /des na 'di ni go byed yin/ /brtul zhugs can gyis zla phyed der/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bco lnga la/ /gnas mal legs par sbyang bar bya/ /ma sbyangs na ni
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>bslab ni 'thob/ /gnas khang bzang po der bsgrubs pa/ /tshogs la nye bar mkho ba yang / /sngon du gang 'os thob pas sbyang / /rgan rims ji bzhin 'dir yod min/ /bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /snod spyad dang ni yo byad gos/ /sngon du blangs nas khyer bya ste/ /phal ba'i las
<p>58b.2</p>kyis ma yin no/ /tshogs kyi gnas mal bzang po nyid/ /gang zag dbang la de mi 'dod/ /rgyab rten bcas pa'i stan dag ni/ /gnyis ka la yang rjes su gnang / /lo gsum khyad par zhugs pa dang / /lhan cig stan gcig la mi 'dug /dge slong bsnyen par ma rdzogs dang / /lhan
<p>58b.3</p>cig stan la rung ma yin/ /mkhan po dang ni slob ma yang / /khyim pa'i khyim du rjes su gnang / /stan cig la 'dug der yang ni/ /gnyis pa cung zad med na'o/ /mal stan la sogs blangs nas ni/ /'jigs bcas gzhan du 'gro ba na/ /sdom brtson gyis der longs spyad nas/ /
<p>58b.4</p>'jigs bral tshe na gtad par bya/ /'di la 'jigs dang bral nas ni/ /sngar bzhin yang dag yongs su spyad/ /rdol dang ral dang zags pa dag /cho ga bzhin du bcos par bya/ /gang der gding ba la sogs pa/ /spyad mi bzod dag longs spyod phyir/ /de yis sa lcir legs bsres
<p>58b.5</p>nas/ /rtsig pa'i khung bu la sogs byug /de ltar legs par sbyar na ni/ /sbyin 'bras bde ba'i don du 'gyur/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi bsod nams rgyun/ /mi 'chad pa yi rgyu yin no/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan rnyed pa ni/ /spyad de gzhan du gnas pa na/ /de yis gong ngam du na yang / /thams
<p>58b.6</p>cad rin tshad gzhal bar bya/ /dge 'dun dag gi gnas mal la/ /shes byed mtshan ma gdab par bya/ /che ge'i sbyin bya'i chos yin zhes/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge rnams kyis so/ /khri steng khri ni brtsegs pa la/ /dge slong 'dug par byed pa de/ /nyes byas dung gi sgra gcan gyis/ /
<p>58b.7</p>bdas te de ni 'og tu ltung / /dge tshul gang zhig dad pa can/ /slob la rab gus blo ldan gyi/ /tshogs la go byas de dag gi /gnas mal la ni rung ba nyid/ /ko lpags las gyur mal stan dag /yul gyi dbus su bkag pa ste/ /khyim pa'i khyim du 'dug tsam rung / /der yang nyal ba
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>gnang ma yin/ /gtsug lag khang gi sgo drung du/ /dom lpags nyid kyi rjes su gnang / /ko lpags kyi ni mal stan dag /mtha' 'khob tu ni nyes pa med/ /ngo mtshar nor bu mu tig sogs/ /rin chen mchog gis mdzes pa la/ /gser dang ba so la sogs
<p>59a.2</p>rkang / /mal stan chen po zhes byar brjod/ /gang gi steng du brla 'dug nas/ /rkang brkyang sa la mi reg pa/ /mal stan khyad par 'di 'dra yang / /de ni mal stan mthon por 'dod/ /'di dag bsnyen gnas sdom par ni/ /khyim pa la yang rab bkag ste/ /de 'dir gnyis ka dge slong la/ /
<p>59a.3</p>ci phyir dgag par mi 'os min/ /khri'u la ni gcig pur 'dug /gnyis ni shing khri brtan pa'o/ /brtan dang mi brtan shes byas nas/ /shing khri la ni gsum sogs kyang / /gaN+DI brdungs nas zhus te'am/ /tshul shing brim pa dag gis kyang / /rnyed pa 'ged byed de yi tshe/ /
<p>59a.4</p>dge slong kun la go bar bya/ /shi sogs brda ni sprod byed pa'i/ /byi'o la sogs gaN+DI lnga/ /dge slong rnams kyis brdung ba ni/ /'gal med rjes su gnang ba yin/ /lan cig kun tu bteg pa yis/ /gang du rab tu brdung ba ni/ /de ni shi bar mtshon byed pa/ /byi'o nyid brjod dang po'o/ /
<p>59a.5</p>gang du lan gnyis bteg pas brdung / /de ni gnyis pa las su shes/ /de nyid gcig gi lhag par ni/ /'du ba zhes byar mngon par brjod/ /nges med gnod byung gaN+DI ste/ /de yang 'jig rten go byed yin/ /sgra ldan khar gsil 'khrol ba ni/ /bsam gtan pa rnams go byed nyid/ /
<p>59a.6</p>gtsug lag khang du glo bur gang / /'jug tshe phyi rol rkang gnyis bkru/ /sprug gam yang na phyi bya ste/ /chu 'am yang na lo mas so/ /nang zhugs nye bar phyin pa na/ /brtul zhugs can thad phyag bya ste/ /des kyang de la ci nus su/ /de dag la ni bya ba yin/ /dka' thub can gyis
<p>59a.7</p>thog mar ni/ /dge 'dun dag gi nang khrims dri/ /de yis ston pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /yang dag rjes su bsrung bar bya/ /gtsug lag khang du dge slong la/ /gnod byed du ni mi 'gyur ba/ /yon tan 'phel du rung ba gang / /de 'dra dge slong rnams kyis bca'/ /shes bya ma lus de nyid ni/ /
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis tshe ldan dang / /rigs rus mtshan nas smos pa dang / /yul nas brjod par mi bya'o/ /rgan po dag la gsar bu yis/ /btsun pa zhes ni brjod bya ste/ /gsar bu la ni rgan pos kyang / /tshe ldan zhes brjod gzhan du min/ /
<p>59b.2</p>rigs pa yis ni ci nus su/ /nyal nyil nges par bsal bar bya/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /gaN+DI brdung nas gnas pas so/ /bshang gci mchil ma ngar snabs dang / /khrag kyang nges par 'dor ba na/ /sgra bcas se gol gtogs bya ste/ /bslab pa zad par mi 'dod na'o/ /rtswa
<p>59b.3</p>sngon dang ni chu dag la/ /dor bar bya ba ma yin no/ /sa gzhi gtsang ma'i phyogs dag dang / /gang du 'gal mthong der yang min/ /nyin mtshan bder gnas dge slong gis/ /tam po la ni mi bza' ste/ /dge slong rigs pa bstan pa yi/ /nad pa la ni nyes pa med/ /
<p>59b.4</p>dus min zas la bkag pa yis/ /'bras bu gang yang mi bza' ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis chos 'dul las/ /gnang ba de spyad mdor bsdus yin/ /dga' bo'i mig sman thur ma sogs/ /thub pas ji skad mdor gsungs bzhin/ /de bzhin dge slong rnams kyis 'dir/ /bza' ba bag yod yongs su spyad/ /gtsug lag khang nang dge
<p>59b.5</p>slong gis/ /skra dang kha spu breg mi bya/ /nad pas sa gzhi gtsang ma la/ /gos dag bting ste breg par bya/ /skra sogs 'breg par byed pa la/ /rgan rims ji bzhin rjes su gnang / /nyung du tsam zhig bregs na yang / /gsar bu'i 'phro ni mi gcad do/ /dang por mgo bo yang ni kha/ /de nas sna yi gtsang sbra
<p>59b.6</p>dang / /de 'og rkang lag sen mo ste/ /las byed rim pa 'di dag go/ /skra ni chan pas mi breg ste/ /brtul zhugs can la gnang ba ni/ /'ga' zhig gnas su rma nye na/ /chad pas gcad du rung ba yin/ /nad pa la ni go byas nas/ /tshangs spyod rnam par mkhas pa yis/ /kun khyab phyogs su dran
<p>59b.7</p>ldan pas/ /spu dag bregs sogs rung ba yin/ /zla 'dra 'bras bu'i rnam pa'am/ /de bzhin spu gri'i so lta bur/ /gcad do rtsi yis mi byug cing / /dag phyir yin te mdzes phyir min/ /dgon pa pa yis sor gnyis las/ /lhag par skra skye gzhag mi bya/ /grong gi mthar gnas brtul ldan
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>gyis/ /sor gnyis yang ni mi rung smad/ /skra rnams bregs zin rjes thogs la/ /dag pa'i don du khrus bya'o/ /sdom brtson rkyen dbang ldan gyur na/ /yan lag lnga rnams bkru bar gnang / /dge 'dun spyi khang nyer gnas su/ /spu gri la sogs snod bcas bzhag /skra
<p>60a.2</p>sogs las la mkhas na ni/ /dben par byed la bkag pa med/ /so shing byas shing kha bkrus nas/ /dam pa'i chos ni bshad bya ste/ /zas dus yang ni de nyid las/ /gzhan du 'os pa ma yin no/ /de yang rnam gsum ring shos ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /brgyad ni chung ngu de yi dbus/ /
<p>60a.3</p>bar ma zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /de dor nas kyang lce bzhar gyis/ /'bad de lce ni bzhar bar bya/ /khar ba zangs dang ra gan lcags/ /lce bzhar rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /grong gi tha mar gnas pa yis/ /de dag nyer bsgrub gzhan yang ni/ /med na legs par brud pa yi/ /shing tshal gyis kyang bzhar rung nyid/ /gal
<p>60a.4</p>te shing tshal yang med na/ /kha dang lce yi dri ma ni/ /ji ltar sus kyang mi mthong bar/ /lci bar bcas pa'i chu yis sbyang / /sngon byung dug can sbrul shi bas/ /bram ze'i bur skyes gyur pa zhig /rab byung de yi lce yi dris/ /rnam sbyang nyes pa mang por gyur/ /dang por sbrang ma so shing gis/ /de yis rtsangs pa
<p>60a.5</p>shi gyur te/ /de yis ne le de la gang / /reg pas mtha' dag shi bar gyur/ /de yi dri dor thams cad du/ /'gro ba rnams ni rim gyis shi/ /de yi phyir na bcom ldan 'das/ /thugs rje ldan pas bkag pa yin/ /tshul ldan rnams kyi so shing ni/ /bkrus nas yongs su dor bar bya/ /chu dag med na sa
<p>60a.6</p>la yang / /brud de yongs su dor bar bya/ /gci ba dang ni bshad pa dang / /so shing bca' ba'i bya ba ste/ /rnam pa gsum po dge slong gis/ /sgrib g.yogs can gyi phyogs su bya/ /dge slong dag la rim gcig pa'i/ /mchil lham bcang ba rjes su gnang / /mchil lham rim pa mang po can/ /ma brtags
<p>60a.7</p>par ni bcad mi bya/ /sgra can dang ni rin po che/ /bcad du rung ba ma yin no/ /tshul khrims lan pas longs spyod na/ /dge 'dun gyi la nyes pa med/ /lhags rlung can gyi sa phyogs sam/ /kha ba can du nyin mo yang / /rkang pa'i gnas skabs rig bya ste/ /yu ba can yang rjes su gnang / /stag dang seng ge
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>dred dang rta/ /glang po'i pags pas bya ba min/ /gzhan dag kyang ni de dag gi /rgyus pa can ni rnam par spangs/ /gzhan yang sder mo can dang ni/ /mche ba can ni mi bcang ste/ /spyang khyi byi ba la sogs pa'i/ /pags pas byas pa'i mchil lham yang / /gtsug lag khang du thams cad du/ /shing gi
<p>60b.2</p>mchil lham mi rung ste/ /bshang dang gci ba'i khang pa dang / /khyim pa'i grong du nyes pa med/ /'od ma mun dza la sogs pa'i/ /rang bzhin mchil lham mi bcang ste/ /rlung khrag nad kyis nyen pa yi/ /nad pa dag la bkag pa med/ /gru la sogs pa med pa na/ /glang po rta dang ma he dang / /khyu mchog
<p>60b.3</p>rnga mo'i mjug ma la/ /'jus te brgal ba bkag pa med/ /tshogs la 'bad pas thams cad du/ /bsrung la rag las yod ma yin/ /rgyal po'i skal ba len pa dang / /zhing gi bya ba rjes su gnang / /gtsug lag khang du char sogs kyi/ /'jigs pa rnams kyis g.yengs pa na/ /tshogs
<p>60b.4</p>kyi nags kyi lo tog ni/ /'bad pas rang gis bskur bar bya/ /dge 'dun gyi ni ba lang sogs/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /khur khol shod cig sod cig ces/ /tshig ngan brjod par mi bya'o/ /dge tshul la sogs gang rnams kyis/ /lam du lam brgyags khur ba na/ /des don bskur bya chu la
<p>60b.5</p>yang / /dge slong gis ni bsgral bar bya/ /dub pa na yang bskur bya zhing / /de ni de yis byin brlabs te/ /sems kyi 'gyod pa med pas ni/ /the gu la sogs sbyor bas so/ /rkun pos skrag gyur bor ba 'am/ /brgal dka'i chu la bo ba yang / /de ni legs blangs phyung nas kyang / /yongs su spyod la
<p>60b.6</p>bkag pa med/ /bza' bca' rdzas sogs kyis gang ba'i/ /shing rta bgrod dka'i lam du'am/ /kha lo ba yi stan ma gtogs/ /'bad pas dge slong rnams kyis bkri/ /'di la 'di gnyis 'os yin pas/ /gru ni 'dam sogs zin pa na/ /gru gdong rnam par spangs nas ni/ /de ni dge slong rnams
<p>60b.7</p>kyis bkri/ /rlung sogs med na tshon gyi las/ /bya'o nyi ma ngan par min/ /'di la gang du skyon 'byung ba'i/ /sa yi cha dang nyin gung min/ /mkhas pas phal cher rdul dang char/ /rlung dang nyi dus ma yin te/ /'di ni khang bzangs sogs don du/ /sa gzhi gtsang mar sbyangs nas so/ /dge
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>slong rnams ni rtsod pa dag /byed na chos ldan lhan cig pas/ /ma gus byed pa de dag ni/ /yal bar mi dor dgag par bya/ /khrims 'chal gyur la khrims ldan gyis/ /tshul mnyam rnams la mang thos kyis/ /thos pa mnyam la spobs pa can/ /spobs pa mnyam
<p>61a.2</p>la'ang phul byung gis/ /gang zhig dang por rtsod pa la/ /de yi tshig gis 'dul gyur ba/ /spobs can nyid la'ang gang lhag pa/ /de dag tshig gis 'dul ba yin/ /rab tu nges dang ldan pa yis/ /rtsod pa yongs su rtog pa pos/ /phan tshun nang khon bstan pa la/ /yang na btang snyoms gzhag par
<p>61a.3</p>bya/ /mi mthun pas kyang lam dag tu/ /phrad na rgan la phyag bya ste/ /des kyang nad med gyur cig brjod/ /gzhan du gnyis ka ltung bar 'gyur/ /bsro khang khrus kyi gnas su ni/ /sgo drung srung ma gzhag bya ste/ /dge slong rnams ni khrus srod dag /byed pa ma dad bzlog phyir ro/ /sdom brtson sna tshogs
<p>61a.4</p>tshon dag gis/ /ri me'i cho ga de dag gnang / /gang dag la ni rung ba'i las/ /sems can rnam pa ma gtogs so/ /gnas khang dag tu rus pa yi/ /tshogs bcas dur khrod chen po bri/ /gcer bu so gtsigs 'jigs pa yi/ /thod pa'i phrang ba rgyan du bya/ /rtsa ba'i sgor ni dbang phyug che/ /kun
<p>61a.5</p>dga' bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /lag na be con thogs pa yi/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po bri/ /cho 'phrul pad ma rgyas pa la/ /bder gshegs gzugs mang bzhugs pa dang / /srid pa'i 'khor lo'i bar dag tu/ /sgo khang logs ni gnyis su'o/ /gtsang khang sgor ni gnod sbyin
<p>61a.6</p>rnams/ /me tog phreng thogs bri bya ste/ /gus pas bza' ba mang thogs ni/ /khyams kyi bkod pa'i sa dag tu'o/ /mdzod sgor gnod sbyin chen po ni/ /lag na rin chen myu gu'i ming / /kha nas rin chen mang skyug pa/ /gser gyi bum pa bzang thogs pa'o/ /kun nas 'du ba'i khang par ni/ /brtul
<p>61a.7</p>ldan rgan zhing rgan pa rnams/ /chos dang mngon brjod 'chad pa ni/ /byed pa mngon par gnas pa bri/ /bsro khang me yi gnas su ni/ /mdo sde lha yi pho nya bri/ /nad pa'i sngas su sku gzugs ni/ /nad pa'i dbugs 'byin bla mar mdzad/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis phun tshogs pa'i/ /klu mo chu yi
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>gnas su ste/ /dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba ni/ /bshang dang gci ba'i khang par ro/ /khang bzangs dag gi ngos dag tu/ /thub pa'i sngon gyi skyes rabs bri/ /dper na thams cad sgrol dang ni/ /zla 'od bzod par smra la sogs/ /gtsug lag khang sogs 'dul ba la/ /'jig rten mngon
<p>61b.2</p>par dad 'phel phyir/ /ri mo'i cho ga brjod pa 'di/ /thugs rje can gyis legs par gnang / /khyams dang khang bzangs rnams su ni/ /ched du me sbar mi bya ste/ /dgos pas de dang mthun par ni/ /mdag ma yongs su spyad par bzhed/ /sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa la/ /me ni btang bar
<p>61b.3</p>mi bya ste/ /de phyir de ni sbar ba'i phyir/ /me ling rjes su gnang ba yin/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyi rgan po dang / /rgyal po dang ni slob dpon dang / /de bzhin mkhan po nyid kyi bka'/ /gang zhig rigs na 'da' mi bya/ /dang po 'dir ni gang cung zad/ /gnang med bkag pa med pa ni/ /
<p>61b.4</p>gang zhig rung dang mthun pa na/ /de ni the tshom med par spyad/ /mi rung ba dang nye lta na/ /sdom brtson rnams kyis de mi spyad/ /'di ni chos 'dul mdor bsdus pa/ /bstan bcos sgron ma lta bur gzhag /'dul ba 'am ni mdo sde yi/ /gleng gzhi gsal por ma dran na/ /bzhugs pa'i
<p>61b.5</p>grong khyer rnams kyi ming / /gang 'dod don ni smos par bya/ /mnyan yod gnas bcas tsam pa ka / bA rA Na sI yangs pa can/ /rgyal po'i khab ces grags pa ste/ /'di dag grong khyer chen por shes/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin te/ /sa bdag mi dbang gsal rgyal brjod/ /bud
<p>61b.6</p>med rnams la sa ga ste/ /brjed ngas dag ni smos par bya/ /grong khyer bA rA Na sI ste/ /sa bdag yang ni tshangs sbyin no/ /skyes pa'am de bzhin bud med la/ /bsnyen gnas ster na bsgrub bya ba/ /dang po'i sbyor ba gang yin la/ /klog pa dran pa mi gsal na/ /bslab pa'i gzhi ni mthar thug pa/ /
<p>61b.7</p>'di ni thub pas gsungs pa yin/ /thog mar bA rA Na sIr ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /lnga sde bzang la phan bzhed pas/ /mdo sde bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /gnyis pa'ang gang gi 'khor kun ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa phung por bcas/ /bdag 'dzin zhags pa gcig
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>bu yis/ /'ching ba mtha' dag rnam grol mdzad/ /lnga sde bzang rnams nyid kyi phyir/ /gos dag legs bgos 'tsham dang mdzes/ /zlum po la sogs tha snyad kyis/ /bslab gzhi yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /ji ltar gnas ni gtsang ma'i lha/ /bag yod gos
<p>62a.2</p>yongs gyon byed pa/ /de bzhin thub pas dge slong la/ /rlum por rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /thub pas rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bzang sbyin la sogs mtho ris dang / /thar pa 'dod pa de dag la/ /bslab pa'i gzhi yang bca' bar mdzad/ /so ga'i dus na mtha' med pa'i/ /rgya mtshor 'jug
<p>62a.3</p>pa ji bzhin du/ /gang gis dang por 'dul ba la/ /tshul khrims dri ma sbyong mdzad pa/ /drug sde bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /ngo mtshar bcas pa'i spobs pa can/ /mtshon pa med kyang grub pa ste/ /bzang po de dag drang srong che/ /dga' bo nye dga' 'gro mgyogs dang / /'char ka
<p>62a.4</p>'dun pa nam so ste/ /mkhas pa dpa' po drug sder grags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad/ /slar yang de dag shin tu bzang / /rab bsngags mun pa 'joms byed pa/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis gang ltar yang / /'dul ba las ni 'da' mi byed/ /sangs rgyas sras su gang
<p>62a.5</p>gyur pa/ /de dag yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /gang 'dir nye bar bstan pa ni/ /rtogs par byed pa'i bshes gnyen mchog /yun rings bsags sdig mi shes pas/ /'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa 'di/ /gang gis dam chos bstan pa yi/ /lag pas bskul te sad mdzad pa'o/ /yun
<p>62a.6</p>rings goms pas bskyed pa yi/ /thugs rjes thugs ni brlan pa ste/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mdzad pa ni/ /rnam bcu gdon mi za ba yin/ /gzhan dag byang chub lung bstan dang / /byang chub sems bskyed bstan pa dang / /sku tshe lnga cha 'dor ba dang / /mchog gnyis rab tu byung ba dang / /
<p>62a.7</p>sangs rgyas gdul bya 'dul ba dang / /mtshams gcad pa ni bsgrub pa dang / /cho 'phrul rab tu bstan pa dang / /lha yi gnas su gshegs pa dang / /las kyi dbye ba bshad pa dang / /yab yum bden pa mthong ba la/ /ji srid ma bkod de srid par/ /mya ngan 'da' bar mi mdzad do/ /gang gis thub pa'i
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>bstan pa 'di/ /'jig rten snang mdzad rin po che/ /rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru lta bu/ /sdud po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig mang du thos pa yis/ /skye ba'i lcags sgrog rnam grol ba/ /thos 'dzin mdo sde'i sde snod kyi/ /sdud po 'phags pa kun dga' la'ang / /gang gis ngan song sbrul gdug ni/ /
<p>62b.2</p>'dul ba'i legs bshad dri med pa'i/ /sngags kyis gso bar mdzad pa dang / /'phags pa nye ba 'khor la yang / /gang gis kun nas ma mo yi/ /sde snod rab tu bstan pa yis/ /sgron ma bzhin du gsal mdzad pa/ /blo ldan 'phags pa 'od srungs la'ang / /rgyal po'i khab tu sde snod gsum/ /
<p>62b.3</p>'dis legs thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /lhar bcas mi yi 'jig rten du/ /snang ba cher mdzad 'di yin no/ /gang du thos ldan 'di dag dang / /dgra bcom sdig pa ring spangs pa/ /lnga brgya po ni dam pa'i chos/ /yang dag bsdus pa'i dbang por grags/ /brgya byin thog mar byas pa yi/ /
<p>62b.4</p>lha rnams dam chos gus pa yis/ /gang du 'dus pa chen pos ni/ /nam mkha'i ngos ni rgyan du byas/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi mthar yang ni/ /sa gzhi lha rnams me tog ni/ /lag nas kun tu 'thor ba yis/ /gang du de ni yun rings mdzes/ /gang tshe dam chos rin chen mchog /nub nyams
<p>62b.5</p>'dam du bying ba bzhin/ /lha dang mi rnams dogs 'jigs pa/ /bsdus pas slar yang yid sos mdzad/ /gang phyir thub pas dam pa'i chos 'di ni/ /skye dgu gso byed skyob pa'i dpung bral ba/ /sdug bsngal ma lus nyer zhi'i don bsgrub phyir/ /brtson pas 'khor bar yun rings spyod
<p>62b.6</p>pa na/ /'od 'bar dbu ni mgul gos bcas pa dang / /rang gi sha dang rus dum khrag rgyun btang / /sras kyang zla tshes cha 'dra yid 'ong ba'i/ /btsun mo mchog sbyin dpag med gang don phyir/ /bder gshegs dpal brnyes zhi lam chos bstan 'di/ /ji srid ma nub bar du rnam kun nas/ /snyom
<p>62b.7</p>las don med ltung ba rnam spangs te/ /zhi ba'i don du yang dag brtson par bya/ /bder bshegs bka' ni mi rnams tshig las khyad 'phags phyir/ /chos gang cung zad spros kyang snyan dngags mchog gyur te/ /bsam pa'i thabs kyis bsgrub 'bras kha na ma tho med/ /'di de las gzhan be+e sha kas kyang
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>byas pa la/ /gang zhig ma tshang lhag gam yang na gzhan du byas/ /sngar bshad rnams las go rims 'chol bar bshad kyang rung / /de kun rang bzhin zhi ba'i bsam pas bzod par mdzod/ /nyam nga'i lam du long ba rdeg 'chos min nam ci/ /dge slong chos 'dul thig
<p>63a.2</p>ler byas mdzes me tog phreng rgyud legs brgyus las/ /gang thob bsod nams dpal des 'khor ba'i lus can rnams dang lhan cig bdag /'dod pa'i 'dam las rnam par brgal nas dad sogs yon tan kun gyis brgyan/ /mya ngan 'das par tshe rabs gzhan du'ang bsnyen par
<p>63a.3</p>rdzogs pa byed par shog /gang dag tshul khrims dri med gnas 'dod cing / /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 'jug 'dod pa/ /rtag tu tshig ler byas pa'i don 'di nyid/ /klog dang 'don dang sems pa nyid du shog /ji ltar 'jig rten rga nad 'chi ba'i gdung bas gdungs/ /ji srid dus
<p>63a.4</p>na 'dod chags me yis dga' mgur bsreg /de ltar de srid sems rgyun dri ma ngan 'khrud pa'i/ /bder gshegs bka' ni gang gA'i chu bzhin gnas gyur cig /'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba tshig le'ur byas pa/ me tog gi phreng rgyud ces bya ba/ /'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po
<p>63a.5</p>'phags pa dge 'dun 'bangs kyi slob ma/ dpal 'phags pa sa ga'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta dza yA ka ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kI rtis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar shar phyogs sa dan ga ra'i paN+Di ta ba na rad+na ma hA s+thi bI ra la
